I wore a strapless but after the fact I realized I could have worn a regular bra and it would have been fine... oh well! Overall a great dress, a bright fun color, and comfortable to wear in the heat! No negatives - you get exactly what you see in the photos.
review_summary: Perfect rental for floral/tropical theme bridal shower.

review_text: Wow! Simply put, I loved this dress and felt amazing in it.  My husband asked me several times what it would cost to keep it and I got tons of compliments from friends and strangers alike. The fabric is gorgeous and although it does seem heavy on the hanger, it drapes and moves beautifully.  I got the 12 L and it was long enough for me to wear 3 inch heels for an effect similar to the model photo - the back of the train swept the floor and my shoes peeked out just a bit in the front.  This dress is fully lined which helps give a smooth profile, but I found that a body shaper underneath helped me feel more comfortable with a post-baby belly! I would 100% rent this dress again.

I really hoped this would fit but I have a long torso for my height and found it was too short in that respect. I have had problems with other jumpers for the same reason so I was not entirely surprised. I probably could have made it work except since it was strapless it was being pulled down and wouldn't stay up. I wouldn't recommend this for anyone who has a slightly longer than average torso and/or small bust that won't hold up the jumper at the top.
review_summary: Very cute but didn't wear due to sizing.

review_text: I read the previous reviews and ordered a size down from my usual 2. The 0 fit great allover! It's a pretty short dress, so keep that in mind. Amazing color is really flattering.
review_summary: Runs large so order a size down

review_text: Great dress!  Runs a little small, could of used the 4

The fit of this gown was spot on. I am usually a size 12-10. Depending on the brand. I ordered a 10L with a 12L as back up. The size 10 fit like a glove. As you can see, the 10L was actually a little short. The 12L was EVEN SHORTER, ;like 4 inches shorter (bizarre). I'm not all that tall. About 5'7" in bare feet. My heels brought me up to about 5'11" and the 10L still didn't graze the ground (the 12L was UNWEARABLY short! Seriously, I almost wish I'd gotten the XL). 

I was very happy with how this dress hugged my curves. I have a very true hourglass figure, with just a bit of a tummy. This draping on this dress concealed EVERYTHING! I'm not kidding! It also helped with my "less than perfect" arms. 

This dress has a good amount of stretch. The only thing I wasn't crazy about was the amount of layers. The pictures don't really showcase that the bottom has three layers: one stops right at your bum (so be careful if you are bottom heavy -- it will cut into you), the second helps show less leg behind the slit, and the top lies as you would expect. 

Overall, I would recommend this dress. It was very comfortable and it didn't feel too heavy. I am big busted (36DD-36DDD) and I was able to wear a Spanx singlet and a normal bra. 

Overall, I would definitely re-rent this dress for a different occasion. I would especially recommend this dress for any event that is taking place in a ballroom or a hotel (which are notoriously COLD). I was comfortable throughout the event, while many of my friends complained of being cold.

Amazing dress. Tons of compliments. Fits beautifully.  It's short and slightly flaired so if showing legs isn't your thing then don't rent.  That said, it looks great with knee high boots and/or tights.  Perfect fall dress but also worked in cold winter weather.
The dress fit perfect! The length was great and it did show a little cleavage but not too much that I couldn't wear a regular bra. Got tons of compliments!
review_summary: Loved the fit and especially the pockets!

review_text: Wore to a rehearsal dinner. Used a backless bra. Comfortable and chic.
It's a bit smaller than I expected, so I wore the backup size. Except that, the dress is gorgeous, great color and really comfortable.
review_summary: Got a lot compliments for this dress!

review_text: The dress was true to size but a little fitted around the hip area. I went with the one size smaller because it accentuated the waistline better. The fabric is gorgeous and the color is striking in person. A must have for a wedding or similar event! #fabulous #weddingflorals
review_summary: I received so many compliments and the dress is gorgeous! Stunning yet elegantly simple. Loved it.

review_text: I am 7 1/2 months pregnant and I was not a small petite girl to begin with. This dress made room for my breast (which are much larger now thanks to the baby) and my baby bump! It fit perfectly!! The only think I would've done differently is get it longer (on account of my baby bump making my dress look a bit short) .
review_summary: Plenty of room for large chested women super comfortable...

review_text: Loved the fabric, it was a great material and the perfect red! I usually wear a 6 sometimes an 8 and i wore the 2. It was a little small around my arms but fit my waist and bust perfectly. The 4 was too big on my top half.

GORGEOUS dress! Super classy, with a touch of sexy. I didn’t end up wearing this dress - the photo is of me in the 4L, which was a little short in the front and which I had to wear spanx with and still showed a little too much tummy for me. The 6L which i don’t have a photo or me in was much better and I didn’t need the spanx. I ended up choosing the Navy Stanfield Gown, for the X factor/open back, but for a more conservative crowd I absolutely would have worn this.

This dress fit perfect. It came the day before my event and tracking was easy and transparent. The dress was a deep red, made of a nice, heavy material. The dress was much more complex then the simple looking dress in the website pictures. It looks very expensive and special in real life. The scrunching was beautiful and very flattering. The strapless top felt secure and I really only pulled it up out of habit. Would recommend for any formal event.
It was way too big and had an odd fit.

Fit great for me.  Not too much room in the chest area, size up if you are bigger then a C.  The boning in the mid section is really great and kept the dress in place all night.  The only issue i had was the zipper, since there is so much pleating on the bodice the zipper is hard to get past the waist.  Had to have my husband hold fabric in place while i gently pulled.  Length was long for me, hem tape is a nightmare since this has a Aline shape to it, getting an even hem proved rather difficult.  All in all it was gorgeous and fit beautifully.
review_summary: This dress was AMAZING classic and stunning.  The shade of red is simply gorgeous!

review_text: I normally wear a 4, but this was tight.  The torso was just built smaller and it gapped where it shouldn't

This dress runs very tight in the waist.  Also, I have an average chest size & my bottom half is why I wear a size 6, so the top was too big for me. The darts were sticking out a bit near the armpits, but it wasn't overly noticeable.
review_summary: I rented this dress for a black & white party.  Dress was stunning and earned compliments all night!

review_text: The dress was fantastic.  Both sizes fit great - I went up a size just because I had been sick and my chest and back hurt - but I could have worn either one.  They were both quite long on me.  I read the reviews that stated it would be ok with heels, but I had on 3 in heels, and both were still to long, but nothing that just picking up the hem couldn't fix.  I loved the dress!
review_summary: the dress was fantastic - great fit with the event and made me feel great

review_text: So easy to wear, so flattering, and subtler but unique.

Loved it! The dress was very comfortable minus that it is a little tight around the waist (but the entire dress was too big with the next size up). I was able to wear a normal bra and it had a full skirt. I felt the top was a little big (my bust is small) but it wasn't noticeable to anyone besides me. It also tended to show a bit of cleavage when sitting down. I also felt the length was good. Overall, a win!
review_summary: Perfect for a wine country wedding!

review_text:
I wore this dress to my own birthday dinner. I thought it was a very fun dress. In fact, I said it was my modern 80's dress.  The skirt is very flouncy, and the white material is definitely a heavy brocade. It wasn't exactly what I was expecting, but I thought it was different in a good way. The bodice fits well and is very flattering, but do be aware that the skirt is very fitted where the black and white fabrics meet. I thought it would have more give there than it did, so just be aware that it will fit tightly.
Overall, I enjoyed it, and I felt good on my birthday!

Love this dress! I chose to wear this to a friend's 1920's themed birthday party. I felt a little sexy with the gorgeous open back and the glam came from the material and sparkle. A must to rent for NYE or black tie event.
The dress looks red in the photos but is really a bright, beautiful salmon/coral pink in person.  The cut is very flattering and looks great on camera.  I highly recommend this dress!
Somehow the color was different from my expectation, but loved it. It is more smoky salmon pink rather than baby pink.

Wore this w/ red patent pumps to match the red flashes in the sequins.  The party theme was New Orleans, so I thought, Perfect!  I was way overdressed for the crowd, but my husband I had a ball.  Got so many compliments the whole night!
Rented this for everyday wear.  Great leather bomber.  Beautiful rust red color

I felt like a movie star in head to toe sparkles. The dress moves like a dream and is delicious to spin around in. I was steeped in compliments all night long and felt sexy, glamorous and fun! Easy to wear, dance in, sit and pose. A little chafing under the pits, but nothing I couldn't put up with as a price for wearing this showstopper.
review_summary: And now, I'm just trying to change the world, one sequin at a time

review_text: The dress fit perfectly - the material does stretch so it hugs your curves and is comfortable. I expected to need to wear a long since I am 5'11'', but the regular was the perfect length with flats (so it does run long). I received a lot of compliments and never wanted to take it off!
review_summary: I wore this dress to a Marine Corps ball - it made me feel beautiful and elegant the whole night!

review_text: Absolutely love this jacket -- with dark jeans and a nice t shirt, it's equally perfect for a casual work environment or drinks with friends.

I so wanted to love this dress. The neckline is fantastic and I like the pattern on top. However, the pattern accentuated my belly fat and made it stand out! No thanks. I did not wear this out to the wedding as planned. Also my husband didn't like the dress, he didn't understand the mixed patterns, haha. Thick fabric hid imperfections (except tummy) and my butt looked awesome in it. I've been looking at other dresses by this designer, hoping to find one that's better.
review_summary: Brought attention to my belly! No bueno

review_text: While it fit there were simply too many pleats and I felt swallowed up by the fabric. The leg slit was not visible while walking.

Seriously though, I forgot to take a picture, but I've got 34DDD boobs, a tiny waist, and some thighs and the dress is tight but tight in the right places. If you like yourself, you will like this dress. I know I looked good. Sorry that I don't have photographic evidence!
review_summary: If you like your body, you will like this dress

review_text: Fit like a dream. A little tight in the chest but all my clothes usually are. This hit right at the knee. I got so many compliments on the color and on the little bow!
review_summary: I went to an awards ceremony/gala at the Rainbow Room in NYC

review_text: Got a 4- fits but a TAD big...had to belt it.

I loved the lace detail over the fitted bodice. The sleeves added the perfect modesty yet still sexy for a more conservative crowd. I got compliments all night. The dress fit true to size. The only con was you definitely need help with the buttons in the back and I was very cautious putting the sleeves on because they are very delicate. But this dress was a winner!!!!

A twist on the cold shoulder! The fabric on this is amazing and soft; I love the way it feels on my skin! It has amazing flow and moves with your body, and also has a sheen that makes it look a little less casual. The shirt does run true to size and I love the way that it fits!

I'm a boudoir and contemporary glamour portrait photographer--I included a dress from RTR for my clients so they'll have something glamorous to wear for one of their outfits. This dress was a lot of fun for this client--she loved the hemline, with the black lace over the nude underlay--so classy! She's a size 4/6 and we found the 6 fit her perfectly, so I'd say it's true to size. http://shannonhemauerphotography.com/

RTR sent me this dress because the one I ordered wasn't available, but I ended up really liking it!  I think it definitely runs a bit small/tight in the hips, but I wore Spanx to smooth things out and it was fine.  
I did not wear a bra, but you could definitely wear a sticky bra or maybe a strapless.  It was actually a bit loose in the top for me, so if you are small-chested I would recommend wearing a sticky bra to fill it out a bit more (I just forgot mine). 
I wore about 3-inch heels and it was JUST long enough - so if you are tall or like wearing high heels I'd recommend a long. The material is pretty stretchy, so it was comfortable and easy to dance in. 
I got a lot of compliments so I would say it was a success!
everyone loved the dress! My favorite part was the back. Great fit.

The material on this dress was thicker than I had anticipated when I ordered it, however, it was surprisingly cool to wear to work during the summer.  The fit was great and it was a great quality.  I received many compliments.

The color of the dress is a little more orange than red. I love the back of the dress. The front was a little tight on the bust so I wore one size up. The dress is very comfortable. I am 5 "1" and I wore the regular, the small train on the dress was stepped on a few times.
review_summary: I loved this dress and I would rent it again!

review_text: Wore this to a wedding that took place outside in a national park. Was just dressy and causal enough that I did not feel over or under dressed. It kept me warm enough, but also was breathable enough to do some dancing! It was perfect for the occasion and comfortable to wear.

This dress fits true to size and I absolutely loved it. I wore it to work and then to dinner afterwards. I got so many compliments. The color is beautiful and it is a very unique dress that I would rent again.
This dress was amazingly comfortable, and fit the "theme" of the event we went to.  The material was thick and and pattern was gorgeous.  Got tons of compliments!
review_summary: Great dress for a fun event!

review_text: This dress was super unique and fit great, I got compliments all night long. I rented 6R and 4R, ended up wearing the 4. I am 5'4'' and 130 lbs. I was worried this dress would be too long but it actually was the perfect length. Grazed the floor with 2in heals on. The material was thick enough so I didn't need to wear a bra, I am a 34B for reference. However, there is no built in support. Overall I would highly recommend this dress!

Should be clearer that when ordering the size you are requesting is UK size, not the US size.  Even for UK it runs small.  Usually I wear a 6 and the 14 is a trim 6 but wow do I love this dress.  Lovely fabric and great silhouette which made me look curvy in a nice way!
review_summary: Love it but runs very small

review_text: This dress is perfect if you have an hourglass figure. If you have a large chest like me, you can wear a good supportive bra which is such a plus. The dress looked great and was very comfortable all night.
review_summary: This dress was comfortable and looked great!

review_text: Super comfy and fit perfectly. Only downside was the length, the 2R was a little long for my 5'5" height, wearing 2 inch heels.
review_summary: It was fun to dance in and was the perfect dress for a Military Ball

review_text: This dress was amazing and I got compliments all night. I love the flattering neckline with just-enough cleavage and the length was perfect. I wore glossy nude pumps and added some glitzy cocktail jewelry to dress it up. And pockets, to top it all off?! Love. I was comfortable the entire evening and wore a normal bra. I am going to be so tempted to rent this beauty again.
review_summary: I was a guest at a lovely black tie optional wedding at Mount Vernon.

review_text: I couldn't wear this as it runs very small through the hips
review_summary: I wasn't able to wear and sent right back

review_text: I wore this to my sorority formal and I LOVED it. It's incredibly comfortable and fits like a glove. My only suggestion is to be wary if you're extremely short like me: Like most things, it was a little too long. But if you belt it and do a little bit of tucking/fake tailoring then it'll be just fine.
review_summary: My roommates were in love with this dress: the color, the fit, the cutouts, everything!

review_text: Fit was perfect. Actually could have gone with the 2L but, the chest size needed the 4. Gorgeous dress and super comfortable.
review_summary: The dress was perfect for the eyes wide shut masquerade theme party!

review_text: I wanted to be classy with a little bit of sass. This dress was perfect for that with the long sleeves and lace. Would definitely rent again for another occasion!
I wish I could justify buying this - it's so fun to wear, super flattering, and very well made. 10/10
review_summary: This is my favorite top on RTR

review_text: This dress looked absolutely beautiful on. However, it runs super small. I normally wear a 4, but luckily called customer service just after the representative had actually tried the dress on herself and recommended that I order a 6 and 8. I ended up wearing the 8, because it fit almost perfectly. Also, the dress is very thick and hard to move in due to the rigidity of the sleeves. As long as you're okay with a little discomfort, this dress is worth renting, because it is gorgeous.

I ordered the 8 and the 10 for the wedding and ended up going with the 10 (after having a VERY BIG lunch before the event!).  I was initially surprised by how full and puffy the skirt was -- my husband described it as as looking like a cupcake.  I was disappointed with that aspect of the dress but overall, after getting used to it, thought it was flattering and it definitely photographed well.  Because of the detail at the top of the dress, I didn't need to do a ton of accessories, just fun shoes.  Also, the back was low so I couldn't wear a bra, but thankfully the top fit well so it wasn't necessary.  As usual I loved the pockets.
review_summary: Great color and shape for an evening spring wedding!

review_text: Loved this dress - great fit and very comfortable. I had to use a safety pin to keep the front together, but it was a quick and easy fix. I would absolutely recommend this dress!
Color was beautiful. Fit very relaxed.
dress fit true to size, it is a fitted waist so it is a little tight to zip at first, but a beautiful dress.
The leather on this jacket is a little thicker than I had anticipated.  Cute with jeans for a day or night.
Loved the fit and the scuba material!  Runs true to size. As soon as I put it on, my 4 year old shouted "I LOVE it, mommy!"   Would definitely rent again!
review_summary: Great dress for a summer bridal shower. Great colors!

review_text: When I first tried this dress on, my husband looked at me and said "that dress does everything for your body that you could hope for from a dress." It was very comfortable and accentuated my curves without clinging or looking too baggy. Fit great in the bust and was the perfect length to wear with low heels. The only issue was the zipper, which had a hard time making it over the gathering at the waist.
review_summary: Felt great and looked extremely polished for a black tie wedding.

review_text: fit well, was a bit loose and didn't realize it was completely open on the front.  classy and sexy all in one
review_summary: Beautiful - LOVED LOVED LOVED This.  I contemplated purchasing

review_text: I wore this to a black tie wedding. I wanted a vintage old hollywood look and I nailed it. Loved the dress more and more as the night went on. Very easy to wear and comfortable. I was bloated and PMSing.. so glad I was sent this one. It was my back up to a size 6 BCBG which was way too tight!

This dress was amazing in person. It is more beige than it looks online and still has sparkle, but it isn't too flashy. It is a perfect mix of sexy and classy. If you are hippy like me I would go up a size. The 6 fit perfectly on top, but was tight through the hips, so I went with the 8 and used fashion tape on the back. The back did gap a bit for me, so if you are small chested I would suggest getting some fashion tape. I wore a Nubra with it and it was perfect. The open back was great for a summer wedding. I would highly recommend this dress! First RTR, but definitely not my last!
review_summary: Incredible dress that really stands out!

review_text: I think this has been my favorite dress from RTR so far!  I love Shoshanna and this dress was perfect for work, but could easily have been worn out to drinks after.  Lace details was beautiful and the fit was great.
Fabric is warm.
review_summary: Loved this shirt for work under a blazer and then without the blazer with jeans for more casual.

review_text: Fun print and off the shoulder design, but I wish it was more tailored.
review_summary: Fun dress, but kind of shapeless

review_text: I rented this as a second choice for a baptism. This was a great dress, but definitely too short for church. I had to get the size 0 because the 2 wasn't available, and while it fit everywhere else, it only hit me mid-thigh and I am slightly shorter than 5' tall. Definitely not church-appropriate and I am not even sure I would have worn it to something like a wedding, because it was tight enough that it crept up when I walked and I think by the end of a night with drinks, it would have been a bit much. I'd rent it again for something like a wedding or a Derby event, but I'd order a size up. The other thing I wasn't crazy about was that the exposed zipper is large and will not lay flat, so your backside looks lumpy from the side. Just sort of tight and short overall, so I'd order a size up.
I'm 5'8 and I should have gotten the long instead of the regular length it was a bit high water
review_summary: It was well fitting and it supported my boobs without a bra!

review_text: Great dress! I have pretty broad shoulders/chest so I ended up wearing the size 8 (usually a 6) so it was a bit more comfortable. There is a sticky edge along the top so it stays put, and the fabric is nice and stretchy. Color is even better in person, loved it!
review_summary: Amazing color perfect for a summer wedding/party!

review_text: The cut of this dress is very flattering. The waist & hips areas are fitted enough to be flattering and not hanging like a potato sack, yet loose enough to feel comfortable and not need to wear Spanks with. You can wear a regular bra, the color is very pretty, and the length is perfect; not too short & not too long. The only part of the dress I don't love is the end portion of the sleeves. They aren't too funky, as I had worried they would be, but they will dip into food or drinks on the table if you're not careful.

This dress was one of the best rentals I have ever had from RTR. I wish that I had an occasion to wear it again. The fit is very true to size. Other reviews made it seem as though the dress was incredibly long, so I only ordered the regular length. It ended up working for me because I wore flats, but if I could do it again I would order the long. I am 5'11" and the regular length just skimmed the floor. The dress is incredibly comfortable. Don't bother with a bra unless you need the extra support because the dress is well-structured on top.
review_summary: I felt so glamorous and comfortable all night!

review_text: I rented both the 0 and the 2, and while the 0 fit better, the snug waist caused the front pleat to kick out more than desired (probably enough to trigger the 'when are you due' questions), so I went with the 2 so the front pleat chilled out a bit, addtionally I wore a thin black belt with it, and used fashion tape to seal the pleat for the first few inches. I adored the colour and print though, and was able to wear a regular bra.
All eyes were on me the entire night! I wore this dress for prom and the process was so easy. I think I should've gotten the 4L just for some more length, but the 4R fit fine as well.
PERFECT DRESS for conservative cocktail attire.  Beautiful in person. I want to own this dress. I felt comfortable and beautiful.

Dress fit like a glove! Runs very true to size! I'm 5'2" and I got regular length and it just touch the ground with heels! So if ur taller get a taller length! Got many complements even from strangers! Got looks and smiles as well! Did show a lot of cleavage but I have a very long neck line a very little boobs :) I feel sad having to pack it up this morning and ship it back! Definitely made be feel stunning!!! Thanks RTR!!
Dress fits excellent, I was in love from the minute I saw it and I knew it was the one! It was so elegant and super classy. I felt like movie star!
review_summary: I feel special and got compliments all night!

review_text: I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner for a wedding where the dress code was 'cocktail attire.' It was in the winter, so I wanted something that had sleeves. This dress was PERFECT. I got so many compliments on it throughout the evening. The sleeves were so fun. It was tight, but true to size. If you go a size up, you may find it is a little baggy around the zipper in the back. I did not feel it was too short either, it was appropriate length even with  heals. The material was thick, but not bulky - the quality was really nice.
review_summary: Really cute dress, perfect for a cocktail attire event!

review_text: This looks just as it does online. No surprises :) The light and flowy fabric felt very pretty to wear and it fit very nicely. I like that it also has a hidden hook & eye closure at the front which kept it sitting nicely in place. I wore it just as it's shown in the photo, with jeans and flat black shoes. Very pretty. I will definitely rent it again!

I normally wear an 8 so I got the 8 and 10.  The 10 barely fit my hips.  If you have a buttbor hips, caution, size up.  The long was a great length for me with 3 inch heels.  No bra necessary.  Loved the dress.
review_summary: Special event for military and local government.

review_text: Dress was great.  Great colors and nice fit.  Very comfortable too.  The size 4 fit, but I'm busty so I opted for the 6 which was a little looser.  I wore it for a bridal shower that I hosted and got lots of compliments.  I wore it with orange gladiator pumps and stacked bracelets.
review_summary: Great dress, very comfy and chic.

review_text: Fit really well.
Everything Was Great!
review_summary: This Dress Is For The Center Of Attention! I Loved It!

review_text: Way long for my height, 5'3.  Pockets were bulky.  Would fit better on a tall and lean frame.
Wore this dress to my best friends rehearsal dinner. It was an appropriate length and great colors! Very comfortable to be in for the dinner and at the bar after. Easy to dress up or down.
review_summary: Wore this dress to my best friends rehearsal dinner.

review_text: Perfect fit, flowy, has pockets which were great. Great material. Will rent again.
review_summary: GREAT dress, great color, great fit.

review_text: I wore this dress to my brother's wedding in April. It was a lot of fun to wear, and I got many compliments on it. The material is not stretchy or forgiving, so be sure that you are getting the right size! This fit me fine (I'm a 14 and this was a size 14 dress) except in the rib cage area--it was pretty tight. So, "true to size" with one exception, I suppose. It is well structured and good quality. It is heavier than it looks, so if you're looking to rent this for an outdoor summertime affair, I'd check the weather first.
review_summary: Lots of compliments! I felt sassy and sophisticated. It was REALLY tight in the ribcage. Size up!

review_text: This dress makes younger girls look a little bit old which was completely unexpected. When I finally fit into the size bigger than I usually am, the dress turned out to be extremely unflattering. There is ribbing on the sides that makes your torso look about 2 inches wider than it actually is, and the tightness around the hips pull in a strange and unsavory way. I didn't end up wearing the dress, and I wouldn't recommend it.

Loved wearing this dress! Since it isn't floor length I didn't need to worry about it being too short since I'm on the taller side. The color is really fun and bright. It does run a little big- I usually wear a 2 or 4 in dresses and the 6 in this dress fit, but was a little big in the chest. Would definitely rent this dress again!

This dress was a replacement for a dress that came in damaged from a previous renter.  I am usually a Medium in Herve but I can fit the small- and this dress was only available in a small.  I wanted a " WOW" Herve for one night of my recent Vegas trip and this one did the job!  It is very sexy!
Was able to wear a regular bra with one of those plastic racerback clips with this dress. Love the flirty high low hem!
review_summary: Beautiful, comfortable and easy to wear!

review_text: Fit perfect!  Herve Leger runs tight (bandage dresses) so while I was probably supposed to be in a small, I ordered a medium and it worked great!
review_summary: Felt amazing in this dress and received a ton of compliments!!

review_text: Very flattering print and it has pockets! You cannot go wrong.
review_summary: I rented this based on other reviews and I was not disappointed. Wore for our son's baptism.

review_text: Hugs curves in all the right ways.  worn with a leather jacket, my husband could not love it more!
review_summary: edged up black going out outfit

review_text: Normally a size 8(+), wore a 6 and loved every second of it. Work 5" heels, because the dress truly is that long, and if you plan to dance, you're going to want to not be tripping over your hem! I wore a nude bra, and while it could sort of be seen through the panelling on the back of this dress, it was complete un-noticeable. This dress is super forgiving, super moisture-absorbent, and super, super, awesome.
review_summary: Have Dessert. No one will ever know.

review_text: i wore this for my daughters first communion, which was in the am.   it was springy, formal, while conservation and very comfortable to wear for a long day.  The texture of the fabric was very nice. fyi it doesn't have stretch, but the size was perfect for me with plenty of extra room... and you can wear your reg bra!! huge plus : )
This is an amazing dress.  The fit was perfect.  Very  elegant.

Such an adorable and comfortable number! The lace overlay and the lining are very lightweight and breathable, making it very easy to wear in the summer times.  There is ample room on top and bottom, so no worries if you're curvy!  I think the fit of the dress is on the looser side - I recommend sizing down for your backup size.  Would definitely rent this again for a date or a outdoor event!

I wore this dress for my bachelorette party down the shore and it was perfect! The dress is short, as other reviews say, but runs large. I ended up wearing a 2 (normally I wear a 4) and just not dancing with my arms over my head too much. This dress was stunning and I felt amazing in it!
review_summary: Perfect for a Beach Bachelorette Party

review_text: I loved the fit of this romper and wore it with a denim jacket on cooler days. Only thing I would change is that the bottom back was very loose and short so i was constantly holding it against myself to keep my cheeks covered

I rented this dress for a wedding but ended up wearing something I already owned. The size is strange: true to size at the shoulders and hips, but loose around the waist. It's pretty forgiving, I suppose, but people who wear a size 0 usually don't need the extra fabric around the waist.

I wore this dress to my sister's engagement party (cocktail event). I felt so elegant and received so many compliments on this stunning dress. I'm familiar with the Elizabeth and James designer and how their pieces usually run small so I ordered the size up, fit like a glove!  The dress is a little short, even being only 5'1! If I were any taller, this dress would have looked a little too scandalous for my taste -- something definitely to consider. RTR suggested that I wear a chunky necklace, but I felt it took away from the dress's details. Wore a pair of fabulous earrings with a bracelet and killer heels -- that's all it really needs! Super comfortable, no fidgeting issues whatsoever! And ladies, its definitely guy-approved! My boyfriend told me that I should go buy the dress :). Definitely the crowd pleaser and I highly recommend!

I wore this dress for both an out of state wedding and my vacation. It was very on trend with the off the shoulder sleeves and looked very high end with the fabric and print. It was full length on me, and the adjustable straps helped. I was very pleased with this dress and got a lot of compliments. Also it was easy to travel with, as it didn't wrinkle when I packed in my suitcase, which is always a plus!

This dress was snug in all the right places. I did not have to wear a bra with it, which was good because the back is sheer. It was the perfect dress for an office awards ceremony. Received a ton of compliments all day!

The amount of compliment I received on this made my entire week. The silk is well-tailored and would sit well on most body shapes. Everything about this worked for me. The length was just right for work, a  graduation, and even a date. I only sent it back to be cleaned :-) Definitely a repeat rental.

The waistline has no give at all so definitely order a size up as the back up. I also wore bra cups and  pinned the shoulder straps under the lace to a racerback because they were too long. This was my first RTR dress and I was very happy with it. I felt beautiful and got a ton of compliments!
Everyone loved it. I wore it for my bachelorette party and I honestly wanted to keep it! The dress was true to size. I wore a strapless bra with it and it didn't show, not even in the underarms area.
Beautiful dress. Heavier than expected. But well-designed.

I loved this jumper! I will rent it again for sure! I'm 5'4" and 125lbs - the XSR fit me perfectly.  The SR was a little too loose on top and didn't wear it because I didn't want anything to fall out. ;)  The length was just above my ankle so I was able to wear a cute, heal with an ankle wrap.  The V in the front was just deep enough to be noticeable but not too revealing. The back draped beautifully, not too revealing at all. I liked that there were pockets but I was only able to carry a tube of lip gloss because they were shallow.  It was a nice material and the gold accent at the neck line was nice too.

I must have wide rib cage, had to wear the larger of the two sizes but then a little extra fabric around the arms and mid section.  I didn't think it was noticeable and was more comfortable than the smaller size.
Breast and thigh were a little tight on me but the dress was so pretty. The sash didn't come with it unfortunately so I dressed it up with jewelry. I had so many compliments. Felt amazing all night.

This dress is snug in all the right places. I ordered a small (the only size available) and was concerned it would be too tight. It was definitely form fitting but looked classy and was flattering. Received compliments all night long from friends and strangers alike. I felt secure not wearing a bra while wearing it. Would order this dress again :)
review_summary: Worn at a formal gala event.

review_text: Pliers are the only way we could get the zipper to go up.  Very surprising since the quality of the dress was superb.  Be sure to have someone to help zipper the dress with PLIERS!  That is key!

I was looking for an engagement party dress for my 6 month baby bump, and this one was perfect! The fabric is stretchy and forgiving, but the pattern of the fabric hides imperfections. It was light-weight enough to stand an outside party in August in Louisiana! I received compliments all night long. Pregnant or not, I would have definitely rented this dress!
I felt beautiful and received several compliments! Great for a special occasion, evening, or brunch! Comfortable and elegant if you have a larger bust.

I wore this dress for a rehearsal and rehearsal dinner.  This is one of my favorite dresses ever!  The size 12 fit much better than the backup size 14.  My bra showed the tiniest amount in the arm holes, but it wasn't noticeable enough to be an issue.  I definitely needed a bra in this dress.  The colors are beautiful, and the pattern is so fun and unique.  I got compliments all night long!  The cut really accentuated my hourglass figure.  The dress was very comfortable all night long (and it was a late night).  Definitely recommend this dress!!
review_summary: Super fun and SO many compliments!

review_text: I could have gone with a size 0 as the top was too big and it was really flowy, that's why I belted it. By the end of the night after dancing the beads around the neck and arms scratched a bit but as gorgeous as this dress was it didn't matter. Id rent again just in a smaller size

This dress is amazing (like all Herve Ledger dresses) but it's not good for small cup sizes. I'm an A/B and it's just not as flattering on a smaller bust.  Everything else about the dress is amazing. The fabric, like many of this designer, works almost like spanx (sucking in everything you want to hide) resulting in clean lines and a flattering figure on almost everyone.
Thankfully the dress in my size was in excellent condition. The backup size was so snagged it wasn't fit to wear (bare areas where sequins had ripped off).
review_summary: The dress was a stunning, show stopper without taking away any attention from the bride.

review_text: I actually loved this jumpsuit. I'd love to own it.  Sadly, I didn't get to wear it because of shipping issues.  But I did try it on!
review_summary: Sadly the outfit didn't arrive in time for me to take it with me.  So nothing. :(

review_text: I wore this dress to a winter wedding in CA. I received so many compliments. The color is so vibrant, so I wore simple drop earrings and it was perfect. I'm 5ft 8in and wore about 2 inch heels and the length for the long was perfect. It would have been too short had I not gotten the long. I usually wear a 4 but ended up wearing the 6L - it stretches but the 4 was too tight. I wish I could have kept this dress - I'm obsessed.

I loved the side slit and the black and white was eye catching. I worn in Vegas for a night out. It was a little big on my 5'2'' 115 lbs. frame but it wasn't too bad.  The slit was sexy. It's a midi length on shorties like me but I was okay with that, much shorter and that slit would have been unseemly!

I ordered a 12, but probably should have worn a 14.  I wore Spanks, and it didn't seem to help.  I looked pregnant in a few photos because it was rather tight in my midsection.  This dress shows way more cleavage than the pictures indicate.  It was a bit much for a family wedding.  The dress was beautifully detailed.
review_summary: I wore this to a beautiful garden wedding, and I got a ton of compliments.

review_text: I got many compliments throughout the night. The only issue is the dress is more orange than red.

This jumpsuit is classy with a pop of fun.  I was initially concerned with the cutout and showing sjin, but it is very tasteful and I didn't feel uncomfortable at all. I got a ton of compliments and felt very classy. I would rent again.

I am 5'3" and my biggest worry about this dress was it would be too long and look too 'corporate' for New Years Eve - but it was perfect! Just short enough to be 'fun' without showing too much. Wasn't too big on the bust (I am a 34B/32C), but wasn't super tight either. I have hips and a butt, so I chose to size up and wear the 6 instead of the 4, just so I could drink and eat that night, but the 4 fit very similarly (just a smidge snugger on the hips). The pockets are always a plus and the material was super soft (felt like a brushed cotton). It also had a stretch to it, which also added to the comfort level. The sleeves weren't too tight, also, and I have slightly more muscular arms for my size. Overall, a great dress you can wear to a work event, a wedding or a party!

This dress was SO cute! I ordered a 2 and a 4 and ended up going with the 4- the 2 fit around my hips and waist, but since I am a little top heavy and big busted, it was too tight in the chest and arms. The fabric is gorgeous in person, and it is very comfortable. I wore it with a sticky bra, but I feel like most ladies could get away with not wearing a bra at all. I wish it were a couple inches shorter, but that's kind of my problem cuz I'm short. :)
The dress fit perfectly but was a LITTLE short when i put on my 3 inch heels. I ordered it in a petite because usually long dresses are way too long but think a 0R would have been better for me.
review_summary: Great for a black tie event - lots of compliments.

review_text: I wasn't sure I would be able to wear this dress - the fitted portion of the top extends further down than the rib cage to just about the natural waist, which I wasn't expecting after looking at the photos/reviews. I am pear shaped so I had to do some magic shifting to zip it up. I received so many compliments on it, so I would highly recommend it, but I would caution that the fitted portion is longer than it seems so choose your size accordingly.

Jaw-dropping dress. Had complete strangers stopping me to gush over the dress. This fits VERY snug, especially the bottom half (for me, anyway!) Since I'm smaller on top, I had to use double-sided tape to keep it from gapping. But it was still fabulous! Plus, RTR sent it to me after the dress I originally rented was returned damaged. I <3 RTR!!
The thick fabric is awesome! It held me in a bit and gave me a great hourglass shape. I wore it to work and then out to drinks with my girl friends - was such a hit!
review_summary: Super flattering A-Line, great thick fabric, vibrant color.

review_text: The dress does not stretch, but it does have a little give to it. The 2 fit so well, I ended up not even trying the 4 on ( I am usually a 2 or 4 depending on the bust area).  Like all of the other reviews have said, this dress is SHORT! When you are standing it looks great, just be careful where you sit down.  I probably wouldn't rent this dress for a wedding because of how short it gets when you sit down, but for the event I went to I didn't sit down very long so it was fine.  Definitely order a size up for the backup size.  It fits true to size, but a little on the small side.  It really is a fantastic dress. It is so flattering and I got compliments all night.  Photographs well!
review_summary: This was my first RTR experience and it was perfect! I will definitely do it again!

review_text: Wore this dress for a bachelorette party in Vegas... got compliments nonstop!  The color is more pink then silver but it's gorgeous.  The dress is flattering and the sequins just draw the attention straight to you.  You don't have to accessorize too much because the dress pops so much.  Wore with bright pink lipstick and chandelier earrings and everything looked beautiful!
review_summary: The color and sequins are a real showstopper

review_text: The dress was great and the color is beautiful, but beware the cut out when you are sitting!
I might just keep this all winter.... I get compliments on it every time I wear it. So comfortable and fun. The material is very sturdy, I always feel special when I have it on.

I got a size 6r and 8r just in case the dress was too tight, but I ended up wearing the 6r and it fit perfectly. The only problem was length, I'm 5'2" and it was little too long.. Because it was covered in sequins it was also quite scratchy under the arms and on my back when I went to sit down and lean back, Other than it I LOVED it! I got compliments left and right and it made me feel like a princess. My boyfriend couldn't take his eyes off me! I would definitely recommend this dress and I'll more than likely rent this dress again in the future!
review_summary: I wore this dress for my senior prom and it was absolutely perfect! I got compliments ALL night!

review_text: I loved this dress and got complements all night. You will be the center of attention in it - it sparkles a LOT! I loved the way it photographs and the fact that you can rent it, I feel like this is the kind of dress that you want to wear only once! It was perfect for a New Year's eve party in DC. Thank you RTR!
review_summary: Absolutely stunning dress - perfect for New Year's eve!

review_text: The fit was perfect, I feel I did need to pull it up a few times by the end of the night, but it was very comfortable to wear.  I would rent this one again!
review_summary: Received many compliments on this dress!  I was comfortable to wear and looked great!

review_text: I usually wear a four and this dress in a size 4 fit perfectly. The red is darker in person than in the picture. It is more like a maroon or a dark wine color (which I honestly liked better). Highly recommend this dress. Comfortable dancing, felt pretty, received tons of compliments.
review_summary: Perfect dress. Felt comfortable and pretty.

review_text: Loved the dress.  Got LOTS of compliments.  Wore for a rehearsal dinner w/ the chunky pearls I rented also.
review_summary: Dress fits very true to size in every aspect.  Very Comfortable Dress too!

review_text: Very pretty dress. Flattering to the figure. It was a little big on me, but that's because I've been losing weight and overestimated the size, but it still hung very nicely and look radiant. The color is lovely. It's stretchy fabric, sturdy construction. I wasn't hot even though the wedding was outside. I could dance in it. I wore spanx and they didn't show because the hem is nice and low. I paired with nude wedge heels and they looked great. No jewelry needed. The dress is the statement. Lots of compliments from strangers. Made me feel fancy at a very fancy wedding.

This dress was a hit! The color is gorgeous and the fabric is quite thick, and thus forgiving. I found it ran a bit large and also very long. I am 5'6" and typically wear 5" heels and rent a Long. This is the first time I've had an issue with excess length. Got numerous compliments - would rent again.

it is definitely a statement dress.  the way it fit in the chest was interesting/little weird. 

cut out for the waist was just right.
review_summary: Love this dress. super fun. very light and not to tight.

review_text: Very cute and comfy outfit, however it ran a bit large. Since the wasit tied I was still able to make it work, however the extra fabric bunched in the front. The fabric is also a bit heavy true denim not light weight chambray.

Loved the idea of this dress, but overall not for me. The open back was awesome (loved the draping) and a really cool way to show some skin, but that was the only thing that was really working for me. The straps were very thick and tight on my shoulders, and the bust was extremely small - not a problem I've ever had to face before haha! I would hesitate to try this again in a size up for fear of it slipping out of place - was quite low cut, so I wore petals instead of a bra. I unfortunately had to continually adjust while wearing, but I'm sure this would look fabulous on another lady! I definitely recommend sizing up. Still worked for a fun Sunday baby shower, worn with nude heeled sandals.

This dress completely stood out - the colors are fun and the back is amazing! Only problem I had was the shoulders were a little loose and I was scared that they would fall off if I danced too hard! :)
I would say for my torso the dress ran slightly large
review_summary: Sexy Back! Love the splash of colors

review_text: This dress is my favorite RTR - I love it so much that I've rented it twice!  The size 6 fits me like a glove.  I've gotten lots of compliments wearing this especially about the back.  If you've got a fancy sparkly place to go - rent this one!
Admittedly this is not a sexy outfit. But it is one that is universally COOL, hip and fun. I had so much fun in this thing.
review_summary: This romper made me feel happy!

review_text: The dress definitely runs slightly big. I consider myself between a 2 and a 4 and the 2 fit like a glove! The color really popped with the fall colors of New England. I was comfortable and could dance all night. And the dress has pockets!! I paired it with some silver chandelier earrings and black heels. The lace sleeves were slightly snug, but loosened up as the night went on.
so cute, flattering. great for a night out with skinnies and strappy heels!

I'm 5'2, 120 with an hourglass shape.  It falls a bit loose in the midsection and tighter around the hips and thighs  (for me) but stayed in place/didn't ride up and was perfect for work.  It has a tighter fabric underneath.  The knitted design part in the front is stiff and doesn't fold so I realized it would fall open when I bent over (showing my chest) so I'd just be aware of that.  Also, the beaded detail is beautiful but is also on the shoulders so I was careful when carrying bags on my shoulder.  Overall I loved it

The dress fit true to size including being fitted in the waist. The high-low is not too high in the front which makes it appropriate for any occasion. The fabric is high-quality with a slight sheen. Would absolutely rent this one again.
review_summary: Elegant, exquisitely sown in a high-end fabric

review_text: I was a part of a very colorful wedding party!  My friend, the bride, wanted us in a range of colors and patterns for her May wedding.  In a group of 7 bridesmaids with different colored dresses and patterns, my dress definitely still stood out!  I received so many compliments, I did not want to return the dress after the event.  I have a short torso and wide ribcage, so it is important to me to choose dresses that add a little bit more shape and narrows the waist.  I am 5'4" and about 135 lbs, and the size 6 fit like a glove. I highly recommend this dress!  I would purchase this in a heartbeat if I could.
review_summary: The dress stood out among the colorful wedding party!

review_text: It was comfortable and very flattering.
review_summary: I received a lot of compliments

review_text: It hugs around the hips and body really nicely to show all the curves.  I liked the longer dress because I liked that it dragged a little.  It made it seem more elegant and covered my feet.

This dress has a gorgeous, straight-across strapless neckline and is a rich, vibrant magenta. No necklace necessary. Would recommend pairing with gold jewelry (bangles or fun statement ring). Top was a little roomy on me; it probably fits snugly on ladies with larger busts. A wonderful option for engagement party, wedding, or other cocktail attire event. Would rent again.

Coupled with a simple up-do, gorgeous shoes, a clutch and red lipstick, this dress made the perfect outfit for a formal wedding. I was comfortable and stylish at the same time. I could have worn it for another 4 hours without a complaint.
review_summary: Perfect. Flattering. Sophisticated. Comfortable. This dress is everything you want and more.

review_text:
This was my first choice for attending a beach wedding - ironically I fit in with the wedding theme perfectly - but I should've guessed - the brides favorite color is yellow and that's the only reason I wore this dress.  This is not my typical style and I don't usually wear bright colors - but I got SOOOO many compliments.  The dress was a little on the loose side, and up until the day of the wedding I was going to wear my backup (which was a little too formal for a beach wedding) but then my friends talked me out of it and told me this dress looked really great.   PROS: pockets, love the damn pockets - perfect dress for a beach wedding
CONS:  I tend to be a little flatter on top, so if I had brought a padded bra with me or if I naturally had a larger chest then I think this dress would have felt like it fit perfectly.  
One thing I would like to point out, I was under the impression when I rented the dress that this was a backless dress - but it's not (at all).  Completely fine to wear a bra with this dress - no special bra needed.  I would recommend this dress for others, but for me I will probably not rent it again since yellow isn't my color anyway :)

The sequins started rubbing the inside of my arms raw after about 20 minutes. By the end of the night the inside of my arm looked like hamburger meat. It hurt really badly but there was no lasting injury or marks, and everything was fine about 2 hours after taking it off.
review_summary: Looked great, lots of compliments, fit well. Sequins are painful.

review_text: Runs small in the hips, also the ruffles are quite prominent in person
This dress was gorgeous! I received tons of compliments. It was also quite comfortable.
review_summary: Really fun, glamorous dress for charity event!

review_text: The fit was a little large in the bust.  The lacy top had me nervous it would snag but I had no issues.  The dress was comfortable and truly looks like the photo.
review_summary: The dress was perfect for a wedding.

review_text: I ordered the 0R and 2R. The 0 fit better. Dress seems to strech a little after you have it on
review_summary: This dress was gorgeous, form fitting, but not restrictive. I got a ton of compliments!

review_text: I ordered a large, but a medium would have been much better. Beautiful coat, would have loved to see how it would have looked in the right size. A boxier cut, for sure.

I rented this dress for a class reunion party in the fall. The color was great, the fit was snug but not tight, and for me, as a petite woman, it fit perfectly- even the length. There was just enough stretch to make it very comfortable. I wasn't sure what others were wearing, as it was an evening dinner and dance, and this was a great choice - simple, classy and dressy without going overboard. The arm/neck details were a nice touch and I got many compliments.  Initially was not thrilled about the long, exposed, gold zipper in the back, but it felt fine and I wore a nice pair of rose-gold earrings with a pink topaz stone that looked amazing. The size 2 was comfortable and a little bit looser, but would be great for work or an evening work event. I will definitely rent this dress again!
review_summary: Classy, simple dress for evening party

review_text: Absolutely loved this dress. It was perfect for a beach wedding in the Florida heat. Highly recommend.

The last time I used RTR, I wore a size 4 and I weighed 106 lbs. I weighed 8 pounds more this time, but wore my back up Size 2 and it still felt too big. So, definitely size down when ordering. That part aside, it was still a really pretty dress and I felt good in it. I'd give it 5 stars if it fit better.
review_summary: It was a beautiful color of red!

review_text: I wore this on a date. I got plenty of compliments form both men and women. I'm usually a 4 and wore a 4 in a this dress, as I did not have a backup size due to a computer glitch. (Tip: I ordered using my iPhone. I don't think ordering from a mobile devise works as great as doing it from a  computer as I ordered a size 6 for my backup, but when the order completed, it was not in the cart.) The 4 fit like a glove. It would have been perfect except I couldn't take a few steps without the skirt hiking/riding up. I felt self conscious tugging it down continuously. So if you plan to do a lot of walking, dancing, etc., I would advise you to go one size up. I think I would have been more comfortable with a 6. Overall, though, this is a very eye-catching dress. Having gotten several compliments from other women, I think, proves that.

This dress is very pretty, and had I done a better  job at choosing the correct size, it would have been perfect! I usually wear a 4 and got a 6, which was a mistake. It was like a sack on me. Sent it back without wearing, but I may rent again in a smaller size for another occasion.

First, it's definitely grey and red, NOT black. (Still, black shoes are fine.) I loved how it fit! I had to wear a strapless bra since it kind of curves in so much, but it was not a problem at all. It was comfortable and flattering. The material is a little thicker, but it was perfect for an indoor summer party. LOVED it!
So many compliments. Its a great coat for fall/early winter
review_summary: This was a GREAT statement piece! I dressed it down with distressed jeans and a black turtleneck.

review_text: This dress runs very tight in the waist.  Also, I have an average chest size & my bottom half is why I wear a size 6, so the top was too big for me. The darts were sticking out a bit near the armpits, but it wasn't overly noticeable.
review_summary: I rented this dress for a black & white party.  Dress was stunning and earned compliments all night!

review_text: This dress runs true to size but it is possible to size down because the material is stretchy. The material is lighter than expected but holds shape well especially in the skirt. The pattern is not actually embroidered and does not show up as bright as it does on the model. Loved the pattern and comfortable fit. This dress is perfect for a semi-formal event or party and gets lots of compliments.

The dress is beautiful, sexy and perfect for a black tie affair.  I had countless compliments all night. I loved it so much I rented it twice in a few months!  I usually wear a size 8, but i decided to have a more fitted look so I wore a size 6 and it hugged every curve beautifully.  The 8 fit well as well, but I wanted a more fitted sexy look so I went with the smaller size.  I wore a small waist corset underneath for some added curve and to smooth out my stomach.
review_summary: This dress looks amazing!  It hugs every curve and is super flattering.

review_text: What a fun, easy jacket! Great for those cool-ish days and nights. No true pockets but not a huge deal in my opinion. I wanted to keep forever but returned because it's hard to wear a winter coat over and not warm enough to wear alone (brrr Chicago!). Best when a heavier coat is not needed. I'll surely be renting again in the spring!

I liked this dress because it opened up at the waist and left room in the bottom - I have a butt so I like to know that a dress has room for that. I didn't expect that the arms would be so skinny. It was a real struggle to get my arms all the way through the sleeves, but once I zipped up the dress it fit perfectly everywhere else. RTR was out of my backup size 8 and I think that may have gone a little better, but just been larger in the waist. I don't have huge arms, just regular muscles from yoga and light lifting and the sleeves were super tight. definitely for someone with a ballerina-type frame - long, thin arms and legs.
review_summary: Beautiful dress but a little constricting

review_text: It was just perfect! Glad I got my backup (10L).  It was a hit! Will rent it again! This outfit was a hit! Everyone asked where I got it from and I gave the rtr info.

I wanted to wear this for a party. I usually wear a size 4 and I went up to an 8 because I read the reviews. 
It was so short (and I am only 5'4").

This skirt is beautiful ... the gold sequins are subtle and classy (in no way disco-ball). I wore with a black scoop-neck body suit to a formal affair and it was perfect. I received many compliments throughout the night. It does run very small, though. I usually wear a 10 or 12 skirt and the xlrg barely fit. The length was perfect for me, though, and I'm 5'10''. I will rent again.
review_summary: The right way to do sequins

review_text: This dress was amazing! I received so many compliments. The bust fits a little small, but everything else is true to size. Love the fact that this dress has pockets! Amazing color and great length (I'm just about 5'2") and hit mid-thigh. Accessorized with the Nicole Miller Southern Plantation Earrings and Star Light Star Bright Bracelet.
review_summary: First time using RTR and loved it! Such a simple and fast process. Will definitely rent again!

review_text: Fits larger in the body but it's intended to have a roomier fit. Will definitely rent again.
review_summary: Cute flounce hem at the bottom and slight ruffle at the top

review_text: This dress has pockets!! But it also has boning...which can be sharp and uncomfortable after eating. I ended up putting bandaids over the boning on the inside of my dress so they'd stop stabbing me. Overall it's a beautiful and unique dress, but know it's very constricting in the midsection.
review_summary: Received many compliments on this dress during and after the black tie wedding I attended.

review_text: Wonderful sweater, would rent again. I sized down because I wanted to make sure it was cropped enough as I paired it with a pair of very high waisted green pants.
review_summary: This sweater made my outfit complete.

review_text: I am typically a 6/8 and 6 was perfect. 8 would have been too big. I would either get your normal size or one size down.

After my original dress was damaged, I picked this out at the last minute of the few remaining dresses for a May wedding.  I was so nervous because I don't normal wear strapless or yellow.  But  I could not have been happier.  The color is amazing.  Such a bright, cheerful color.  And the textured heavier material saves it from being to casual.  I received so many compliments and the fuller skirt is so fun to dance in.  The pockets let me keep my red lipstick and a camera with me all day and night.

The dress is very well made.  And the boning inside means you will not be pulling it up / adjusting all night (although by hour 13 it was starting to dig in a little...a small price to pay).

If you are on the fence go for it.  You still stand out...in exactly the way every girl hopes.
review_summary: Such a happy, stand out of a dress

review_text: The dress was just a beautiful in person as it was in the picture!  Am so glad it worked for me.
review_summary: I was amazed that it really worked!  So excited to RTR - will do it again for sure!

review_text: This was a GREAT dress for my bachelorette party! I've had issues in the past with some of my rentals running on the shorter side, but this was the perfect length for me. I will note that the sequins were a little more rose gold than I anticipated, but it made me fall in love the dress even more. :)
The fit was outstanding.  I love the peepshow midsection and the slit; it showed enough skin to feel sexy but still be comfortable.
review_summary: Great color, and shows just enough skin!

review_text: The fabric on this was a bit thin - better for a vacation or beach dress than everyday spring dress.
This dress is PERFECT. Beautiful, and so comfortable. I felt amazing wearing it.  I highly recommend people to rent it. I got so many compliments. Definitely a dress to remember.

I am 5'5" 125 lbs and ordered my usual 2. I ordered the 4 as my backup size and was glad I did because I ended up wearing it. The dress was fine through the bust and waist but verrryy tight through the hips and legs. It was very flattering especially if you're going for the figure-hugging look, but it was honestly pretty uncomfortable. That is why I ended up wearing it to the rehearsal dinner instead of the wedding because it would've been hard to move freely and dance. I did get a lot of compliments, though!
review_summary: Rented this for a black tie wedding but ended up wearing it to the rehearsal dinner.

review_text: The colors are varying shades of purples and pinks. It's the same neoprane material that makes a canyon clover dress great - fits wonderful, molds to your body. The skirt is a slight A-line, but it will cling to your hips and stomach a bit. I like the cut, since it makes this fabric more wearable for summer. The straps are large enough that you can wear any type of bra. The dress is somewhat low cut, with 34D breasts they are "out there". Definitely not good for work or conservative environments, but a camisole would fix that. For social outings, this is a very nice dress. I've had a lot of different designer dresses now with unlimited, so I guess I'm a bit jaded, but this isn't a "show stopper". The pattern is different enough to stand out in a crowd though.
review_summary: Fits great - not as hot as other clover canyon

review_text:
Perfect fit. I was concerned about the size since I am not 5'10 and 120lbs, but the 4R fit just as I hoped  for and more. I rec'd so many flattering compliments from so many strangers! Thanks RTR!

Tip, wear high heels for 5'3 and under.
review_summary: I am so glad I listened to a good friend and used RTR!!  I felt wonderful in this dress.

review_text: This dress was perfect. I couldn't have loved it more. It was definitely a knock out and I received compliments all night!

I rented this for a date night with my husband and was pleasantly surprised with how flattering it was. Sometimes with boxy shirts you can loose your shape - but this one was an exception. With the buttons down the front, the stripes and the just sexy enough off the shoulder it ended up being one of my favorite RTR selections. I paired it with boyfriend jeans since it's a bit crisp here now, but I will definitely be looking to rent this again in the summer to pair it with white skinnies & shorts!
I wore this to my birthday with the BM sparkly gold crop top.  I wore the smaller backup size.  When worn at the natural waist, it hits mid calf.
review_summary: So pretty and fun. I felt like a ballerina.

review_text: Wonderful dress. Very comfortable and stylish. The color is vibrant and eye-catching.
Runs small but has a little stretch to it.
review_summary: Very flattering, perfect for our formal charity function.

review_text: The dress ran true to size. The fit was super flattering and flared out a bit at the bottom which made it super girly and fun to dance in!!
review_summary: I rented this dress for my dental school's black and white gala! The dress was absolutely perfect!!

review_text: It was very comfortable & even just a tad big.  The length was perfect with 3 in heels. I received lots of compliments.  The only issue is the front hem kept rolling up.

What a gorgeous winter dress! Wore this to a holiday party and found it to be very comfortable and practical. Firstly, IT HAS POCKETS. USEFUL, glorious pockets. Secondly, it's cozy without being terribly hot. Because of the winter-like pattern of the dress fabric, I picked it for a winter holiday party, which usually means being chilly through the event because your coat over in the coat check. Not this time! Bare shoulders and arms but still comfy- but never too hot or sweaty. The fabric has a good weight to it without being too heavy. The dress just feels substantial. It almost feels like you are just carrying a nice throw/blanket around with you all night. The bottom of the skirt poofed nicely and the bodice fit perfectly. I had my 3rd baby 8 mo ago and am never sure of my size right now, but surprisingly fit into the 10L (170ish lbs and 5'10") but I do not have a big bust or rib cage. Rented a punk rock style statement necklace to tone down the Queen Elsa vibe the dress may give off. Worked out fantastically. I felt wonderful and received many compliments from strangers (which is very nice of them).

This dress fit perfectly, and hugged my body in all the right places. It was comfortable and easy to move in. I have a larger bust and I felt like my chest looked fabulous (not to covered, but not hanging out). My only complaint would be that I had to switch shoes because I was originally wearing shoes that are glittery and they kept sticking to the dress. But other then that, I have no complaints and wish I could have kept the dress forever. Great quality, condition, everything! I would absolutely recommend this dress for anyone who wants to look and feel sexy while staying comfortable.
review_summary: I wore this to my casino themed 30th birthday party

review_text: The fit of this dress runs small. I'm 5"4 135lbs and typically wear a size 6. I ordered a 6 & 8 and the 6 wasn't even close to being able to zip up. Ended up wearing the 8 and it was still snug. I would recommend sizing up with this dress. Cut and color are beautiful and classy. Fabric is thick and hides your flaws. Would love to buy this dress.....
review_summary: Wore this to my friends wedding & received so many compliments on this dress.

review_text: I wore this gown to my husband's army ball! It had the right amount of sass and class to make me feel sexy yet tasteful. I can't even count how many compliments I got when I wore it but a ton of people stopped me and I felt fabulous in it. I originally ordered the size four and the size two as my back up. After my night was over and the dress came off I realized I had worn the two and if fit fine, a little snug but I didn't mind! I was sad to send the beautiful gown back lol! Well worth the rent! I would recommend this gown to any one!
review_summary: This dress was ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS! I felt like a star in it!

review_text: I loved this dress! The fit was great; it was super flattering. The pockets were amazing! It ran true to size. The fabric was thick and luxurious. Would definitely rent again!

I got the size 4, this thing is literally painted on me, and I love it so much. It's hyper sexy while still conservative with the wide straps and square neck line. I have a small bust so I'm able to move my ladies around to create cleavage with this thing if needed/desired. I love the color of this dress, it's truly a stunner. I'm trying to make after work plans so I can go out and have people stare at me in this thing. Gorgeous.
Awesome dress and very flattering.  Lots of compliments.  I will rent again.
review_summary: Great fit, material is awesome fall correctly and not overly bulky.  (Slip needed)

review_text: This dress was definitely too big on me; however, this was a last minute rental and my size wasn't available so I ordered a size up so knew that it was going to be too big. Despite that, I still felt pretty in it, even if I looked huge. It was incredibly comfortable and really stood out! I didn't wear the mystery bling I ordered because it was a bit dressier than the occasion demanded, so I went with my own stuff.
review_summary: Very comfortable for a fun night out

review_text: This top was perfect for everyday- Easy to throw on and super comfortable.
This looked great and provided an extra layer of warmth. Loved it.
I am 5'7/ 5'8 and the dress was rather short on me. I got a 6 for the extra length, which worked perfectly. The color was beautiful for a rehearsal dinner in  FL and I received a ton of compliments.
review_summary: I wore this dress for a wedding rehearsal dinner. It was perfect for the occasion.

review_text: Great fitting-feeling top, the straps on the bra are a little bit of a challenge because there is a keyhole in the front and the back. I had to just sort of manipulate my straps because cross straps or Tstrap in the back shows. Worth wearing in any case soft fabric classicly modern style, feminine. My husband loved it.

This dress has a very nice fit.  The fabric is stretchy, so I suggest going a size down.  I ordered the 2 and the 4 based on other reviews and ended up wearing the 2.  

 I'm 5'0 and the length was not an issue with 3" heels.  

The shoulders were a little big, but that was easily fixed with a safety pin.
Excellent fit if you're a curvy woman.  This lays nicely across the bust, pulls in tight at the waist and flows across the hips.  The day I wore it I got compliments all day.
review_summary: Loved this one so much I bought it!

review_text: I wore this dress to my fiance's Black Tie work Christmas party.  Being 5'10" I always worry about dresses being long enough, but this one still grazed the floor even with 3" heels.  I'm a fan of anything off-the-shoulder, so naturally I loved this dress.  It fit true to size, was super comfortable, and I felt like a million bucks in it!  When my fiance saw me in it he said "WOW!  You look incredible!"  These aren't words he says often, so I'll give credits to the dress.  Considering renting it again for a Black Tie wedding in February.

The color was beautiful and the dress was very comfortable. It was nice and thick for a cold office. It was pretty tight in the arms and bust so consider a size up. Great for spring and summer if you are indoors with AC all day, but want to get into the season with some color.
review_summary: Solid work dress with a fun color

review_text: Gorgeous, billions of compliments.  This was originally my back up dress.  But it was soo stunning and classy I had to wear it.  I liked the 12L on me because it showed off my figure, but also had a really nice hang. the size 10 probably would have fit a little better. I am an athlete, have an athletic build short torso.  wore two inch heels and the dress dragged a little but not too bad. make sure to get or make a backless bra or something.  Loved this dress, get it!
review_summary: Loved it! Wore it to prom

review_text: I normally wear a size 8 dress, went up to a 10 on this because the 8 was slightly snug under the bust, but my rib cage is a little bit wider than most.  I loved the length as well, since I'm  tall many dresses come up short.    I would highly recommend this dress!

I didn't end up wearing this dress. It was super cute but did not fit me the right ways - I felt like it might have been a bit inappropriate for the wedding I rented it for. The "v" in the front was low enough that, with a bra I had great cleavage (not grandparent-appropriate), but without a bra the dress was too big on the top. Maybe for a different kind of formal event where there are less family members. Also the color is really bright. If I rent this dress again I'd probably try out the blue!
review_summary: The fabric is soft and overall the dress seemed comfortable. Didn't wear it, though!

review_text: It is stunning! Very picturesque. I wore with high-waisted pants and it hung out perfectly. Not too long to ruin the line.

This dress was perfect! I had wanted something I would be conformable in to go see a Broadway play with my girlfriends, and this dress was great! It was very flattering on me, I just had a baby not to long ago and still have the pouch, and this dress made me feel pretty again! It does run a little on the larger size, I have been in a size 14 post baby and I rented a 10 after reading the reviews and it fit perfect for me, but I don't think you are supposed to really "tighten" the strings on it, I think the dress is meant to be a little lose. I would totally rent this again!
This is so cute and lightweight. You'll want to wear it everyday! It is a bit see-thru though so I wore it as a coverup over my swimsuit.

I ordered the 4P (my usual size) and the 6P as a backup (in case I overate the whole weekend and needed the extra room :P)  The 4P fit great and with my platform wedges, they were the perfect length.  I suppose if it was too long, I would've tried to tape up the bottom.  The chiffon is beautiful and came in perfect condition.  The bust is very rigid and felt solid the whole night.  The pink color really stands out but still feels classy and appropriate for the early evening wedding/reception.  Someone asked me where I got it because she said that it was what she had in mind for her bridesmaids next year.  I'd be ecstatic if my bride chose this as a bridesmaid dress!  It could totally work for that or just for any semi-formal/formal event you want to rock.  Dress it up or down with hair and accessories.
review_summary: Great floor length dress that really stands out in pictures

review_text: This dress fit perfectly. I'm usually a size 6 and it fit very well.
review_summary: This dress was perfect for an early spring wedding at a vineyard. I received tons of compliments!

review_text: This was SO comfortable.  No need for Spanx or any other special underwear/shapewear.  I had a ton of compliments.  Perfect for a long night at work when you need to look put together and dressy but don't want to feel dressed up.
review_summary: I borrowed it for work on a cold day.

review_text: The dress arrived on time but wrinkled easily. I didn't realize it until I opened the bag 20 minutes before my rehearsal, which was too late. I kept posing on an angle in hopes to hide the wrinkles. I wore the 6 instead of the 8.
review_summary: I wore this for my rehearsal dinner. Very classy.

review_text: This was very cute on, but not practical. It has hooks up the back so you have to have someone else to get you in and out of it. I didn't feel like dealing with that all night, everytime I had to use the restroom. Super cute though!!
perfect dress. perfect fit - comfortable. classic.

Gorgeous dress, even more beautiful in person. It did run a little big, because for me it was a little loose around the waist but everything else fit perfectly, i am 5'3" and got the 4R. Also loved that it has pockets.

I thought the dress was a bit large but as it turns out the medium was just fine. I usually wear a small. I didn't have too much trouble with the sleeves and the sequence. I felt comfortable in it and every said I look beautiful. It was dressy enough for me to be sexy and professional for the evening.
review_summary: I wore this for a web series screening event that I wrote and produced.

review_text: It fit true to size the length was great for me  but I'm short, the color was amazing but the material was very heavy and i was in 106 degree heat so I would have preferred something a little more light wieght. It would be great for an indoor or outdoor wedding
review_summary: The dress was great I received a lot of compliments on it and it was perfect for a summer wedding

review_text: The fit was amazing, perfect length for a charity gala and I got comments ALL night!! I would definitely recommend for a formal event. It was super comfortable as well!

I ordered this size in the S and M because the XS was out (I would have guessed that I wore a small, and others said it ran large). It fit a little loose in the tummy area, but fit perfect in the sleeves and hips. Even though I would have liked it to be a bit tighter, it was a gorgeous dress. I got tons of compliments that night and on my picture. I even had a friend several months later ask to borrow the dress.
