Dress was very nice and form fitting. The strap in the back was a different material and in no way was it going to clasp on. Hugs your hips and length was a little long for me but still in good taste.
review_summary: Nice dress. Classy and sexy at the same time.

review_text: This was awesome!!! I got so many compliments on it, and my husband could NOT take his eyes off me!! It definitely will show off the girls, so if you dont want that, dont get this outfit!! The ONLY negative, and it is why I did not give it 5 stars, was that the boning was annoying and did poke at me periodically. But it wasn't that troublesome to affect my night. I am tall, and it worked great! Fabric is light, not heavy. The seaming/ruching across the stomach is very forgiving - which is nice. Would love to rent this again!
review_summary: Shows off the "girls" and makes you feel tres CHIC!

review_text: The fit on the bust/shoulders seemed a little tight, but it's better described as snug. The fabric/material is just stretch enough for comfort, and worked great for lots of dancing. Very comfortable fit in that sense. I wore a 2 and I'm normally a 2, but it does run a little small. I'd say anyone with more than 34B might find this too tight up top.
review_summary: Looks great! Got lots of compliments, perfect for a springtime bay wedding.

review_text: It was a great dress.  Received many compliments.
You can dress this up or down.  Great for vacation or around the town leisure
review_summary: tons of compliments. Very nice dress

review_text: Dress was perfect for hiding my tiny bump.  I was a little disappointed because i thought the rouching on the body of the dress.  Instead they were attached by being sown in two different areas.  The slit was a bit obnoxious when sitting at the table and looking at all the wedding activities taking place.  This is really a standing dress.
review_summary: I am pregnant and this dress hid my growing belly.

review_text: I adored this dress. It's a little thin but it looked effortless for a Christmas party. And the color is lovely!

This dress is beautiful, elegant & romantic w/ a touch of sexy. I highly recommend it! I wore the MR w/ heels that were 3 1/2 inches - I am tall so the dress came off the ground about an inch more that I would have liked. Other than that it was the perfect dress for a perfect evening!
This dress fit perfectly and I got so many compliments. Sexy but not over-the-top and comfortable too! Highly recommended for any formal affair.
I usually wear a size 12 and went with the large - however it ran big.

I wore this dress to my bridal shower and absolutely fell in love with it the moment we zipped it up! I felt everything a bride should feel, I felt sexy, classy and beautiful! The dress was the perfect length, easy to move around in and sit in with out the fear of showing off something I didn't want seen (you know, the unpleasant spanks). I started receiving the compliments the minute I walked into the room! A YES for sure with this amazing dress!

This was my first dress rental from RTR and I was very pleased. The dress itself is understated, so not a good choice if you want to stand out from the crowd. I received several compliments--but the best one was from the bride herself because she is a fashionista! She said she had rented her dress for the rehearsal dinner from RTR, too! A couple of notes to share...The dress runs small (in my opinion) because it is so fitted in the bodice and hip area. I usually wear a size 6, but wore the size 8 and it was perfect. You need to buy a backless/strapless bra for this dress because the ivory lace back and inset on the front are see through. It's a sweet sexy detail, and you don't want bra straps showing! The color is a lovely muted blush rose color, and it blended perfectly with my daughters' dress (in photo). I wore this dress with Jessica Simpson nude platform pumps. Overall, it was a nice choice for this wedding event.
review_summary: Elegant and classy dress for special occasion

review_text: I wear this at to work over a blouse and look put together while feeling comfortable.

This was really easy to wear and got lots of compliments. If you want it to be form fitting you might want to size down as it has plenty of stretch. I paired it with a black turtleneck, tights and flats.
I rented this for a bachelorette party. The side cut-outs are super flattering, and the jumpsuit is very comfy. Tempted to buy this..

I was a little disappointed when I received this dress. I ordered it to attend an opera auction, and when it came I almost went and purchased a dress. I had ordered an 8L and a 10L. I am only 5’7 but I usually wear at least a three inch heel with no platform. I ended up wearing the 10L even though I typically wear an 8, because the 10 hung better. I was unimpressed with the fabric, which I felt detracted from the quality of the dress. It was a slinky mesh material, so you could see every bump underneath it. I didn’t wear any undergarments because of that. I didn’t feel the dress was overly flattering on my body type. I have a wide rib cage, broad shoulders, big chest, and small waist. Despite how uncomfortable I felt in the dress or how I felt it looked on me, I received more compliments on that dress than I have ever before on any purchase.  I had men coming up to me saying the dress was stunning. The auctioneer referred to me as the “stunning lady in red” after I won a bid. Women approached me to tell me how gorgeous I looked. One woman said I looked like Anjelica Huston and another said Jessica Rabbit. Bottom line is the dress was a show stopper and very glamourous. It is also very comfortable to wear.
review_summary: Hangs beautifully due to slinky mesh material...

review_text: The size L fit like a size 8 would.  The size M was more like a 4/6. I was a little worried about the cleavage showing too much, so I pinned the shoulders to my bra.  So sparkly.  Would rent again.  Customer service was great!

Love the two zippers - upzip the bottom if you are a place to keep your coat on. Fits a little larger because it's supposed to. It's light weight but quite warm; I was shocked. Definitely could not wear it inside but great to drape around your legs in a cold movie theatre.
review_summary: warm and cute. perfect for fall date.

review_text: This dress was my original choice but ended up wearing my backup style due to the length. I am 5'10" and pregnant, so the front pulled up slightly due to my bump. With this dress, I would have had to wear completely flat shoes and it still would have been about an inch short of hitting the ground. The zipper was extremely difficult to close around the middle band. Pretty dress, just too short for me.

Great color and print. I wasn't crazy about the fabric though.  I rented as part of unlimited so it was just something for everyday. I wouldn't rent it for a special event but definitely cute at the office and running around on a Saturday.
Great dress for a large bust

I really loved wearing this dress.  It was very flattering and comfortable too.  I am tall (5'10"), which I think worked better for this dress since it hits mid-calf on me.  I got lots of compliments and ended up referring a few people to RTR.
Had to do a bit of tugging on the hemline, and the right sleeve was a bit tighter than the left, but overall a nice dress.  Great, bright color, and I really liked the neckline (front and back).
review_summary: Tight, but the rouching smoothed out any lines

review_text: We went to Riveria Maya for our honeymoon, and I wore this the night we went to the fancier restaurant at our resort. My husband loved it! It's such a fun and flattering dress, will definitely rent again. It is fairly snug around the chest.
Flattering Fit - casual but able to dress up or down! Comfortable.
review_summary: For the red carpet premier of Meryl Streep's movie Ricki & The Flash! Perfect dress for the event!

review_text: The dress was very sexy! I got plenty of compliments the night of the banquet. It was well except for the bust area; it was a bit loose on me. The material was comfortable and the black lace shows off the body curves very well. I was really happy with this dress!

I wore this to my holiday party and it was perfect! I got so many compliments. The dress was fitted but not too tight; it flattered all of the right places. I am  5'6", 145lbs, 36D and self conscious about my tummy bulge and I felt very confident in this dress!
review_summary: I wore this to my holiday party and it was perfect! I got so many compliments.

review_text: I ordered the 16 and the 18. The 18 was a little big on the top so I went with the 16 and with Spanx it wasn't too tight in the stomach, hips. It is a heavy dress but so elegant and you just feel special wearing it. The skirt twirls out great when you are dancing. Would rent this dress again for formal occasion.
review_summary: This dress is so much nicer than it looks on the screen. I got so many compliments on it.

review_text: I really liked this dress and so did my date. It's super stretchy and comfy, but even the XS was quite big on me. I could still wear it, but I wish it came in an XXS for a more form-fitting silhouette. Very forgiving style for any body type though (or if you are eating a lot at dinner - haha). The gold pattern is subdued but cute. Easy to accessorize. Unfortunately no photo but this is a cute, versatile LBD for fall/winter!

This gown is very simple to don and to disrobe. It's very fitted in the bodice. To avoid zipper battles, I sized up (lesson learned from previous Badgley Mischka gowns). The chiffon flowed with my movements despite being floor length. I'm still receiving compliments. In a sea of basic black gowns, be prepared to stand out -- beautifully.
review_summary: This dress added the pop of color to my black tie event.

review_text: I fit the lower portion of the XS dress, but the top was too small. So I wore the S size.  It fit in the top but was slightly too big in the skirt. It worked well enough. If I owned the dress, I'd have the skirt portion taken in a bit. I am fairly large breasted (34C), and I think anyone larger might have a hard time fitting this dress. Otherwise, it was a dream! I'd suggest a nude colored strapless bra that doesn't ride too far up under the arms. Beautiful dress that I was very tempted to buy!
review_summary:
This dress is so unique, and people loved it! 
I received so many compliments.

review_text: This dress ran a little small on me. I typically wear a four, but definitely needed the six. Glad I got the back-up size. The six fit like a glove, and doesn't have any stretch. The dress is beautiful and I received tons of compliments. The quality, fabric, god embroidery, and tulle skirt detail were all wonderful.
I wore this dress to a bridal shower in March and it was awesome.  There's a little bit of stretch which made it so comfortable to wear all day.  I can't wait to rent it again!

There are no words for how much I fell in love with this coat.  The description does not mention that it is fully reversible, which was the best part!  I wore it with the mustard side out, so the navy showed along the collar and the cuffed sleeves.  I got so many compliments - plus with the bit of flare at the hips, the coat looked fabulous with both skinny pants and dresses. The weight of the wool jacket could not have been any better for chilly winter days in Texas.   Will rent again - whenever cold weather arrives again!
Definitely a bit short, but the overall fit was true to size- felt like a million bucks!
review_summary: Perfect dress for a gatsby  party!!

review_text: This is a fabulous everyday sweater to go with jeans, black skirt or leggings.  It came new with tags!!  I love when that happens.  Would definitely rent this one again.

This dress is literally amazing!  I wore it in Cabo at a resort and people complemented me all night.  I didn't take a picture in it and am kicking myself for that!  It is so flattering.  I am 5'4" and 125 with an athletic build.  I will rent this over and over!

The dress was a hit. I was looking for something dramatic and elegant -- and that's exactly what I got.  The only drawback was that the fabric of the inner skirt bunched up around me -- achem -- sizable butt. Other than that, it was perfect.
review_summary: Thoroughly enjoyed seeing my classmates get drunk and liberally bid at an auction.

review_text: This was my first RTR dress and I loved it. I'm on the shorter, ~curvier~ side, and was looking for something colorful, cute, and conservative-ish for a pretty traditional church wedding. I love that this dress has a high neckline so I didn't have to worry about unwanted cleavage - sometimes you want the cleav, and sometimes you're in a church with a bunch of people you don't know and their grandmothers. The dress is comfortable, and the color is pretty and bright without being obnoxious. As another user mentioned, you will want a racerback bra (or no bra if you can), as the front of the dress cuts in a bit and the sides of my bra sometimes peeked through. The dress has those handy straps inside to hold your bra straps in, but there is a slight risk of side-bra exposure. Not terrible, but something to be aware of. Overall, I loved this dress and would rent again.
review_summary: Lovely color - sweet, kinda unique dress

review_text: Fun and flowing.  Need to wear something underneath for work.
review_summary: Loved it!  Nice material!  Great for work and work events!

review_text: This dress was amazing, the only thing I would warn ladies about is that it's super short.  Be sure to have a pair of sturdy knickers on!
review_summary: I rented this dress for a Las Vegas trip - the dress is a true "party dress"! So fun and flattering!

review_text: This was a dress I wore comfortably to work and social gatherings. Pretty simple and good for all occasions. The shoulders added the right touch of flair to make the dress not boring.
review_summary: Every day dress with a bit of shoulder flair

review_text: The fabric was a little thicker/stiffer than I expected from the pictures.

LOVE this little black dress! its a thicker stretchy material that even hid bra lines (big win in my book). the ruffle sleeves add just enough flare to feel dressier than just a plain black dress. you can see a bit of your bra at the armhole so make sure you wear a black bra. great dress, would definitely rent again or buy!

Pros: not too revealing
Cons: a little itchy
review_summary: The dress was perfect for a bachelorette party! So many compliments!

review_text: Beautiful color and loved the bow detail in the back.
review_summary: I wore this to a business event in Paris. It was perfect!

review_text: I am very petite, and with heels the regular was just the right length. I wished it was a tiny bit tighter in the waist but it still was gorgeous. It was not nearly as heavy as I thought it would be and didn't feel so fragile that sequins were going to constantly come off. Amazing dress!
review_summary: It was so stunning! I had the most compliments of the night! Such Hollywood glam!

review_text: This outfit will definitely brighten your day and not for wallflowers. It is BRIGHT, but the silhouette is very classy. The pants run really long. I made it work for my 5' frame with some heels, and fashion tape but it was a pain getting the temporary hemming right. More ideally suited for someone tall. The crotch area also looked a little funky because of my height but the solid color hid it well that it's only noticeable to the wearer. The breakup of the top vs the pants also makes it super flattering, unlike more onesie-type jumpsuits.

I loved the material in this top, as it was very high end.  But the white part is see through and very white so it does not match any other shade of white besides pure white.  Normally, I am a size medium on the top for almost everything but the medium was a little too big in the shoulders and, sadly, the small was too small.
review_summary: Love this top but it is a little big and see through.

review_text: Love love love this dress. I wore it to an art show opening and I felt sexy, powerful and confident. The ruffle hem adds a fun little detail. This dress is very structured, so I sized up one size, but it hugs your curves great.
review_summary: I was a pop of color in a sea of black

review_text: Fit was great.  I am not busty but still used dress tape to be safe.  I got so many compliments!  This was my first Rent the Runway experience and it was so easy and I was very happy with the results.
review_summary: This dress was perfect for the party I attended which was dressy but not black-tie.

review_text: Great for someone with a small bust because it is nearly impossible to wear a bra with it. I loved it and got a ton of compliments on it!
review_summary: Very unique and the colors are great!

review_text: Wore with black booties for a fall floral look. The dress fit well and was very flattering.
Nice rental. Hides the extra holiday weight well.

I rented this for a brunch event, but it arrived too late.  So I ended up wearing it to dinner and then again to work the next day.  I got lots of compliments at work.  The material is thick and flattering.  It was on the smaller side of a size 6, but looked good since it is A-line.  I would rent again.

I ordered the 2L as a backup size because I am usually a 4 or 6 in dresses due to my 34DDD bust. The 4L was about four inches longer than the 2L which you can see still hit the floor even though I was wearing four inch heels (not pumps).  The 4L also came without a zipper pull on top so I contacted customer service and decided to wear the 2L. The material has stretch so it hugs even the straightest of figures, I do not really have hips and my butt is fairly small, but it looked cute (I don't have a picture) I loved that I could wear a normal bra and thong with this dress. The material is high quality so it is not see through and is heavy enough that I don't recommend wearing it in the summer sun, however it is the perfect weight for inside events! I was able to dance all night, sit comfortably, and breathe in this dress without it stretching out. I paired it with sparkly drop earrings, a center French braid and slicked back pony tail up-do, and a sparkly bracelet to keep it simple. I wore lace up heels with laser cut-outs that peeked out of the back slit when I walked and danced.
review_summary: This dress was perfect for the formal gala I attended. Definitely recommend!

review_text: Loved this dress! I actually wore the looser-fitting size 4 to work the day before the wedding since it arrived early, and the tighter 2 to the wedding itself. It was perfect - classy, yet sexy. The dress came to just above my knees, would've liked it a little bit shorter, but was still able to keep a little sexiness with the "optional" cleavage!  Was fitted in the ribs and looser in the hips for me. Great rental!
review_summary: Perfect for a country club wedding!

review_text: Loved the dress and overall fit, but my chest was a little too big so my boobs were spilling out of the top.  Ended up not wearing it, but highly recommended :)
review_summary: Great dress for girls with a smaller chest

review_text: The perfect rental, super unique and very memorable so you could never wear it twice. It runs very short but fits great.
review_summary: Perfect for a wedding or cocktail party

review_text: Received many compliments on this dress. Fits snug, and it's a thick material so it was flattering for being a tight dress. Very nice dress I was sad to let it go.

This top was great. I got it for a concert and loved it.  The material is very thick and flattering.  The only downfall was that it would not stay off my shoulder, i had to constantly pull it down.  But overall, i loved it.

worn for a masquerade dinner and it was perfect! it wld go better with a more fitted dress instead of the poofy one i had on, but it still worked to pull the look together. the pockets were a great and very helpful throughout the evening and the cape actually kept me warm in 50 degree weather. i'm typically btwn a 2 and a 4 and have rather broad shoulders so i wld recommend someone smaller get an XS. even if you're a 4 and narrow, get the XS. NOTE - there are no buttons or zippers in the front so it stays open

It is nice quality and very warm. I wore it for Thanksgiving dinner in Park City but it was pretty big for an XS. It literally almost hit my knees it was so long. I am 5'2 and 100lbs. I loved it if it had just been a little smaller OR if you don't mind it being super long it would be ok. I felt weird in such a long one though.
review_summary: It is cute - and warm - but I am 5'2 and 100lbs and I swam in this! It is super long.

review_text:
Negatives first. Top was pretty tight and didn't allow me to wear a real bra. I opted for the Nu bra. Zipper was next to impossible! Definitely not something you can do yourself. 

Other than that, it was so pretty and comfortable and very lady like. i paired it with nude strappy sandals and got many compliments.
review_summary: Pretty dress for a formal spring dinner

review_text: I wore this to our schools gala that was "safari" themed. Paired it with a think gold bangle (also RTR) and BAM! I loved the simplicity of this dress but it still had the wow factor. The back is stunning! I am 5'4" and it was a perfect length.
I loved this dress!  So many compliments!!
review_summary: This dress was incredible!  So comfy and a standout in a sea of black dresses!

review_text:
Definitely size down!  I am 5'5", 145/150lbs and a 34DDD.  I rented the 4 and the 6 based on past reviews.  The 4 fit but was very tight in the chest and the seams were visible through the material which was very noticeable.  I wore the 6 to prevent this and the 6 was a little big in the shoulders but worked.  I am very happy that I got both sizes.  Normally, I would wear a size 8.  I put a skinny black belt with it and I received numerous compliments.  My husband asked if it was possible to buy the dress.  :)  
Enjoy this dress!  It is a lot of fun to wear!
Too tight in the chest, had to pin it to keep my 36DDs in check.

I rented this as a back up dress for NYE but ended up wearing a different dress. I didn't like this dress for two reasons - 1. the back is completely different than what is pictured - it's just an opaque mesh back with a zipper - not the buttons/open back pictured and it's also much longer. My friend ended up wearing the dress and she is very tall - approx 5' 9" and it was almost knee length on her. We ended up folding the dress under so it would be a little (4 inches) shorter. Otherwise it was a nice dress and the fit was good - it's just a lot more conservative than the photo shown.
review_summary: Loved this dress but it gets three stars because it was not what is pictured

review_text: This jumpsuit is gorgeous. It runs a bit short so a long length is probably necessary for anyone over 5'7". They did not have my backup size 12 available to ship and the 10 was just a bit too tight to be comfortable all night so I did not end up wearing it. I would definitely love to try the 12 on though. It would probably be a perfect fit.
review_summary: I didn't end up wearing this

review_text: Fits true to size, very comfortable, can wear a strapless bra with it and has pockets! Love the pockets! Paired it with the Kate Spade Dress the Part Fan Clutch. Would buy both these items to keep if I had more events to wear it to.
review_summary: Very flattering dress, wore for Valentine's Day dinner

review_text: I rented this dress for Thanksgiving dinner out with my family. I loved the length and color. The back detail and full length zipper set it apart from a regular pencil dress. While both the M and L fit, I felt like the L made more sense since I was going to be stuffing my face all night. I did find the armpit area to be a little tight but that's because I have a very broad chest/shoulder area. The only downside was that my hair was constantly being caught in the zipper, which reaches all the way to the top of the turtleneck in back.

The dress was very comfortable to wear, fit quite well except it runs a bit large, which made a portion of the zipper bunch at the middle of the back of the dress. 
Very slenderizing, comfortable, and classic option.
review_summary: Was a fabulous gown to wear to a black tie event.

review_text:
I received a 4 and a 2 in the dress and wore the 2. The 2 fit perfectly. It's a little shorter than it looks in the photos, and there's absolutely no give to the fabric. I had to remember not to lean over too far and was a little uncomfortable with how high it rode when I sat. The neckline is also a little lower than it looks in the photos, but with the cut and the lining, I wasn't afraid of busting out.

That said, the dress is easy to accessorize and very fun. I donned my trusty nude heels and a chunky gold bracelet for the wedding I attended. I received a lot of compliments, too! Halfway through the night, I realized the dress has pockets. I didn't have anything to put in there, but I did show them off to my friends.
review_summary: Cute dress that can be played up or down

review_text: I am a little busty and was able to wear this top with a regular bra which I love. I go between a size 4-6 and the Medium was perfect for me.
review_summary: I wore this top to a friends birthday party and also on a dinner date and it was perfect!

review_text: For me, the fit could have been a little tighter in the chest, but it wasn't baggy at all. I wore 4'' heels and the length was perfect. It was so comfortable, easy to walk around and dance it (including tromping through a park and jumping around a lot).
review_summary: I got so many compliments on this dress, it was comfortable and easy to wear all night.

review_text: I did not actually end up wearing the dress.  I have a very long torso and the defined waist just hit too high up on my rib cage.  The color was bright and beautiful and i received the dress in perfect condition.  However it just wasn't the right style for my body and was lucky I had a back-up dress!
The color is darker in person. Great dress for a rehearsal dinner!

The dress fit really well. I'm usually a 2 and needed a 4 for more athletic legs. The only issue was the hanging straps kept falling down. An adhesive dot would be perfect to hold them up though. Overall, a great dress that I would definitely recommend!
review_summary: I wore this to a friend's wedding and everyone loved it! A great evening, and outfit!

review_text: Would definitely wear this brand again.
The bust does run large and since I am large in that area , fashion tape and a pin were necessary so I wouldn't flash everyone. It was very long which was great for me since I am tall.

This dress is adorable. It fits tight enough on the top to be cute and flares out in a way that is very flattering for an hourglass shape. I found the neckline to be the perfect v neck depth as well. My only complaint is that this dress is very thick. I thought I'd be able to wear it in to Spring with unlimited, but I think its too warm for that. Would rent again!
Very comfortable, beautiful dress. Received lots of complements, particularly on the back. Very glad I rented it!!!!

I can't rate this dress highly enough- it's a true show-stopper. The amount of compliments I received was crazy, but even more gratifying was how amazing I FELT in the gown. The only other dress I've ever felt so beautiful wearing was my wedding gown. 

The bust on it was a bit big, but it was a simple fix for me, where I simply basted a couple of loose stitches on the inside, which were easily removed before I sent the dress back. Or someone without sewing skills, a padded bust cup insert would have been another good solution. 

The dress was understandably very wrinkled when it arrived, but was easy to steam/iron for a perfect look. 

Another "pro" for this dress is that it's so stunning, you really don't need flashy accessories to complete the look. Strappy, nude heels and a nice pair of earrings are all you need. 

The dress is comfortable to wear, and light as a feather, so even on a hot summer night would be a great choice. 

I literally can't say enough positive things about wearing this dress. LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!
review_summary: Dancing all night in this amazing dress!

review_text: The pockets are great. The dress runs a little big. I would get one size down. I would rent this again ... I got so many compliments!
review_summary: Great color! Makes a statement! Super comfortable ... has pockets! I felt gorgeous and comfortable!

review_text: I received many compliments on this dress. The color and style were a great match. The dress fit well, the bottom band was a little bit tight so not ideal for a ton of movement but I was still able to dance the night away.
review_summary: Loved this dress, wore it to a wedding in September!

review_text: It wore the smaller of the size for a tighter fit. The 42 fit well, but looked more shift dress.
review_summary: Everyone loved my dress. Randos came up to me to compliment the dress on it's color.

review_text: The jumper was a little too short in the torso for me, and as a result, the crotch tugged. Luckily I was traveling with a friend who is shorter than me. She borrowed the jumper and looked great!
review_summary: Fit was a little snug, espcially for people with long torsos

review_text: Material was very comfortable and the stripes gave it such an interesting element
review_summary: Totally flattering fit which can be tricky with white

review_text: Just as other reviewers suggested, it was much more fitted than appears in the photo. While normally a size 4, I ordered a 6 and 8, as folks said it runs tight around the hips. The 6 was perfection. Overall a wonderful experience!

Flirty, cute, and pretty comfy. Definitely is a bit heavier and shorter than it looks (see other reviews), but I wore it in southern Spain and it was still easy/not too hot. Makes your shoulders look amazing, great color, and can be dressed up or down.

The fit of the dress was pretty true to size. I like dresses that have a tighter fit up top, but usually with that it means that it is hard to move around. With this dress, however, even with it being tight, it was still easy to move around! The only issue I had with this dress was that the zipper was a little messed up so it took a little bit of time to get on, but other than that it was great. The only thing I would mention is it was just long enough for my feet to be covered in flats, so if you like heels, your feet might show a bit.
review_summary: I wore this at a formal banquet and have never received so many compliments for a dress before!

review_text: Great fit. Comfortable. Perfect for work. Skirt is lined to so don't worry about the light fabric being see-through.

I was thrilled I could wear a regular bra with the dress.  The photo appears to have a very low back however it doesn't.  I wore 4" heels and the length was perfect.  Definitely a WOW dress if you are looking to make a statement.
review_summary: The dress looks amazing on however order the size smaller as a back up.

review_text: Color is very bright and fun. Material is a bit thick, so it can hide some imperfections if needed. I have a large bust and did not wear a bra. I felt pretty comfortable with it. Pattern is fun and different.

Gorgeous color and the detailing makes it a very special A-line dress. Compliments throughout the night. Worked very well for my fiance's MBA program holiday party. Runs a little large in the chest; I'm usually a size 6 or 8 and probably could have fit in the 6.
review_summary: Gorgeous color; perfect for professional holiday party

review_text: The jacket was actually pretty heavy, perfect for Fall weather. I liked it, I should have sized down, it was drowning me just a bit.
review_summary: I liked this for an every day look.

review_text: Great LBD. Loved all my photos in it. 4 stars because I wish it was a little tighter in the bust. The straps fell to the sides on me a few times. I am not small chested but also not big- I am a B/C therefore I should be the perfect fit for it. I went braless- fabric is thick enough to hide everything for the most part. There is no stretch in the dress so this could be a little risky.
review_summary: Great thick fabric, fits true to size (for the most part).

review_text: by design, its missing the last bottom at the bottom. i often found my self flashing people. quite embarrassing. you'll need to have a safety pin readily available for this one. also, the buttons in general are set apart. have another pin for your breast area, if you are large breasted, you will have a gap here, too.

Perfect dress for a winter wedding I attended. Unique! I loved wearing it and it fit great. It's a little roomy, but that's the style. I'm pretty short so a pair of 3 1/2 inch heels complimented it perfectly. This was my first RTR rental! I'm hooked.
I am usually a Medium but I ordered a small as back up and it fit perfectly. I was able to wear a strapless bra, it was super light and comfortable

The dress fit like a glove and with my large bust line, it actually make it appear proportional to my body which was amazing!! I paired this with a pair of dove grey strappy sandals, gunmetal crystal chandelier earrings and a bold fuschia lip. 
The dress was so amazing, my dad insisted on buying it for me so that I could wear it over and over.
review_summary: I got endless and repetitive compliments on this dress all night!!

review_text: It fit very well! It shows off the legs wonderfully and is a very forgiving fit.
review_summary: I got tons of compliments on this dress! It fit true to size. Shows off the legs

review_text: The material had some stretch, but it is definitely a form fitting dress. It was very comfortable. The only issue I had was that the straps were VERY long. Several inches needed to be pinned for the top of the dress to stay up. The dress is definitely lower cut, but was appropriate once the straps were pinned.
review_summary: I wore this dress to a black tie wedding.

review_text: Loved this dress - wish I could keep it! Was definitely tight but 1 size above normal dress size fit well.  The cutout is nice, but the dress also looked great pulled up to have more coverage.  Would definitely rent again!

Received this dress in my back up size of 20W because the dress I originally ordered (Adriana Papel Sip and See Sheath) was not available. Even tho my original dress fit in the size 18, I went with this one because I loved it so much!! It was a bit large - definitely could have gone with the 18 in this model - but as part of the wedding I attended required us to sit on the floor, I decided the larger size might be a bit more comfortable anyway. It also ran a bit long on me, but that's typical as I'm only 5'3. I got TONS of compliments on how flattering the color was! I would definitely recommend this! I'm already considering ordering it in a size down for a future event :)
I'm ordered a size 6 to be safe but could have totally worn a size 4. Very flattering dress.
review_summary: I received so many compliments with this dress! I'd definitely recommend this dress!

review_text: I loved the dress, very cute, shiny fabric, but not overdone. However, the top fitted ok but  even considering the skirt is made to bluff out, it was really oversized for me in spite of having somewhat wide hips.
review_summary: Lovely dress! very wide at the hips

review_text: Fabric was a bit on the heavy side but other than that it was very comfortable to wear.

Ok, this dress is stunning. The fabric could not be prettier (it's a neoprene material, by the way). The pros are exactly how beautiful it is, that it is really warm for winter, and it has an overall very flattering fit. It is rather short by the way, so dark thighs may be a necessity. It has some cons though. The first one is that it has a weird fit in the arms. The opening between shoulder and arm is rather large, but then the fabric compresses the arm itself. So, it accommodates a thicker arm around the shoulder, but not at the biceps area. This was annoying, and I felt pretty uncomfortable wearing it because of that. Two other cons, which are no big deal: the sleeves are really long. It's ok for wearing it standing up, but if you need your hands at all you will have to bring the sleeves up, which is not very easy to do with this dress, and also loses part of  its charm. The second is that the dress is warm indeed, so you will feel hot if you are either walking a lot, dancing or just being at a warm enough venue. One thing which may interest some: I was 6 months pregnant when I wore it, and it does not compress the belly at all. I was quite comfortable there in spite of the bump, my discomfort was all because of the arms.

Runs small. Loved this top. Was disappointed that it did not come like it is in the photo online. I did not receive the piece the falls to the side as shown in the pic. Other than that, it was still a cute top and I received lots of compliments on it. I wore it to brunch.
The color is really pretty in person and definitely stands out in a crowd.
review_summary: I got so many compliments on this dress.

review_text: This dress is beautiful and I got so many compliments. It is form fitting, but the material is stretchy.  I found it super comfortable to wear all night and dance in. Word of warning: those with small chests take care.  I had to wear 2 very padded bras in order to hold the dress up, otherwise the gold lining fell below my breasts.  I probably could have gotten a 2 and 4, but I went with the 4 and 6, ultimately wearing the 4.  Highly highly recommend this dress.

I am a size 6, and the medium fit my perfectly. I’ve rented several RTR dresses in the past and like them all, but this one was truly the most comfortable and I also got tons of compliments on it. The fabric has some stretch to it. It fits like a glove. I would definitely rent it again.

Such a comfortable and fun dress I decided to make it work vs sending it back. I added a sheer black blouse and a lace half-camisole to offset the plunging neckline issue. 
-- Mega-stretchy so it will both show what ya got and adapt to various body types. Thick material good for smoothing over things.
-- I'd size down for backup, though broader shoulders or larger bust might fill out top ok
-- DEEP plunge to bottom of bra band on me ( I'm short-waisted so also had a little extra fabric in back)
-- Longer in the back on 5'4 me than is ideal for flattery (hit mid-calf), but curving high-low hem makes this a special dress so I left it alone
review_summary: Ideal for a funk concert/dancing so I made it work -- added blouse, got props from my date!

review_text: Easy to wear without a bra, comfortable and perfect for any weather.  Material is stretchy and durable.  Wore with 3.5" heels and dress came just to the floor.
review_summary: This dress was perfect for a formal wedding.

review_text: Fit is very snug and the material is very nice but a bit heavy. I was unable to wear because it was a bit short and it was for a religious wedding. I did not want to show that much skin, it shows a lot of leg! However, I will be renting this for the next wedding I go to for sure!

This one shouldered black gown is so beautiful and versatile!  Running true to size, I would suggest sizing up for backup in this style.  The fabric is pretty heavy and does not allow for much stretch, and for that reason I would say this style works best for A to C bust sizes.  With the one shoulder look on this gown, I would suggest going with a strapless bra.  The natural waist is definitely very fitted, but it did allow comfortable room throughout the midsection.  I would suggest sizing up for fuller hips as that area is definitely quite fitted.  The one shoulder sleeve was definitely a bit tight on my broader shoulders, so that's definitely something to keep in mind.  At 5'7"  this hit right at the bottom of the floor without heels so I would definitely suggest a long length for women my height or taller.  This dress is perfect for a black tie wedding or gala, and I would pair it with a beautiful pair of long earrings, a shiny clutch and strappy heels.

The dress was comfortable and flattering for both a wedding and a gala. The top is "just right," not too loose, not too tight. The skirt is long and hit just below my knees. The skirt has a great lift when you spin in it (great for dancing) and covers well if you need to bend down. And it has roomy pockets! The colors are bright and the fabric is light. I wore a light sweater with it as well as the Kate Spade rose gold crystal lace necklace, which was exceptionally sparkly. Overall an excellent choice. I would rent again.
review_summary: The dress made me feel confident and classy at two events on the same day!

review_text: I had a love-hate relationship with this dress. I love love loved the look and got tons of compliments but this is not the dress for busy girls.  I am 5'2" 115 lbs with a 30F bust.. After reading other reviews I  decided to size up. I typically wear a 0-2 and orderd a 2 & 4. I wore the 2  since it fit my waist better but I ended up with the oh so lovely armpit boob overflow all night. My other issue was the boning. The boning ends just at your natural waist and was pretty uncomfortable so after a long night of dancing I ended up with a scab on my hip where the boning rubbed. The length was perfect with 4 in heels. Of course being so short it didn't have the same dramatic high-low look like the model but I still loved it. Overall it was gorgeous and I loved the rich fabric and cut but bust girls be cautious!!!
review_summary: Gorgeous dress but busty girls beware!!!

review_text: Rented this for a beach wedding week cocktails event, but didn't love how the peplum looked (too much layer on the side) so ended up wearing it with a fitted sage leather jacket to work instead.  Not your standard work dress, but worked with the jacket dress-up.  Got multiple compliments from colleagues.  Was cute and different but not a home run.

I was expecting 70 or such degree dresses casual for a weekend away.  This was a perfect 10 in weight of jacket and the colors vibrant din print more fun then a sweater and a nice change up from jean jacket.
review_summary: The perfect layer and pop of fun

review_text:
I wore this dress for my engagement photos since I wanted to hide my arms - I have to say that this dress is made VERY well - the lining is really soft and comfortable, and the skirt has a fun swing to it. Highly recommended !

However, I think you need to wear no tights or nude tights with this dress - i paired it with nude heels (i felt it looks best styled this way)
review_summary: A Beautiful Dress: Wonderfully Constructed & Lined

review_text: Great for third trimester baby bump; very flattering and the length was good given the extra bump coverage
review_summary: Perfect for my cocktail party baby shower!

review_text: I liked this dress and it was perfect for a black tie fundraising gala that I attended.  However, the thin strip of material around the center of the waist was pretty uncomfortable. The rest of the dress fits true to size in the bust, hip/butt area, and thighs, but for some reason the strip between the lace sections felt tight to me all night. It's not a deal breaker for me, but take note of this and maybe consider sizing up.
This dress is amazing. It fit great and I didn't have issues with the shoulders falling down. Definitely worth it for a party or even a summer/fall wedding.
The dress is beautiful, but the sizes are weird...I tried on the 8 and my back was showing in a very unflattering way, then the 10 is okay in the back but the tummy area is too big.
LOVED this dress. So soft, great fit, perfect length (I am 5'8"). The open back is a nice touch too, and the adjustable straps make the fit even better!
review_summary: Wore this when I found my wedding venue :)

review_text: This dress was perfect for the Coachella music festival. It was such a great option for the hot desert... and it was so much fun pairing it with some black booties and a wild fanny pack. :)
review_summary: Perfect dress for a music festival!

review_text: I rented this to wear over the weekend and received tons of compliments.  Love the versatility of getting two pieces for a single rental and the underlying dress flutters beautifully in the breeze.  Plus the overall look was surprisingly flattering considering the cut and shape.

The dress fit perfectly! I read reviews that said it ran long, so I bought 5 inch heels and it just barely touched the ground when I walked. My favorite part of the dress was actually the way it flowed around me when I walked. I would definitely recommend this dress (:
review_summary: I wore this gown to my first Military Ball and it was amazing!

review_text: Between the color, cut and pockets in this dress, I wanted to love it. However, the back up size 14 zipped closed but the straps gapped significantly, and the 12 was incredibly tight on my chest (too uncomfortable for a night of dancing). This dress is beautiful but not meant for women with a larger chest.
Quite tight over the chest and the skirt is fuller than expected but absolutely loved the dress.
review_summary: Wore for best friend's rehearsal dinner.

review_text:
This dress is fun and just flirty enough.

This dress rides up a bit at the bottom, especially if you have a caboose like mine. However, a little fashion tape secured the hem and slip before my event.

I suggest renting this dress based upon your waist size---the open back and high neckline make this dress easy to wear regardless of bust size.
The dress fit perfectly and was made of a thick material which kept me warm despite it's mesh slit around the middle. A very classy dress!
review_summary: This dress was the perfect NYE dress!

review_text: I wore this dress for Easter church and brunch. It was comfortable and pretty.  I wore flats and it was a bit long on me. I took off one star because it had some slight pulling/loose strings in a few areas. They weren't very noticeable though.

I wore this out to dinner in NYC on Valentine's Day. I usually wear a size 8, but was not available. Good thing I ended up renting the size 10 since it was a little snug in the middle of the back. This was a little stretchy in the midsection so I had room to breathe, very comfortable. Would recommend this dress to anyone.

wore this to a wedding in Santa Barbara in November. It was unseasonably cold so the long sleeves and thick fabric were great. I loved this dress - color and fit are fantastic! Length hit just at my knees. The details were great.

This dress was beautiful! I am tall so this dress was short waisted and would ride up making a pucker above my bottom. I constantly pulled it down. I Usually wear a 6 but would have loved an 8 in this.
review_summary: Really pretty dress! But not super comfortable.

review_text: Getting this dress was so easy and I loved it! I do wish I hadn't let them talk me out of getting the 14, the 16 was a little big and they told me to order a 18 as my backup. Great condition! Will be ordering from RTR again!
review_summary: I got so many compliments on this dress. Ordering it was so easy! I wish I'd gone a size smaller.

review_text: I am 5'5 and the dress hit me right at the knee. The dress looks much shorter on the model in the photo, so it really depends on your height. The fit was perfect and I didn't even have to try on the second size option. This dress is a little on the heavy side so I would not recommend it for a summer wedding. The wedding I went to was in the fall so it was perfect to keep me a little warmer.
review_summary: Great dress, perfect fit, and amazing color! I definitely recommend!

review_text: The only problem with this dress was the zipper - it was VERY difficult to zip up. I'm usually between a 4 and 6, but have been fitting into 4's recently. I ordered the 4R and 2R since some others said the dress runs a little big. The 4 fit me just right. I wore 4 inch heels and thought the regular length would be too short, but it was perfect. I paired the dress with Nicole Miller chandelier earrings which completely made the outfit!
review_summary: I got SO many compliments on this dress throughout the night that I lost count. I couldn't believe what a hit it was!

review_text: LOVED wearing this shirt. I rented it for "everyday", but wore it once to work (elementary school teacher). It wasn't as light and airy as I thought it would be, but it was still fun to wear. I wouldn't recommend it if you're going to be outside in the summer heat all day, but if you've got some AC pumping, please wear this and you'll feel pretty pretty pretty!
The dress fit perfectly!  I didn't want to send it back!
review_summary: I rented this dress for my engagement pictures!

review_text: This dress is simple but the color gives it style. I added a statement necklace and wore it to a "south beach chic" party. I also wore it with just a blazer to a work event. It ran true to size, and was good for my petite frame. It's a solid rental. Don't expect compliments or head turns, but do rent if you want a versatile piece that you can personalize with layers and/or accessories.
This dress was comfortable and gorgeous! The only con, you can't wear a bra but with the fit, you don't need one.

The detail of the dress is amazing.  I wore it for my daughters baptism and it was perfect for the event.  Classy yet pretty and soft.  Fit was great, comfortable and flattering, even a few months postpartum.  Fit just right.
great dress!-definitely short but got a lot of compliments!
review_summary: great dress!-definitely short but got a lot of compliments!

review_text:
weirdly, Slate and Willow (this second dress) in size 4 fits me although in everything else I'm a 6-8 (and, the other dress in my order was a cynthia rowley that would have fit me in size 12!). I'm 148lbs, 5'7", 34DD and 28 waist.

the V dip is supported by strong wire so the dress doesn't do any weird wrinkling or buckling. I rented it to wear to a nice work event, and thought it would look ok w/ a jacket over it, but that V part is really too low for the office, so now planning to wear it on a date.
review_summary: too low cut for work, more for a demure date?

review_text: The material for this dress was sturdy and stretchy which made its wear super comfortable.  The only con was that the zipper continuously shifted to the right side so I was constantly fixing it.  Otherwise, I would order again.
review_summary: I felt amazing in this dress.

review_text: I ordered the medium and the large and both fit but I wore the large to be more comfortable for a daytime festival. I wore it with low heeled wedges. Got a lot of compliments. Also, the fabric doesn't wrinkle!
Fit true to size, gorgeous dress.

I liked the length and fabric of the dress. My only complaint was the zipper. It kept getting stuck and at the end of the night I had a really difficult time getting out of the dress because the zipper would not budge. I didn't even try on my backup dress  size 4R because the zipper was broken so I think this is an overall flaw with this dress.
review_summary: Loved the dress and received many compliments. Color is vibrant red and really stood out.

review_text: True to size, in my opinion. The color is a deeper red, not maroon, but not bright red. Perfect for a fall wedding in Central Texas. The 6 and 8 were comparable in fit, so I went with the 8 to make myself think I had more room. It was easy to dance/move in, and the racer back and slit were the perfect amount of sass for the evening without being over the top. I wore no show undies and pasties and didn't have any problems. The only con was a deodorant stain on the armpit (that I didn't notice until we were on our way). I was able to clean it up well enough. Great rental.
review_summary: Sassy dress for a classy event

review_text: This dress is really beautiful!  I got compliments all night!  As other reviewers said, the zipper is really tricky and definitely requires a second person to zip it up.  I had to go braless because I just could not find a bra that wouldn't show with the cut of the dress.  The dress was definitely tight - if you have hips, size up!  Because it was pretty tight in the hips, it kept puckering on the lower back so I had to keep pulling it down.  Annoying to me, but not noticeable to anyone else.  This wasn't the most comfortable dress, but it is really beautiful.
A little double sided tape solved the problem of it falling off the shoulders. I do agree with others that it was an issue. However, this is very comfortable. I felt like a work of art.
review_summary: I loved it! It was super comfy and I got compliments all night!

review_text: I wore this to my best friends bridal shower. I liked this dress, it was comfortable. It fit me a little weird though it was tight in the waist but loose on the top, and I have larger shoulders so that's unusual. The slit was a kind of high as mentioned in other reviews so beware, maybe bring a safety pin. Over all it was a nice dress, but not my favorite that I've rented from here.
review_summary: Nice Dress, but fit was a bit funny

review_text: I ordered this as a backup for my prom dress, and I didn't end up wearing it. It wasn't the fit or quality, it just didn't compare to the other dress. I had my heart set on wearing the other one, so that swayed my opinion. The 4L was too long, and I definitely could've worn a regular. It's a gorgeous dress and if this is your style I highly recommend renting it!

I'm 5'1" and 100lbs, I ended up wearing this in a size 2. This was actually a replacement dress to the one that I had originally reserved, and I was so happy with it. Great cut across the shoulders. Material is of exceptional quality, heavy enough with lots of stretch to be extremely comfortable. Paired it with some gorgeous bling earrings that I rented and a bright necklace with lots of sparkle. Wish I had a photo, the only one I have is blurry. :(  This is not the first time I've rented and won't be the last!

Fit true to size.  There is some give so the dress accentuates curves in all the right places.  I did need a backless bra (NuBra backless adhesive bra); the low back is tastefully sexy.  I wore a short slip to eliminate friction between my Spanx and the dress lining so the dress wouldn't ride up around the hips.  I was disappointed to find that my backup size was not available but it probably would have been too big in the bust area anyway even though the extra hip room  may have eliminated the need for the slip.  The scratchy sequins under the arms were a minor irritation that was well worth the way I felt in this dress!  I wore it to a holiday cocktail party and got many, many compliments!  The beautiful blue was one-of-a-kind in a sea of typically-colored holiday dresses.
review_summary: Stunning dress!  Beautiful color.  Tastefully sexy.

review_text: great fit with full skirt.
perfect for a weekend getaway, easy to dress up or down,,, but not too dressy.  It does run on the short side, so I would only recommend if legs are your asset

I wore this for a black tie wedding in December. I wanted a dress that was conservative and elegant. This was a great choice because while it was modest and classy, there were a few details that made this a little playful and sassy: the sequins up top, the silky pleated skirt, and the crop look with illusion mesh. Some dresses make you work to wear them, but this dress isn't! It's like wearing that comfy sweater - where you don't have to worry about bra straps sticking out, sheer material for an oops moment, too long trails, etc - but you still get to look fabulous. 

For sizing, I think I could have even gone down one size as my waist is more petite, and that area is the most fitted area of the dress. However, I was happy with the size I got.

For dress length - I am 5'7", wore 3" heels with no platform height in the front. The SR dress fell about 2 inches from the ground.
review_summary: A comfortable, classy dress for when you want to stay low-key and no-fuss.

review_text:
I loved the cut, the fabric and color scheme of this dress. It was very comfortable and professional for a work environment. I received compliments and felt great while wearing it. I would rent it again! 

Measurements laying flat:
Bust: 18"
Waist: 19"
Length (not including long pointy panel): 32.5"

This jumpsuit is so comfortable. My best friend was sad I rented it because she wanted to borrow it later! True to size, no issues with fit; made me look really lean even though I have a small tummy pooch (you can't tell!). I received compliments all night.
review_summary: At my NYE event, I definitely stood out from the sea of short black sequined dresses!

review_text: I rented this dress for our Sedona, AZ elopement.  Beautiful gold and white to accent the exquisite red rock back drop.  I have received so many compliments on this dress and I felt elegant, sophisticated and feminine.  Very, comfortable dress - trudged up and down a mountain to get these shots with no issues!   This was very true to size - i am 5'9" and wore the 6L.  I also wore 3" heels in these photographs so the dress was the idea length.

Definitely fitted. Luckily, I'm pretty flat chested so it wasn't a huge deal, but I do have a big rib cage so the dress was tight. Received many compliments on the dress! Pro- you don't have to worry about eating/drinking too much as it's forgiving. I was only sent one size, so I didn't have an option, but I would order a size up just in case!
review_summary: Beautiful dress! Wore it as a bridesmaid dress.

review_text:
Pro: perfect length! Few accessories needed, great in photos, many compliments and very flattering!
Cons: After a few hours of wearing it, got a bit itchy, don't plan on wearing a bra, definitely get tape and rides up  just a  bit

I'm very curvy and this fit everything well. I didn't have much extra room in the torso, so while it was comfortable to wear to a theater show, I'm not sure how comfortable I would have been dancing or doing something requiring bending over, reaching, etc. without giving myself a wedgie! I needed help zipping and unzipping this, but there was a really nice lady in the bathroom who unzipped me then waited for me so she could zip me back up! The sleeves are very long and bunched up at the wrists a bit. There are no button holes, so I used the holes in the lace to push the buttons through. I played with turning the sleeves under for a hidden cuff, and that worked too. It is also very low cut and so I ultimately wore it with cami underneath (one pic has cami, the other one doesn't). I would wear it again.

The original dress I ordered wasn't available, so I had to pick this replacement quickly.  I was very happy with it.  I ordered the 2P because the last time I ordered a gown I ordered the Regular and I was stepping on it during the whole party.  This was the perfect length, and I wore two inch heels.  It was a bit snug in places, but that is they way it is supposed to fit, because it looked right and wasn't uncomfortable.  The material is heavy and stretchy so very comfortable and gives warmth at a winter party.  The slit lets you show some leg, which gave this simple dress a little splash of sexy!

The dress fit true to size. The sequins on the sleeves bothered me a little but nothing that was unbearable. I ordered the size 4 and 6 and ended up wearing the 4 since it was a tighter fit.  If you want the dress to fit like the model I would recommend ordering up a size or two.  Although I received a lot of compliments on the dress, the only downside for me was that people also recognized it as a RTR favorite.
review_summary: I wore this dress to a wedding and received compliments all night.

review_text: Beautiful top. I had to steam it, but it wasn't a big deal. The flow is just so pretty...and a pop of shoulder is a lot of fun. I wore to an evening affair, but if I owned this it would be my favorite work-to-night-out top because with a suit jacket, it's completely polished/professional and with the bare shoulders, it's flirty and feminine. Also, I have a long torso and the length was still good.

The dress is extremely comfortable, and it fit me perfectly. It is a classically beautiful dress with a twist, and I received so many compliments all night! I wore the dress to a wedding and it was perfect for dancing the night away. I highly recommend this dress, and I will probably rent the exact same dress again!
review_summary: This dress is hands down my favorite outfit I have ever worn! I never wanted to take it off!

review_text: I wore a low back strapless bustier under the dress.  I kept the jewelry simple wearing only earrings.  You  have to take short steps as the dress is narrow and comes down below the knee.
review_summary: I received so many compliments.  It fit like a glove tastefully.  I have rented this twice.

review_text: It fit great, but I do recommend some fashion tape to keep the dress in place up top
review_summary: I got many compliments on this dress! Classy and sexy

review_text: The top strap's clamps were both broken, and it arrived a day late (after I had already left for the wedding). Very disappointing because I've been wanting to wear this ever since I signed up for unlimited!
Front pleat was adorable. I wore it a few times.  Once with a blouse and once with a t-shirt.
This dress was beautiful, but I may order a size down next time. It was very spacious around the waist- so much so that I needed to wear a belt. Loved the slight high-low.
review_summary: Added a belt & it worked great!

review_text: Love this dress!  Versatile.  I wore it to work with a black blazer but you could wear this to a party, date, wedding, etc. The colors make it fun; the length makes it appropriate.
I wore a pink slip underneath because it might be a bit revealing in the chest. But as all DVF wrap-dresses go, this was divine.
The dress runs true to size and fit nicely, and it was very comfortable.  I will definitely be renting another dress from Rent the Runway!
review_summary: I rented this dress for a family wedding.

review_text: It was cute, but uncomfortable. The collar was very itchy! Definitely size up if you have a large bust.
review_summary: Itchy, and small on the shoulders

review_text: Usually the issue for me is that if the top fits, the bottom is too small and vice versa, but in this instance the bottom fit but I couldn't get the back strip to connect so I had to essentially wear it as a backless dress. It worked, but was not ideal. It was also much longer on me than shown on the model.
review_summary: Classy dress, but tight on top

review_text: Super fun and very comfortable to wear. It is a bit long.

Badgley Mishka dresses always work well for me and this dress is no exception. I rented the longer version of this dress for a wedding earlier this year. The dress is beautiful and elegant. The top was a little large (which is unusual for me I am a a 34D) but other than that it was true to size.

I typically wear an XS/S, and rented the XSR (size small was not available for the dates I needed). It was slightly snug at the neckline and bust, but I think the size small would have been too large through the rib-cage. I loved the dress, and the print is beautiful. I got compliments on it all evening. Overall, highly recommend this dress.
review_summary: worn to a Rehearsal Dinner -- beautiful dress and fit -- will rent again!

review_text: The dress was fabulous. I reserved the 6 and 8 buy chose to wear the 8 because it fit my hips better. I received so many compliments. It shows a lot of cleavage so you may want to pin the top. Regarding the zipper, it was a little tough to zip up. I had a friend help me zip it up and was able to unzip it myself at the end of the night. I wouldn't let that deter you from renting it though.

As others mentioned, it was short, but for a cocktail party where you are standing most of the time it was fine.  I wore shorter heels to offset the hemline.  The dress was a great balance: showing a little skin but not too much; conservative color but fun sparkle.
The fit was great, the fabric was on the stretchier side and the fit forgives the imperfections for someone like me with more curves. It truly is a dress that makes you feel like a million bucks!!
review_summary: I wore this dress to my Vegas Bachelorette and it was amazing!! I kept getting compliments all night

review_text: Due to stretch in the fabric, I thought it ran a little large. Unfortunately my second size was not available for my date. The color is beautiful, more purple than burgundy.  Fit is off the shoulders so I wore a strapless bra. Faell below the kneeor me. Fabric hides any flaws. Very flattering. I will definitely rent again.
review_summary: First experience with RTR and was so happy!  I loved my dress and wish I could keep it!

review_text: Overall fit was comfortable. Needed heels to make the shorter pant leg look more intentional. Ended up wearing a strapless bra for added support, although the boning in the dress probably would have been fine on its own. I bounce between a 6 and an 8 regularly, but the 6 fit perfectly.
review_summary: Loved this alternative for a dressy wedding. Got complimented all night!

review_text: I wore this dress for prom. I absolutely loved it. It was actually my backup dress and the only size available was an 8 (which I am but 10 is better for some dresses not all). At first the zipper would stop around the waist area but I got it eventually. It fit me like a glove. I received so many compliments and I really stood out. The slits added a nice touch. The only downfalls was that it was a little too long. I am5'4. Heals made it a little better. The slip underneath wasn't really a problem. I had to pull it down once or twice. I was not able to wear underwear with it and I wore a backless bra. It was an awesome dress that was very fitting and snug.

This is one of my favorite rentals of all times.  The jacket added an extra cool vibe to every outfit. Seriously - I'm buying it!  Loved the fabric which was a soft tweedy boulce but the under the length of the arms and sides were thin jersey-like neoprene.  It made the jacket very comfortable to wear.  Not necessarily super warm but great for cool days/evenings.
review_summary: Love this.... I felt cool and fashion forward!

review_text: It fit pretty well, was comfortable, and was easy to wear undergarments with it. I think it would have looked even better on someone who is taller. I'm pretty short, but it still fit well enough that everyone said I looked great it in. :)
review_summary: I got a lot of compliments on the dress!

review_text: I love VINCE. Their material is quality and comfortable, while their cuts are flattering for my straight boyish figure. Wore this dress to work with lots of compliments. The only critique is that the bottom hem seemed to be pressed incorrectly.

I wish I could find this dress so I could buy it.  I rented this dress twice and I wish I could find it in the store so I could buy it already.  I love it sooo much and it is sooo my style.  I love that it doesn't wrinkle and it is so easy to style with any shoe or cardigan.  It photographs beautifully and it is perfect for spring and summer day parties.

The fit was perfect...not stretchy so make sure you order the correct size.  Gorgeous dress the only flaw was the inside of my upper arm rubbing against the fabric the sequins were rough on my skin but definitely not enough to bother or regret this dress
review_summary: I wore it out for a night out in Vegas beautiful dress!

review_text: This dress ran a bit shorter than I was expecting but was a good fit overall.  I received many compliments and my fiancé was definitely happy with my choice. The material is thick and comfy which made it a great choice for a fall wedding.

Was a little big in the stomach/hip area but I do have a small frame. I still wore it and liked it but could have fit a little better. 
In my picture I am actually pulling the fabric in the back of the dress tighter. So it's not a completely true depiction of how it fit.
review_summary: For well but a little big for me around my stomach and hips. I do have a small/narrow frame though.

review_text: The fit was just not flattering.  I think it may be the "bib" on the top, which doesn't seem very bulky in photos, but it actually was.
review_summary: Warm, charming, not good for busty girls

review_text: This dress was suggested to me by RTR after my 1st choice dress was not available. I wore this dress to a daytime party with low heel sandals.  I also experimented with a dressier look with a rattan belt and wedge heels but decided on a more casual look.  The tangerine color is unique and the silk is beautiful.  Dress was in like-new condition.  I would rent this dress again!

Wore this to a fundraiser that my husband was being honored at in recognition for his involement in recruiting and registering new donors to the Bone Marrow Transplant registry. I was looking for something that would showcase the tattoo I got in honor of my daughters illness and recovery from HLH. Im not normally the flashy type, but when i put this dress on, I felt like a million bucks! It fit perfectly, without feeling tight. I'm only 5'1" and was able to wear with a regular heel (no platform/5" required). I received dozens of compliments and was dubbed "First Lady of the Gala" by the event organizers. It was the most beautiful I've ever felt. You won't be disappointed. Rent this dress and know what its like to be a star!
review_summary: Glamourous, comfortable, eye catching, show stopper. What more couls you ask for?

review_text: I love this dress - it was my first piece ordered via my Unlimited account that I wanted to keep.  I paired it with a white leather motorcycle jacket for daytime wear, and it went from day-to-night effortlessly because of the print and the material.  It fit true to size from the standpoint of it's a dress meant to be light, loose and airy, but I could see how folks might want to size down to get a slimmer fit.  At 5'7", the dress hit at my calves, same as the model picture.
review_summary: Gorgeous print and love the length!

review_text: The dress fit very well,had to wear a strapless bra because of the way the sleeves cut. The material is thicker but it worked well for a spring evening. Wore it out for my birthday dinner and couldn't be happier!
review_summary: Great dress! Super comfortable but a little thick for summer wear

review_text: I'm 5'5" -- the long was perfect with 4" heels! Cant wait to rent in another color!
review_summary: Loved it! Super comfortable, easy to wear.

review_text: Some signs of wear

I like this top, although I was expecting it to be more matte than what it actually was. The sleeves are great and not as much a handicap as I thought they might be. However, due to the fabric, I would recommend this more for an evening out than for everyday.
review_summary: Original, chic top, fabric is not matte

review_text: Loved the dress! It is super soft and comfortable. I wore it to work and a date night. I would rent again!
Loved this jacket. Rented it for Thanksgiving, but ended up wearing it a couple more times. It fits true to size and is really warm, which was convenient for the cold weather in Michigan!
review_summary: Lots of compliments on this jacket! I love the accents of gold.

review_text: Loved this dress for a wedding in late May 2016. I am usually a size two and I should have sized down to a zero as it was definitely a little big. Since it was a little big, I couldn't get away without a bra. The sides under the armpit go low which meant a strapless bra would show. I got the sticky cups instead and they worked great! Overall, I was impressed with my RTR experience.

Rented this for a girls' dinner. Super cute, worn as a dress with black tights, fit loose but not in an overwhelming way. Fur sleeves were fab. Would go with your normal size, because the body fit is loose but the neck is super tight.

Cons: very warm, hard to fit in jacket sleeves, and neck is VERY tight - uncomfortably so. Also, arrived with very strong cleaning smell. Would consider renting again, but neck was just a little too much for me.

I enjoyed wearing this royal blue dress out to an engagement party.  It feels very classic.  And is more blue than the photos -- I almost didn't recognize it in the RtR Las Vegas Store!  I enjoyed wearing this dress and would consider it again.

This dress is a true Womens size.  The lining has some stretch, so it is really easy to wear.  It has bra hook thingies, but I didn't need them.

The dress was true to size. It is snug but comfortable enough to spend the entire night with it on. It does make a weird folding in the front that makes you look like if you have a small belly. I think this happened because the inside slip might have shrunk a little.  Like other reviewers it is comfortable enough to wear braless and not feel exposed. Over all I loved the dress had great comments. A great rental.
review_summary: I loved the color and the back of the dress. It was sexy but conservative enough for a work holiday

review_text: Perfect fit!
review_summary: I received SO many compliments on this dress, it was SO comfortable & even more stunning in person!

review_text: I wore this dress for a black tie wedding in May. It's ABSOLUTELY gorgeous in person - the color is so unique and fit like a glove. I'm 5'1" and I have an hourglass/petite/athletic figure. It definitely runs small and sucks you in a bit, so if you're uncomfortable in tight clothes, I'd say that's the only reason to reconsider. This is such a beautiful dress and I enjoyed every second of wearing it!
Very comfortable

Fit well - was snug to my body with an extra layer in the back to make it more wedding appropriate (and length was just above the knee). Fabric was a bit on the thick side but it was cool weather so it was great. Overall, loved it!
review_summary: Was a great, classy dress for a fall wedding!

review_text: The dress was amazing and I felt so great wearing it. I ordered both the 4R and 6R. I'm a 32DDD so I'm always nervous about sizing/fit but the 6R fit nicely and the adjustability of the open back helped. The 4R fit as well but the straps were defective...it was one combined strap as opposed to two separate straps. You need two straps in order to loop through the back and I didn't want to cut the strap. Very odd but overall lovely dress!
Leather is wonderfully soft. Great jacket

I wore this to a wedding and would recommend it to anyone!  The fit was true to size and it was just long enough as I'm 5'2".  The fabric was light and somewhat stretchy.  Love everything about this dress- especially the open back!
review_summary: LOVED this dress! I got compliments all night.  The fabric is really light and comfortable.

review_text: It was a lovely dress and I received so many compliments all night long. Very flattering and showed up great in pictures. Fit like a glove and was on the line of almost being too tight. The neck line was beautiful but it was very tight, uncomfortably tight towards the end of the night.
review_summary: Beautiful pattern, perfect for a summer wedding.

review_text: I wore this with leggings. It is kind of short and doesn't sit at actual waist. It is cute and the color is quite muted. May rent again.

This Slate & Willow number was perfect for my birthday dinner & party! I've never received so many compliments in one night. Due to my figure I went a size up as the shoulders are the tightest part of the dress from previous reviews. The material is very thick, but the open back really helped especially for a summer birthday. I paired this dress with black heels, a red lip, and RTR Lotus Pendant Earrings.
Awesome dress for an evening wedding! Received so many compliments on the back!
review_summary: Picked the dress up at the store - so easy!

review_text: Everything was great! I felt the dress ran a little small. I am usually a 4 and I wore the 6. Other than that, the dress was gorgeous!
review_summary: The dress was beautiful and I loved how it fit! I got many compliments!

review_text: It does fall down a little bit in the front and reveal a strapless bra if you're wearing one. I had to hike the top up throughout the night - however, I am very busty (30G) so that experience will only likely replicate itself if you're similarly busty. It was a beautiful, beautiful dress.
review_summary: No one else had a dress quite like it - the color was beautiful and unique, and fit was beautiful.

review_text: This dress is gorgeous. I wore it to a formal southern wedding and got a ton of compliments. Very lady-like. You should know that the fabric has texture and a beautiful sheen to it. Keep in mind that there is no stretch so you might want to size up for dancing purposes. Fit like a glove.
I loved this dress. The fabric was thin which was perfect for a summer day. The colors were vibrant and I loved the fabric. Very flattering.
review_summary: So cute! Perfect for a rehearsal dinner!

review_text: Great dress but VERY short!

Loved this dress! However, with the dropped waist it would ride up on me (not sure if Spanx would help this). Also, the girls were on full display and there was no way around that. LOVE LOVE LOVE the lace detail and POCKETS!
review_summary: Beautiful dress but the girls were on full display

review_text: Very heavy material but a beautiful dress!
review_summary: Looked great on, a little shorter than expected!

review_text: It was rubbing on the shoulders and underarms, but other than that it was perfect!
review_summary: Beautiful dress, got tons of compliments on it!

review_text: This dress was snugged and I usually wear a 6 but that was too small. Luckily I ordered the 8 even though it was still a little snugged, I wore it anyways. The bust was loose but the rest of the dress was snugged so i purchased double sided tape to hold it up. Loved the dress though and I received a lot of compliments. Love RTR!!

Rented the small and medium.  Tried on the small first and never took the medium out of the bag.  Pairs will with lightweight black merino wool sweater, cuffed jeans and black booties.  Totally fun and whimsical.  A little something different for casual affairs.  Small fit well in shoulders and length.  Could have buttoned up but it loses some of the whimsy.  Fun without being childish.

The fit of this dress was okay. Personally, I think it looked better in pictures than in person. I felt sort of frumpy in it. I could not get the extra fabric on the side to hang right, even after attempting to steam out the wrinkles. Also, I did not realize the slit in the chest was so low....not really work appropriate. However, the rest of the dress, style-wise, was too conservative for a night out or a date, in my opinion, so I was left wondering where I'd really be able to wear it. Decided to return it for something else.
review_summary: This was 1 of 3 dresses I ordered in my first unlimited shipment, rented to wear to work.

review_text: the vest was bright red, caught lots of attention. great for pictures
This dress fit exactly as I expected it to and just like the photo. Very happy with the choice.
review_summary: I received many compliments and passed along RTR's site information.
