review_text: I really loved this dress! The colors were even more vibrant in person. The open back was one of my favorite features....get yourself a sticky bra and you are good to go. The dress fit perfectly and was so comfortable to wear. Overall, my favorite dress I have rented from RTR!
So glam. Great to accentuate small waist. Paired with lace longsleeve shirt.  Loved this look :)

I wore this dress to Mardi Gras Ball. I felt amazing. I looked sexy and glamorous. This dress runs true to size. Actually, if you are curvy Monique Lhuillier is the way to go. I am between a 4 and 6 in the hip area.  and a 2-4 at the top. I can successfully wear a size 4 in this designer dresses and add a padded bra to accommodate the bust area. This dress very fitted  from the bust through the thigh area, with extra volume created with layers of crinoline. If you like drama and creating your moment this is your dress.
review_summary: Create Your Moment With this Dress

review_text: Definitely a bit on the large side so I ordered a size down which fit well. Also pockets!!

Loved this jacket! I paired it with a navy tank (yes, I didn't look close enough and discovered there's actually navy AND black accents on the jacket!), white skinny jeans and my favorite pink shoes. I was able to stay warm and feel fashionable at the same time.
review_summary: Adorable jacket with the perfect pop of PINK!

review_text: I wore this jumpsuit to my company holiday party in December. As the event planner, I am constantly moving around and I am one of the people that starts dancing first so, that others would be encouraged to do so as well. The jumpsuit was a great alternative to a cocktail dress and allowed me to move with ease -- not to mention I was the only one wearing a jumpsuit so, it stood out nicely in a sea of dresses especially when paired with a statement necklace. The jumpsuit was true to size; however, the it was a little long so, heel height is key or fashion tape for the hem. The material also wrinkled easily which was a con for me. Overall this jumpsuit fits better than most and the material is most similar to crepe so, it did not add warmth, but kept me warmer than I would have been if I opted to wear a dress. The jumpsuit on the model looks more like a bordeaux color,  but in reality it was more on the purple side than  red.
review_summary: Great alternative to a cocktail dress for a formal affair

review_text: This dress is STUNNING! Everyone loved this dress and even the bride told me multiple times how gorgeous it was! It fits perfectly with a Nubra. If you want to feel like you're on the red carpet, this is the dress for you. The regular just touched the floor for me and I only wore 1 inch heels.

This dress was perfect for a black tie event. I got so many compliments and it really was so comfortable. Fabric is a little weighted and physically heavy. Nice quality zipper and the fabric has a little stretch to it. I'm 5'5" so the highest point was right above my knee.
Loved this dress!

Flirty Lace byStylestalker. The dress is a beautiful color and very fitted on the bust size and will work for women A to C cup. This style is true to size and for the back up style I recommend going a size up as your back up size. This style you can wear a Nubra, I'm a 32A and with the 0R I would personally go bra-less.  If your bigger in the bust area I would reccomend buying fashion tape. I'm 5'1 with 3 inch heel the dress hit me above my knee.  I would wear this on a date and add a statement bracelet to give a pop to this dress.
Such an adorable top for summer nights - I wore it with white jeans and received so many compliments!! The bell sleeves tend to fold up so just keep an eye on them throughout the night :)

Wore this to Vegas for the 4th of July! It was flattering, glamorous, and perfect! Wish I owned it. Only thing was that the sequins under the arm start to really hurt by the end of the night, but I have sensitive skin.

My original dress I ordered in another style was lost in the mail by UPS. When I called to tell RTR the man spent 45 mins on the phone with me trying to find me another dress. After we found this one, he sent it overnight to me. It is a very beautiful dress, it's not as appealing when it's on the hanger and looks a bit mother of the bride until you put it on. I did not end up wearing it but, I tried the 18W it fit well and had enough room to move around in (the 16 may have made it difficult to dance in). Otherwise it's a very elegant and well made dress. Choose a size up from your normal size to be safe.
The fit was great. It was tight at the top and flowed out at the right spot. The length was definitely appropriate for a more conservative look.
review_summary: Loved this dress! Perfect for a winter wedding!

review_text:
I rented this dress for a formal event. Stunning dress; it does run small and I had to size up 2 sizes.
Pro: very beautiful dress with elegant details on the top part. The bottom flows with the wind or when you walk. Pockets that makes it easy to keep your phone, gloss etc... The length was a tiny tiny bit too long with 2 inches heels for me.
Cons: as some reviewers said, the top part can be a little bit hitchy but it was very minor. I had compliments all night long with this dress. A must rent.

This dress is beautiful. The fabric feels very luxurious. It is navy with gold accents that make the dress really stand out. The dress runs small - so thankful I ordered the backup. It drapes very nicely on the body, but recommend spanx for anyone who would feel self-conscious. The dress hit about my knee as it did in the picture of the model. I would recommend ordering one size larger than you normally wear for a better fit. You can't go wrong with this dress!
review_summary: Beautiful Dress & Perfect for a Cocktail Party

review_text: It was flowy and comfortable, I didn't feel like a stuffed sausage.  I am 5'7 and had to wear 4" heels so the dress didn't drag. I would normally consider myself an 8, but I am post-baby so my pre-baby sizing doesn't really apply anymore.
review_summary: I received so many compliments on this dress! The fit was fantastic, and the color was gorgeous!

review_text: Flattering and awesome for work, day, and night
Unable to wear a bra with it because it would be shown.  Cute with white jeans.

I am usually an 8 but ended up wearing the ten. The 8 zipped up and made my boobs look better but the 10 was more comfortable. I will say the only negative is that it was very large on top. I'm a 34D and the dress didn't lay flush to my chest, it gaped out a little. Not enough to be noticeable but enough that they didn't look as "perky" as they would if it had fit properly. I didn't wear a bra and the material was thick enough so there was no nipple action. I think this dress looks gorgeous on every person here who has posted a photo. I strongly recommend it! Just get it early because there were only 2 size 8's left when I ordered 3 months in advance!!!
review_summary: "Most beautiful dress any guest has ever worn to a wedding" was the highest compliment I received!

review_text: Very professionals and wears well.
review_summary: NIce to wear to the office.

review_text: The dress was fun and so comfortable!  Ive got a booty and never felt like the dress was being stretched by my hips/butt. Piece of advice - the back scoops pretty low so you either need a backless bra or pasties.
review_summary: I received so many compliments on the dress!

review_text: Wore this dress for a work photo shoot and loved it. I've worn it 4 or 5 times since - to work, on a date, to a work event. Great with leggings and ankle boots (in the winter). The top collar didn't always lay flat, but the neoprene material felt really good and hugged my body perfectly. I'm shorter (5" 1') so it came right to my knees. I got lots of compliments on this dress - including a woman at another table at the restaurant as I was walking by!
review_summary: Such a unique dress! So much fun to wear and made me feel absolutely beautiful!

review_text: I ordered my usual sizes and neither of them fit.  Luckily, RTR gave me credit for a future rental, but I was super bummed it ran so small!  Definitely order a size UP if you're planning on wearing this!!

The smaller size (6) was the better size for me, but the zipper on that dress was extremely difficult to operate and the back of the dress had an area that might have been stretched or something because it bunched up. The size 8 was comfortable and flattering (though the top was just loose enough that I needed to pin the shoulders to my bra straps). 
The color is a rose-gold more than a regular gold. The fabric is heavy under all the sequins - it worked well for a late September wedding but I might have been hot earlier in the summer.
review_summary: Received many compliments from other wedding guests, comfortable to dance in, & easy to accessorize.

review_text: Great dress! I ordered it for a destination wedding and had the dress sent to the hotel. It arrived a day early and the hotel took care of shipping it back. The dress fit true to size. I wish I owned the dress so I could wear it again!
Fit beautifully!
review_summary: The dress was simple but classy. Fit perfectly, and was super comfortable. Would rent again

review_text: Fits true to size, with lots of hip room and enough room for larger busts.
review_summary: Dress has great shape, nice material and is comfortable! Also has pockets :D

review_text: Very comfy. I'm 5'7" and 160 lbs and the 10 was a great fit. Wore this with a t-shirt dress and jeans and it was classy without any sacrifice of comfort. Perfect for chilly autumn or winter.
review_summary: So comfortable, professional and relaxed at once.

review_text: Rented this for a fundraising Gala. Loved the thicker fabric, felt warm in February. I'm 5'9 and the dress came just to my knees. The color is more of a berry - really rich, and the back is gorgeous! I didn't wear a bra with it, just 'petals' and it worked well. Other reviews say it's a stretchy dress - there's a bit of give but with the satin liner, I wouldn't say it's a stretchy dress. It's got a very slim fit that hugs your curves - the medium was spot on for me. The black liner does sometimes show from the bottom of the dress.
review_summary: Quality dress perfect for winter weather!

review_text:
Great dress! I wore it as a bridesmaid in a wedding and it was true to size. I didn't have to wear a bra with it but I could have done with maybe pinning in some bra cups to the lining. Loved the length and it was super comfortable to dance and move around in all day/night. 

Only disappointment was that the second size was a different color! Like a purple-ish. Thankfully I didn't need it but a friend who rented the same dress in 2/4 complained about the same issue with the color difference for the back-up size. 

Would definitely recommend! This was my first RTR experience and it was so easy! The reviews helped with the size selection and the dress fit perfectly!

This dress was so much fun to wear!! I'm usually a 2 but had a baby 4 months ago. I got this as my back up dress and only size 6 was available but I figured I'd order it since it was only my back up and I had a few post-baby pounds left over. (I thought the 6 would be big but the dress runs small and was very form fitting. I wore Spanxx.)   I wound up returning my other dress and wearing this one. Perfect for a formal wedding because the sequin are subtle and the cut out in the back is tasteful (I'm usually super conservative so this was fun and adventurous to wear. I felt great!) I was able to wear a strapless bra with it (the first strapless bra I tried peeked out the back so try on multiple ones before you give up.) I wore bronze peep toe shoes & very minimal jewelry. The sequin did not irritate my arms like some users said. The slip does show on the bottom a little but I didn't mind. Overall, great dress if you want to step out of your comfort zone & have a little fun!
Unique and paired well with several of my bottoms

I got this for a rehearsal dinner with plenty of time to swap up a size if needed.  The top of the dress is very snug if you have a wide ribcage.  I absolutely love the dress and can't wait to wear it this weekend, just in a larger size.
This dress runs true to size, and has some stretch to it.  It does run a bit on the longer side, as I am 5'8 and without shoes it was floor length.  Overall a great full length dress!

When I put this too on, the first thing I noticed was the color! It looked beautiful on my skin tone. It was more or a salmon or peachy pink color than rose, but gorgeous none the less. I was afraid the L would be too big (only size available when I rented). However, it was perfect! The top is also pretty long, I decided to tuck it in to give myself some definition. It was perfectly flouncy and light light weight. The top also did not wrinkle very easily, which makes it great to wear all day or too a party.

I chose my backup size L because I needed the length (work conference.)  The L is flowy, but I was able to dress it up with some leather booties and look professional cool.  The neckline is a nice touch.  If this was for a regular outing, I would have worn the M and it would have still been flowy, just a bit shorter.  It's easily a causal outfit as well and would work great for daytime event or a baby/bridal shower.

True to size as far as fit goes. I was disappointed in the length of the underlay.  It was so short that it barely covered my bottom.  I wore a black slip under, which was visible but did not look out of place.  I made it work but would not have been able to wear the dress to a wedding as is.  It would have been fine for a bachelorette party or a night out with the girls but not a wedding.
Very flattering!
review_summary: The dress is beautiful and looked gorgeous on! Very flattering!

review_text: I do with it were a bit more accentuating at the waist, but this dress is killer.  It gave me support in all the right places.  Slit was perfect.  Not too high or low or open or closed.  Neck was a bit tight but worth it.  Color is beautiful.  I received so many compliments.  Wear it with an interesting shoe!

I really liked this dress and I loved my first RTR experience overall. I didn't give it 5 stars b/c there was an issue with the zipper where the teeth were missing right where the waist seam was so it was almost impossible to zip. If my fiancé and friend hadn't helped me I never would have gotten it on. It definitely runs a little small in the best, but otherwise had a great fit. I got tons of compliments & it was very comfortable. Some of the dots in the pattern are salmon colored which was not clear from the photo but luckily it still looked good on my pale skin. Fabric is very thick so would not be good for outdoor event in summer but was great for an indoor event in March. Overall a good dress!
review_summary: Wore at my jack & Jill shower and got lots of compliments. But...

review_text:
This dress runs large! I normally wear a 4 and I ended up wearing the 2 but probably needed the 0. 

Pros- pretty dress, comfortable, beautiful color

Cons- runs really large and if not the right size can look baggy
review_summary: I received compliments on the color and style of the dress!

review_text: I would recommend this dress to anyone! It was beautiful and the perfect length with 3" heels.  The open back was sexy yet still classy.

Loved this top. I wore it out in NYC with black jeans and silver heels - understated but put together. The fit is a touch boxy, but not as bad as some other shorter tops that I've tried. Overall, I would wear this again.
Wore this to a board meeting and it was perfect!
review_summary: Super comfortable.  Great fabric.  Beautiful print.

review_text: Perfect for a dinner cruise. You have to try it to really appreciate this dress. There are pockets that gives it a dressy, yet casual look. I just loved wearing it and received many compliments about it. There is no cons, it hides all the body imperfections and emphasizes on your best assets (If your legs and chest are the best one you have)
review_summary: Extremely comfortable, Versatile, Casual chic wear.

review_text: Cons: the dress should not be worn in hot weather not very breathable
review_summary: Everybody loved the dress!! Specially me had lots of compliments

review_text: The dress fit perfectly and was very flattering! I wore a 4R, which is still on the long side, so I wore 3 1/2 inch heels. Loved this dress and was complimented on it all night.

I wore this dress to my father-in-law's 60th birthday.  I was running super late from work and had to jump into this dress in a matter of minutes and rush out the door. I was super nervous it wasn't going to work out and I would have to find something else to wear.  Much to my happiness, the dress fit and I was out the door! The dress is stretchy, but form filling and fit like a glove.  The only issued I had was the straps were too long.  This was easily remedied by joining the straps with a small hair barrette at the base of my neck which I covered with my hair.  If I were to order again in the future, I would try out the 6.  I highly recommend this dress.  It is a beautiful color and very comfortable. I was able to wear a strapless bra with it by pulling the strap down low in the back.

I'm 5 foot 6 inches, about 165 and 36DD. I wore the size 10 and it fit perfectly, a bit snug, but a size larger would have been to big. I didn't wear a bar with this dress, but I do recommend wearing Spanx because it definitely hugs those curves!! Paired with gold shoes, clutch and jewelry.
review_summary: I wore this to a friend's wedding and got tons of compliments! I felt very pretty!

review_text:
Pros: gorgeous, love the low back & my date did too :)
Cons: as we danced, the skirt would shimmy up some, so I felt like I was constantly pulling it down.

Overall: great dress! Just be careful with the fit of the skirt. Definitely runs a little small.
review_summary: Very fun dress for a wedding!

review_text: This dress was amazing! I rented both a 12 and a 10 as a backup. It definitely runs large. I normally wear a 12 but wore the 10 to the show. Both fit fine but the 10 looked better. It was perfect for an afternoon at the show. The material was also perfect for a winter day in the city.  The shoulders are definitely tight (as mentioned in previous reviews) but it wasn't uncomfortable. I did NOT want to return this dress I loved it so much! Will rent again!
I loved this dress. It was very flattering, and I felt comfortable all night long. I'm 6'1", and it was the perfect length for me. It was a little big in the bust, but just a little.
Fit true to size,
review_summary: Loves this dress. Comfortable, great fit, Stunning in person.

review_text: Love, love, loved this dress. The fabric felt a bit heavy at first but ended up hugging my curves perfectly.  I wore it with a cardigan, tights, and boots, which ended up looking very put together.  Since it is winter, I had to add all of that for warmth, but I can also wear the dress without anything but heels and it will be a perfect dress for a spring/summer event.  very versatile & such a fun print!  That is why I immediately went searching for it online to buy, but was only able to find it on eBay.  Totally worth it!
review_summary: So perfect, I found it on eBay and bought it!

review_text: Loved the pockets!
review_summary: Perfect fit and so comfortable. Very flattering dress!

review_text: I am always a little nervous with gowns since I am petite and narrow and many have a tendency to overwhelm my small frame. This dress was stunning - I received so many compliments on it at the gala I wore it to and the pattern is so unique. The open back detail is also great, although I wish there had been a set off additional hooks attached to make the cross-strap tighter (it became unhooked a few times). I ordered the petite as a backup, but with 4 inch heels, it was a little shorter than I liked.

I'm 5'9" and I'm wearing 4' heels in this photo, and the was still concerned with tripping.  I'm pretty sure this was either a 12L or 14L, the British sizing was confusing when I was ordering. I did not wear this to my event since I was uncomfortable with my boobs flopping around (even with fashion tape!). It just did not look attractive to me.  Also, be sure to dig around in the bag for the black belt!  The fabric was very light almost like crepe paper. It added too much volume to my waist and hips. No go for my curves. :)
review_summary: No boob support. Didn't love the billowy fabric.

review_text: Great dress for a wedding. Fits very true to size and unique lace makes it a stand out. Can be worn with a standard bra. Length is a little longer than it appears in the photo. Perfectly comfortable for a night of celebration.
It was a really cold day...23 degrees outside.  The dress hid my 2 layers of leggings and Ugg Boots well LOL.
review_summary: The dress was absolutely gorgeous and I got many compliments.

review_text: Paired with skinny denim, lace up  heels & a gold clutch

This is a super cute dress for the right body type.  I have had two babies and it made me look like I was 5 months pregnant again.  The bubble is very cute, but can enhance your mid section.  The pleats on the dress weren't ironed correct either, so it puffed out in all the wrong ways.  Sadly, didn't end up wearing it.
review_summary: Really cute dress for the right body.

review_text: I will totally be renting this dress again, I loved the button detailing on it, and the pattern was so fresh for spring.

Be careful as this dress runs small and the waist is unusually tight. Definitely would recommend getting a full size up than your ususal so the waist will fit properly. I only rented a size 6 because size 8 was unavailable. Would rent again, but next time would get the size 8.
review_summary: Stunning power dress for work! Loads of compliments all day!

review_text: Searched through these rental pages for what seemed like forever. Needed something for an Ohio winter wedding. A little sexy, but still conservative enough for a church ceremony. Loved the color and the neckline was beautiful!  Unfortunately, I have really narrow shoulders and this just kept falling down revealing well... the girls. I could have gotten away with fashion tape for sure. Also, the sleeves were too long on me and pretty baggy.  I ended up wearing a different dress to the ceremony for ease. My husband still says this was his favorite.

This was my first RTR experience. I made a mistake with the dates, and customer service was very heplful and kind.  The dress and accessories arrived on time and carefully packaged.  The dress fit like a glove and looked beautiful. I'm 5'4", and I wore a 3.5" heel, which left just the right amount of train without tripping me up. It was also very comfortable and not that heavy, because the sequins are the perfect mini circles that reflect beautifully in lights. I rented the bangles too..works great with dress. My husband and I looked so chic at the event a blogger named us Hot Couple of the Evening!
review_summary: Being mentioned in Paper Mag as Hot Couple of the Night!

review_text: The color was more vibrant in person, which was great. It's a dress that doesn't need to be very tight to be flattering. I highly recommend this dress!
review_summary: I have never received so many compliments on a dress. I felt beautiful!

review_text: I rented this dress for a car show gala and this sequin dress was perfect for the event! I wore the 2L and it was the perfect length with 3" heels. I probably could have fit into the 0L as the material is stretchy and I would have liked it to be a little tighter, but that's ok. Overall I loved the dress and would highly recommend it!

I wore the medium which was my back up size.  Both small and medium fit, but medium was a bit more comfy and the zipper on the small didn't work well.  I am petite, but not small waisted.  Small bust, normal arms and shoulders, so if you are big in arms, shoulders or bust might want to size up.  I thought it might be too short for conservative wedding but not at all.  It was perfect for a Christmas wedding.  A blast to dance in.  Lots of complements on and off the dance floor.  LOVED IT!
review_summary: This dress is made for dancing!

review_text: The length was perfect; it was not too short.  The dip in the back was a little lower than I would have liked, but that is just something to keep in mind.  The material of the skirt was thick and beautiful!
review_summary: This dress was perfect for a formal event.  I got so many compliments!

review_text: The fit was perfect for my frame. I have a shorter torso so the dress hit at just the right spot to define my waist and not over accentuate my hips. The length was a nice knee length on me. I did find the sleeves and shoulder area to be a little tight when I first tried it on, but it got more comfortable the longer I wore the dress. I wore nude peep toe wedges and simple pearl jewelry that allowed the dress to shine on it's own.
review_summary: The dress was absolutely gorgeous! I received many comments on the vibrancy of the color and the cut

review_text: Not flattering on my frame.
review_summary: It was frumpy on my petite frame.

review_text: I ordered both a 10 and 12. The 10 fit well; however, I was feeling a bit bloated the day of the shoot and opted for the 12. Overall I had no problems with it, the fabric breathes well and allows you to move easily in it.
review_summary: This style of dress was exactly what I was looking for for our engagement photos.

review_text: This would be the perfect canvas to showcase a big statement necklace (or belt, or amazing shoes, etc). However, the dress by itself lacks pizazz. I chose this as my backup option for a wedding because the mini dress/long sleeve silhouette seems really fresh. The dress is nice quality, heavy fabric (no bra required), and not as short as the pics make it look. This would probably be a flattering choice for curvy girls, but it didn't do much for my figure.
Great fit, true to size.  Could have used the 2, but it was sold out, so I got the  4 and it still worked. Although I would prefer the 2.
This dress is snug but comfortable.  It is a thick, stretchy, soft, beautiful material that made my curves look just right.
review_summary: My dress made me feel like Ms. America!

review_text: the jumper fits great! the high belted waist is slenderizing and perfect if you are generally toned but might want to hide a little tummy (post-kids or otherwise). loved the pockets!  it is super comfortable although I will agree with others that it is difficult to use the restroom without feeling  you are completely undressed.  my suggestion is it works well for shorter events where you can minimize that issue.
review_summary: I wore this jumper to a baby shower at a nice brunch spot. then wore it again on a date that night!

review_text: Super comfortable dress! Running true to size, we recommend sizing down for backup as I did find this dress ran a little big on me. The fabric does have some stretch to it and the flowy fabric definitely gives it a boho vibe. This dress would work for any bust size however due to the front lace cutout a standard bra may show a little. There is comfortable room throughout the waist and hips. At 5'4 the regular length hit right to the floor with about 3-4" heels. Perfect for work or a casual daytime event!

The fit is true to size, except when it came to the chest area. It was particulary large in the chest area, especially for a size 6 (which was a little big on me, but still worked). I'd say this dress is great for a curvy woman with a large chest and hips. Luckily, I was able to tie the back tight enough that it pulled the chest area in for me. Had it not been for the print it would have been noticeable that it was large in the chest area. You can't wear a bra with it but because the material is printed you don't need to worry about it being revealing. Overall, it fit well, especially on my short stature of 5'3". The material was light, but had a lining so I felt comfortable in it and it was impossible to wrinkle the material.

The dress was beautiful and I received compliments all night! I had to wear my backup size (the 6- which was bigger) because the ribcage/chest area was tight. I did not wear a bra with this dress. The skirt fit true to size, but wearing the larger size didn't bother me. I was able to sit comfortably without the skirt liner riding up too far and I had no skirt problems while walking around. There is little give in the fabric so I would definitely size up to be safe.
review_summary: I felt sophisticated and put together. I wore my hair in a top knot and my favorite black booties.

review_text: This dress was lovely. The fabric was heavy and had a beautiful pattern that photographs nicely in well-lit locations. if you look at it in low lighting though, the pattern is darker and more subtle. The length felt long as it hit passed my knees. I also forgot to straighten out the waist, so it bunched and twisted up a little bit. The neckline plunges low. You might want to consider wearing a push-up bra to give the bust a little more shape if you are a A or B cup..

This was SO comfortable.  I rented at 14 and 16-- very true to size-- I ended up wearing the 16 because I liked it a little larger, especially with the elastic waist.  I can't even begin to say how comfortable this was.  I would say that I don't think of myself as tall (5'6"), and I wore flat sandals and it doesn't touch the floor.  I would have loved to see what a long would have looked.
review_summary: I wore this as a teacher to my student's senior prom.

review_text: There is NO give to the material, so ladies with broader shoulders or bigger arms - it's a tight squeeze with limited mobility!

The dress was beautiful--I ordered it for a black tie wedding in NYC and it would have been perfect, but unfortunately the dress was a bit too big, which made it unflattering. I'm 5'7" about 150 lbs and usually where a size 8, but for some reason this didn't hug me, it was just too large all around. I ordered the 8R and 8L thinking that I might need the long with the 3.5" heels I was planning on wearing, but the regular length would have been perfect. Next time I'll ordered the 6R!
Super comfortable fabric, conservative overall with flair of the cut out.
review_summary: Tons of compliments on this dress!

review_text:
Loved this dress and got so many compliments! The straps are long, but you could pin them if you need to. I'm normally a 2 or 4, and the 2 fit fine (despite other reviews saying it runs small through the chest-- I'm a 32DD and didn't have a problem). 

Would love to own this dress!
I had to wear really high heels so it didn't drag, so if you are vertically challenged and only want to wear 2-3 inch heels, order the petite. I did love it though and felt great wearing it!
review_summary: Fancy without being over the top. Got lots of compliments!

review_text: Con: Zipper is a little difficult to work with.
review_summary: Wore this to the after party of my wedding. Gorgeous dress! Lots of compliments.

review_text: i'm typically a 2/4 but equipment runs large so an XS was perfect. i have broad shoulders and even the XS fit my shoulders well, plenty of room at waist, hits few inches above the knee. works well w tights for colder weather. loved the double layer skirt, gives it more volume, extremely comfortable. highly highly recommend, can easily be dressed down or worn to work then happy hr.

Dress runs true to size. I usually wear medium tops and size six dresses, but I wore the small. It fit perfect on top, but the length was a little long for me, even with heels. I would rent again, though!
review_summary: I received so many compliments on this dress! Perfect amount of elegance and comfort!

review_text: I absolutely loved this dress. It was flattering and the sequins are subtle but eye-catching. The only issue is that the dress is very short. I'm 5'2 so it wasn't an issue, but anyone over 5'5 might have an issue.
review_summary: Adored This Dress; Perfect for Short Women

review_text: In my opinion, the pictures don't do this dress justice. The deep V is really flattering without being too much for an event like a wedding. The material was nice and heavy and the dress was very flattering, so no spanx necessary. The dress does run quite large. I'm usually always a 16 and I wore the 14 and thought that was even a little roomy. I wore this to a wedding and got so many compliments on it.
review_summary: This dress if simple and gorgeous.

review_text: Unique- the pattern reminds me a bit of 80's pop art. Very tight throughout but not too short and doesn't show much cleavage, so still classy. I think with the white and bright blue it works for either day or night. I wore it for daytime and felt fine. Though tight I find Herve dresses to be super comfortable. The top on this was slightly big on me, and I have an average sized chest. If you are small on top, might need to add some padding- but the dress would easily accommodate it.

This dress fit like a dream and it is stunning in person.  Great quality and the beading on the upper portion of the dress really kicked it up a notch. I wore with a great pair of chandelier earrings and that was all that was needed.  Top it off with a classy updo to let the dress really shine.
review_summary: We had a great night of drinking and dancing and raising money for a good cause.

review_text: Fit really well.
review_summary: I wore this to a work awards ceremony and received a ton of compliments.  It's a stunning dress.

review_text: The fit runs small - I am a pretty solid size 6 and this was very snug. Additionally, if you are tall, the split in the front of the dress hit me in a very weird place when I tried it on (I'm 5'9"). I didn't feel comfortable in it even with opaque tights and I found the skirt very restrictive.
review_summary: Did not end up wearing this due to the large slit in the front of the dress!

review_text: I love this dress so much I have rented it twice. Perfect because I can wear a normal bra under it. Very flattering and forgiving and the sequins weren't a bother like I thought they would be. The second time I rented it (same size) the bust fit a bit different so I had to safety pin it, but no one could tell. Very comfortable to dance the night away in. I have a large chest so I was nervous about this being too revealing but it was great.
Super flattering and slimming, fits snug and supportive but not too tight. Very comfortable!

Rented this as an option for a wedding, but didn't end up wearing it since the material was too heavy for the humidity and the waist/hips ran large. I'm busty and the top wasn't a problem, so overall I'd say this dress runs a little large.

Admittedly I was a little nervous that the dress wouldn't fit, but this dress was perfect! The V neck gave the elegant dress a touch of sexiness. The sequins didn't scratch me or catch my hair like I thought they would. I wore this dress for a Black and White affair at my university and i don't regret it for a second. I received so many compliments and ended up on my school's fashion page. I felt flawless. I'll definitely rent again!
review_summary: Another woman told me she couldn't take her eyes off my dress all night!

review_text: This top was beautiful and generated a lot of compliments. It was flattering and comfortable to wear both to work and on the weekend. I'm only five feet tall, though, and found that it ran fairly short so taller ladies please be advised!
Fit great and was comfortable. I got a ton of compliments.
The fit is tight - needed a friend to help zip it up, but on the pro side, no need for a bra and stayed put all night.  Really fun shape and color, with great material!  Overall loved it.

I really enjoyed wearing this dress and felt comfortable in it.  The colors were beautiful.  There was a little too much exposure in the bust area if I didn't really work hard to stand up straight.  The length was good, but like other reviewers, I did find that it frequently caught on my heels as I walked.  Overall, I really liked wearing the dress and would consider it again.

This is a lovely dress but wasn't quite right for me. I got is as my back up dress to try for another event. It's eye catching and I can see why others loved it. It fit me perfectly and is very flattering. But the color didn't seem to compliment me.  Bummer because I loved the color of the dress!

This dress is very cute.  The "cape" style sleeves are an interesting detail, and overall it is a great casual dress.  I am 5"10", so I thought it was a little short for what I would be comfortable with, but I wore it anyway for a daytime event.  Probably not long enough to wear to work, though!  As other reviews have stated, there is no stretch in the fabric, so the waist seam was tight.  Definitely size up for comfort!

I am usually a size 2 or 4, but ended up wearing the 6.  The 4 fit me fine, but the 6 gave me a little bit more room to move around but was not big on me.  The inner liner was maybe a little too long and stuck out past the dress when I sat, but standing it was not noticeable.  I would rent this again.
The XS was not as snug as desired in the chest area for me.  With that said, it didn't hinder my dancing through the night!  The material is thick and high quality.  The skirt is fun to spin in!
review_summary: Such a fun dress to wear to a Cape Cod wedding!

review_text: I'm glad I read reviews from others with similar height/weight, because I changed my order to include a higher size and ended up wearing that.  The dress is gorgeous, flattering, and comfortable.  You will need  stick-on bra.
review_summary: Gorgeous color and style -- perfect for a nice event.

review_text: The material is really soft and comfy and the style is fun. Fit was a little small if you're big-busted, even the 12 was sliding off to the sides. Definitely has a very Michael Jackson meets Chanel vibe which is what I loved about it. It IS warm so if you'll be wondering around in 60° weather and want a sweater alternative this is a great choice.

I was so excited about this dress.  Unfortunately, it arrived in a 10R rather than the 10L I ordered, and so it barely touched the floor when I wore flats.  Not a good look.  Otherwise, it is a beautiful, classic silhouette, and the beadwork on the shoulder is stunning.

This dress was surprisingly comfortable and warm. I ended up forgoing a bra because I couldn't find a low back option with enough support but the dress fit so well it wasn't necessary. I got tons of compliments from other women and even a kiss on the hand by a total stranger. I felt amazing and confident in this dress but I have to mention that the material on one of the sleeves was torn away from the elastic band at the wrist. Fortunately, it wasn't noticeable at all except for the random sequin that fell off from time to time.

This was my backup if the short version of the dress was too short and I decided not to wear it. I am very tall, but this hem hit me in the most unfortunate spot. Sort or an inch or two above the ankle. So bad. If I wasn't so curvy in the tummy and butt, maybe it would have laid better, but it was just awful. I guess the 22L would have been better (I thought I did order the long). The short one looked fun and sexy, where as the long one looked matronly and heavy. Hated it!
Fun, preppy, and easy to wear.
review_summary: Almost bought it, the pockets are amazing and the fit is great for an hourglass girl

review_text: Being 8 weeks postpartum, I was a bit nervous going out for the first time since having my baby. Luckily, RTR to the rescue. I had a lot of trouble with fit as I wasn't used to my "new" (and temporary) body. RTR was super helpful in getting me into the right size and even overnighting me an 8 when the 6 ended up making my girls pop a little too much for my liking. It's also long for us shorties, so get the heels ready! The dress is a show stopper and even the bride made sure to tell me how much she loved it. Don't hesitate to rent this is you don't mind getting lots of attention! ;)
review_summary: Great dress for a formal holiday wedding!

review_text: This dress is so much better looking in person. It stands out against a sea of black but it less subtle than sequins.  Being petite, the straps didn't quite fit and it was a bit long even with heels
review_summary: gorgeous dress worn to a fundraiser

review_text: Such a fun pattern and comfy fit for casual summer days. The defined waist also gives an hour glass shape. One thing I will recommend is if you are larger chested definitely go up a size or 2. I am a size 32a and the 0 was very snug on me without a bra.
a little on the longer side, hit at or below my knee. very comfortable.
review_summary: beautiful color and lace, many compliments

review_text: I wore this to the office and to a daytime brunch and got a lot of compliments.  It's more low-cut than I expected, but with the long sleeves, it still felt modest enough for a more casual day at the office.  The fabric is a cotton, so it's not fancy.  I wore this early in my second trimester, and, at least at that stage, it was bump friendly!
Very comfortable for the most part. My only complaint would be that the material doesn't have any stretch and a tiny bit would be nice in the arm area (I have muscular shoulders/arms).
review_summary: Very classic look! Perfect for a work show and drink after.

review_text: Great fit! Lots of compliments!
review_summary: Perfect for a night out in St. Lucia!

review_text: The dress has the perfect fit.
The shoulder details are exquisite.

I took the advice of others in assuming this dress runs a bit small - I normally wear a 4, but the 6 fit perfectly! (By the end of the night, it was getting a bit uncomfortable around the ribs, so I can only imagine how tight the 4 would have been!)  I normally wear a Long, but wanted to wear flats, so chose the regular - it was maybe an inch too short, but worked well with the shoes I had!  I would highly recommend this dress - its very flattering & elegant!
review_summary: Elegant fit with the right amount of shine!

review_text: I didn't get to wear this dress to my event as the zipper was extremely hard to get up.The dress fit fine once we got it but it took me and my two roommates to  get the zipper over the part where the bottom of the dress connects with the top.

This dress was great!  It fit really well and was very comfortable.  The only negative is that the length is a little odd so it made walking up stairs and getting into the car a little difficult.  I'm 5'3", 140 lbs and the medium fit perfectly.
review_summary: This dress was perfect for an outdoor wedding!

review_text: I also wore this for my wedding after party.  The back is the best part.  I didn't wear a bra and it wasn't see through.  It was very comfortable too.
review_summary: I rented this for my rehearsal dinner, and it was beautiful.

review_text: Great for a hot summer day!
I love this you can dress it up or dress it down ! It was comfortable for a jumpsuit and I got asked where I got my outfit all night long.
review_summary: great comfortable outfit for any occasion

review_text: This dress was perfect for my best friend's bridal shower that was an evening cocktail party. The color popped and the overall fit of the dress was fantastic.
review_summary: The color and fit of this dress made it an absolute standout!

review_text: I got so many compliments on this dress!! I have pretty average sized hips but it hugged them much tighter than I expected. I might have worn the 6, but it was too big in the top. However, I think the tightness only bothered me because everyone else said it looked fine!! If I rented this dress again I would get a 6 long. I am 5'9" and it was just a tad too short and I was wearing flats.
review_summary: Very classy, just not quite the fit I was expecting.

review_text: This style runs a bit large, so you should size down from your usual size for your back up. It is better for larger busted women, as there is a lot of room in that area. The perfect dress for a holiday party this season. Pair with gold accessories and shoes!

I rented this dress for my son's baptism.  While modifying a previous rental, I was nervous I would need a bigger size in this dress and changed my size selection.  When I received my shipment I was surprised to see they sent me all three sizes (8,10,12).  It was a good thing they did, because I wound up needing the 8.  RTR customer service is great!! 
My only fear in renting this dress and reading the other reviews was that it would be too short.  I am 5'6 and always feel like dresses are too short on me, even when they really aren't.  It wasn't THAT short, I did get away with wearing it, I was just mindful in any movements I made.  I was able to wear regular undergarments and it was not tight on my midsection.  It was a very comfortable fit. I was happy with this rental and received a lot of compliments on it.  I just wish it was a little longer, but overall a great rental.

Both the 10 and the 12 fit me but I ended up going with the 12 because it didn't show as much chest. (There was more than enough room in the chest for even a large chested woman) 
Very nice fabric and hangs nicely. The tuxedo flap wasn't overboard and worked to help cover my problem area in the waist. Would highly recommend!
The fit was snug, but like a bandage dress, was very flattering.  It was quite comfortable to wear, and I received many compliments.
Gorgeous colors!
review_summary: Beautiful skirt that can be dressed up or down. Made me feel elegant and flirty!

review_text: I had so much fun wearing this dress! It hugs your curves in all of the right places, and the black lace back is unique and sexy. I used it for two occasions - an evening at the ballet and then a daytime wedding reception. The dress is super comfy and I got lots of compliments on it. I would highly recommend renting it.
It fits great! It was loose in the mid section which I appreciated. Kinda short when I sat down. I rented this to take some save the date photos and wedding dress shopping.

Wore it to a 40th birthday party. The top is rather low cut, but with some double sided tape you are good to go. I haven't done a romper before and was pleasantly surprised with how it fit and looked, very comfortable and the color was gorgeous!

What a shame this dress was too large! My backup/smaller size was unavailable so unfortunately I ended up wearing a different dress I had rented as a backup. I would rent it again, but next time would rent one and even TWO sizes smaller! 
The website will not allow me to update my profile/size so here it is:
Height: 5"6
Weight: 140lbs
Bust: 32DDD
Normally wear size 10 dress-- the dress I ordered was a 10 and it was so loose that the fabric covering the bust fell a full inch below the edge of my strapless bra. Keep in mind the sheer fabric of the neckline and arms is very sheer. You would see a nude bra strap and this necessitates a low cut strapless bra. 
This dress is colorful, dramatic and elegant-- absolutely gorgeous.
review_summary: Dress is gorgeous, but runs large

review_text: Great fit and a very comfortable dress. I got a lot of compliments!

the dress was a little loose
normally waer a 6 and the 4 was still a little big

I loved this dress, but it didn't fit me quite right.  Its a beautiful fabric and color.  I am usually a O or 2 and 115, 5'5 and 32C.  I ordered the 2 based on other comments.  The length and hips were great, but the waist was very snug (fit but uncomfortable while sitting) and the bodice was a little loose.
review_summary: Beautiful Dress Just Not For Me

review_text: I wore this top with dressy black shorts for a night out and then with black pants for work.  Lots of compliments from co-workers.  The top is slightly heavy so with the high neck it is not great for spending a lot of time outdoors on a super warm day but otherwise no complaints.
review_summary: Great top for work and fun!

review_text:
I rented this dress for a black tie wedding.  It is even prettier in person.  
I ordered the Long and am so happy I did.  I am 5'8" and wore 4" heels and it was the perfect length.  I was able to wear a regular bra. I got complements all evening. I would definitely recommend his dress!
It was a little short, but so comfortable. I wore it to a friend's wedding, and got so many compliments! I would definitely rent this again!

This dress is awesome! It was everything I had hoped it would be. I'm really glad I ordered the 4R and the 6R. They weren't too different except that the 6R had a bit more fabric bunching up right at the waistline. Unless you are a true 2 I would highly recommend getting the 4R, and the 6R as back up, depending on the size of your bust. Sometimes I can wear a 2 depending on the dress, but I don't think the 2 would have fit me. This dress is fun, photographs well (especially while dancing and twirling), and made me feel so pretty. ***Look out for the long tulle back when getting out of vehicles or standing up from a seated position. Your heels can easily catch the back of the dress and tear the tulle.
review_summary: I wore this dress for a pre-wedding photo shoot and LOVED it!! Pretty, comfortable, and fun!

review_text: This dress is absolutely beautiful. It was the perfect amount of sexy.  I usually wear a 4-6 in dresses; depends on the brand. I ordered the 4r & 6r. I felt and looked like a sausage in the 4r, but only felt like a sausage in the 6 (thank goodness for spanx). The length was perfect, the color was perfect, but the straps kept falling and I could've gone up a size or lost weight( didn't have time for either).  Either way, I'm happy that I chose RTR ; I felt and looked great
review_summary: I felt absolutely beautiful. Compliments were flowing like a fountain of my favorite Cabernet.

review_text: I received lots of compliments in this stunning leather gown. I am 5'6" and the gown just skimmed the floor when I was shoeless. I liked the deep v in the front and in the back, and I ended up wearing this without a bra because the v in the back was just enough to show the strap of every bra I tried it with. It didn't matter, because the bodice fit very well and I felt comfortable all night. The dress is lined and the leather is matte and lightweight. My backup size was 6 and that fit nicely too but not snug enough up top to go bra less.

Loved the dress, it was exactly what I imagined when I rented it.  This was my first RTR experience and I was not disappointed.  I wore it to a North Carolina fall wedding. This dress is comfortable, even on the arms which was a concern.  It was somewhat restrictive when it came to raising the roof on the dance floor...but perhaps that's in everyone's best interest. :)
Great color and material. Only issue was that the 8R was so short! I'm only 5'6" and wore maybe 4 inch heels and couldn't stand the way they looked together!

I probably teeter between a size 6 and an 8 and the size  6 fit perfectly.  I didn't have to wear a bra and I was very comfortable all night.  The material is a bit thicker than you would expect and it was nice to have "coverage" and not be see through or thin.  It is a dark dark green color, but looks black.  I wore gold jewelry and black heels.  I love this dress.
review_summary: I wore this dress for my 20 year high school reunion that was held in a banquet hall.

review_text: I rented this dress in my usual size 2 and a backup size 4. I ended up wearing the 4  because the slip beneath the chiffon was a little too tight on the 2. If you are curvy at all on the bottom, I would recommend ordering up a size as a back up. The other reviews are correct in that the top doesn't lay flat if you are small chested. I had to get creative with some fashion tape, but it stayed in place all night. It flowed beautifully when I walked and looked great in photographs. I received tons of compliments! It's a timeless, classy dress!
It fit perfect just the smell when they arrived I had to taken them both to be cleaned. In the end the jumper was comfy and worked well with the High Tea Bridal Shower theme
review_summary: It was my niece Bridal Shower and it was a high tea affair. The jumper was perfect.

review_text: I wore this to an outdoor vintage country wedding. It was perfect for the occasion!   I wore it with a jcrew necklace that made it perfect! The dress was the right length for my 5'4 frame if I was any taller I wouldn't be able to lift my arms. Not easy to buckle shoes in this dress so you may need some help:) I received so many complements and was told I looked classy and sexy!!
This dress is really comfortable. It's simple but the pattern gives it a little something extra.

It was prefect for the black tie wedding we attended. A little long though - I'm 5'9 and wore 3.5 inch heels and it was still a little long but it worked out. I should have ordered the regular not the long.

I'm on the board of a nonprofit that does an annual "Blue and Green Gala" so I needed something in that color palette. This romper was so much fun and I will have a hard time improving on it at this year's event! I tied a green scarf around the waist to pull the whole green/blue theme together and got lots of compliments. One word of warning: I'm very short so the length wasn't an issue for me but I could see it being an issue for people who've cracked 5'.
review_summary: Fun and different take on a gala look

review_text: I wore this dress to a cocktail charity event and felt like the loveliest woman in the room!  This dress was exactly as pictured with one exception. I am busty, 36D, and the neckline looked very different on me than it does on the model. Lots of cleavage! My husband didn't mind though! The fit was amazing and I am curvy, the fabric had just the right amount of give. I can see it looking lovely also on a figure less so, like the model pictured. Loved the colors and the bit of shimmer. I wore it with the necklace pictured and while it was lovely and did pair well with the dress, it was a bit over the top for me personally because of the aforementioned cleavage issue but overall I was delighted.

Very beautiful dress, but watch out if you have full hips - under the sheer overlay there is a tight fitting dress that does not have any stretch.  Also, although the description says it can be worn with any normal bra, I don't agree - because the material was so sheer on top, only a strapless bra would really the best.
Overall fit comfortable. It's not long, so I have a longer torso which didn't make it as flowy on me. The back is really cute. Overall better for shorter girls.

I loved the flowy material and the way the dress moved. It fit perfectly and I wish I could own it! I'm 5'5" and was able to wearing 3.5" heels with the dress just barely touching the ground. The zipper was difficult but I was able to do it on my own. I tried to get away with wearing a regular bra but my straps kept sliding out so I recommend taking others' suggestions and wearing either a racerback or no bra at all. I got compliments on this dress all night and would rent again if the opportunity present's itself!
review_summary: This dress was stunning and I felt like a princess all night!

review_text: Super flattering! I am usually a size 6/M.  I have a DD chest and this dress was so flattering on.
review_summary: Dress looked amazing! Not my style, but thought I would give it a try!

review_text: I usually wear a size 0 and decided to wear the MR as it was more comfortable around the neck and chest area. I would say this dress runs small. Loved the dress. It was very easy to wear once I decided to wear the bigger size.

This was an adorable piece, I enjoyed wearing it and got a lot of compliments. My only complaint is the shoulders kept wanting to creep up, so I was constantly pulling them down and the elastic was very uncomfortable on my arms. Runs large! I wore a size down.
review_summary: Super cute and fun romper! Very classic with a twist of sexy.

review_text: Not sure how the crowd was going to accept my eclectic style figured the majority of the party-goers for this event would wear black. This dress is a stand out in a sea of black dresses.  I wanted to stand out but not too much. The blue is rich, vibrant and the cut of the dress a head-turner for the curvy girl.
review_summary: This dress is a stand out in a sea of black dresses.

review_text: Loved the pattern on this dress but it was too wide around the waist. I wore a cross-body purse with it which gave me some shape but it looked a bit like a maternity dress!
Fits great. I ordered a medium and a large, and the medium fit like a glove. It was the most perfect dress I've ever worn. The arms were a bit itchy but nothing major.
review_summary: I wore this dress for my 21st birthday and was, by far, the best dressed in the room.

review_text: Fit it very tight but in a flattering way, just make sure you are aware it will be exact so you may want to get a size bigger just in case, the straps in the back pops out a bit so make sure to keep a nice posture. After that super sexy everyone loved it specially my boyfriend so ladies it is an awesome dress to rent.
review_summary: Love the color and the detail This Dress is super sexy. Only problem it Runs a bit small.

review_text:
I rented both the xs and sm both fit almost identical! I ended up wearing the xs because the hem on the sm was just not laying right! 
I paired this dress with all rose gold accessories and received complements on how beautiful my dress was!
 This dress was so comfortable, elegant and did not make me hot at all with all the dancing I did
review_summary: This dress was so comfortable it made the night even more unforgettable . Love love love this dress!

review_text: This is a very feminine, bright and fun dress for dancing all night at a wedding.  The unique silhouette and vibrant colors made it stand out.  I was at a family wedding but got lots of compliments from strangers.  It was a little short in the front, but the longer hem in the back made me feel justified wearing it to a church ceremony.
review_summary: Perfect for standing out at a spring wedding

review_text: It was super hot in Mexico especially at 5pm when the wedding started. Loved that this material was heavy enough not to sweat through but light enough that I wasn't dying wearing the dress. The dress runs true to size though definitely shows any curves your body has so spanx was necessary to keep it all together! Would totally rent again. I got so many compliments and the dress photographs really well....
review_summary: Perfect Dress for a Destination Wedding!

review_text: Hard to zip.  Did not end up wearing.  Pretty gown, but not as pretty as picture
This top was awesome. Paired it with both cut-off jean shorts for daytime and skinny dark jeans for evening.

As others have said, it runs a bit long for a shorter girl (Im 5'2") but it was classy and elegant for the conservative wedding I attended.  At first it seemed tight in the sleeves but I didn't notice it throughout the night.  The 4 was too baggy on me.  The color is unique and lovely.
review_summary: Even strangers in the bathroom complemented me!

review_text: I rented this for my engagment party and I loved it! Being petite the back did gap some but with some fasion tape everything staeyed in place. Since I usually flex between two sizes it was great that i was sent two sizes. The dress itself was in great conditon and it was even prettier in person. I would highly recomend this dress!

Pros:
The dress was fitted and fit great!  But, wearing a bra was not a true option.  I had to wear a stick on bra and it worked out fine.  However, perhaps clear duct tape would have been more "supportive."  The color was gorgeous, the fabric was nice and thick, so if you weren't self conscious like myself, you could go bra-less.  LOVED that I could put a blazer over it and it's an unsuspecting work dress and take off the blazer and it has tons of WOW factor.  Would definitely recommend renting this dress! 

The ONLY Con:
And maybe this was just for me - the zipper in the back does pucker a bit and this contributes to the dress riding up as you walk.  I assume most folks don't mind that...but it was a cold night - and I LOVED the elegant look of the dress at my knees.  But, truth be told - NOT a big deal at all.
review_summary: Great dress for a night out on the town - get ready for some head turns!

review_text: This was the first time I wore something with such a deep plunge so I felt pretty daring. Between that and sparkling all over, it made quite a statement and I received many compliments from strangers. I opted for adhesive bra cups but I'm sure there are other options that would work, maybe with some creative pinning, since the dress has actual straps. The length was okay since I was wearing low heels, but if you're tall and plan to wear high heels, probably look for a long length. I'm generally between a 14 and 16 and this fit perfectly in 14. I would definitely rent this again, or one of the many similar colors/cuts from Badgley Mischka.

The medium weight was perfect for a fall wedding in Boston. I paired with a nude heel since the color was so unique. Very comfortable and flattering to wear. I did not have any issues with the sleeves being too tight but I could not comfortably lift my arms above my shoulder height because it would pull up the rest of the torso fabric in an awkward way (not really a big deal for a semi-formal wedding).
review_summary: Loved the color for a fall wedding, perfect length for dancing!

review_text: Great fit, only thing was the low plunge and having to wear a bra. In some photos you can see my bra.
review_summary: This dress was perfect for my bridal shower!

review_text: This dress was exactly what I wanted for my event. As noted by other reviewers, the fabric is lighter than the average full-length gown, which made the dress breathable and easy to dance in. I loved the double slits, which added drama and movement. The fabric is thin, so it is not the best choice if you are looking for a bump-friendly dress. As for sizing, it is true to American sizing, not couture sizing, so no need to size-up. I wore the 4R but would have probably been a little more comfortable in the 2. Overall, I really liked this dress and would recommend it!

I ordered this dress for my engagement party and ended up wearing the back up dress and loving it so much more.  It was really large up top and smaller on the bottom.  If It was mine and I could alter it, I would have loved it, but with such a large top it just was not flattering.

I loved this dress! It was so beautiful and received complements throughout the night. I ordered a 0 with a 2 as my back-up size and went with the 0. The 0 was a little snug around my bottom half, but the 2 was a bit loose at the top. I could have gone with either; I just preferred to have the top fitted so that the layer under the lace wouldn't dip too low. I ended up wearing a strapless bra with this (the back is high enough that it's covered), but I also probably could have gone without one. The dress was definitely longer on me that it is on the model, but the picture I included makes it look an inch or two longer than it actually was.

As an aside about RTR, I had scheduled the dress to arrive the day before I had to fly out for the wedding, but the UPS center lost power and the dress hadn't come before I had to leave. I called RTR (in a panic), and they had the dress (in both the original and back-up sizes) overnighted to my hotel for no extra charge. They didn't have the earrings I had ordered, so they sent me an upgraded pair. On top of all of this, the person I spoke with at RTR was so incredibly kind and made everything really easy. I'd recommend this dress and RTR to anyone!
This dress was very effortless. It had more sparkle than anticipated, but it was not too much. You will need double sided tape to prevent any slips.
The front of this dress fits nicely as a shift, but the back is the real show. The length and size was great. Usually a 4, I sized down to a 2 and felt very comfortable.

Loved this dress! It photographed so well for my engagement photos. I ordered both the 4L and 6L, the 4L was too short even without heels. I am 5'8" and with 3" heels the 6L worked much better. The neckline also was cutting into my neck so I was pulling it down a lot but overall I loved this dress.
I wore this during the daytime for a picnic. Very breathable and comfortable. Loved this top and would 100% rent again!
review_summary: Loved! Super cute and easy to wear!

review_text: This was such a cute pattern and fabric. I wore this to work and traveled home. It was certainly an eye catcher! I recommend belting it to show off your curves.

I was receiving compliments all night long. The dress is super comfortable and fun to wear. The shorter front makes it easier to walk, while the longer train adds the glam. The pleats and thicker fabric allow the dress to billow out too, which is lovely. I also loved the pockets. One thing to point out is that the dress is quite heavy so if you plan on dancing, be prepared to hold up your dress as people will step on your train. I give this dress a 4 out of 5, is because the dress had a bit too much room in the chest area for size 0. I am an A cup, and there was room in the dress for a C cup at least. I did read previous reviews that the dress was great for larger breasts, but I assumed the size of the cup would be adjusted for size 0.  Stick on cups were my best friends that night.

I wore it to the Met Opera and I stole the show. This dress is a show stopper. All eyes were on me, I was the center of attraction, the queen of the night and a shining star. The compliments were nonstop.
The dress fits just fine. I ordered size 6R and 8R but ended up wearing the 6R. I'm usually between size 4 and 6. The 6 was perfect. The only issue with this dress is that I wish the regular length was longer but other than that, everything was perfect. Do not waste time renting this dress, just get it now! You will be glad you did.

The dress fit nicely, though looking back I would have worn spanx as the skirt doesn't flare out all that much. The color is amazing. The dress was also surprisingly cool. I wore it to a reception dinner, outside in 90 degree heat, and stayed comfortable the whole time.
review_summary: This dress kept me cool in the heat!

review_text: I wore this dress to a summer wine festival last August. I received a ton of compliments on it. The material is good quality, very nice and thick. There is no stretch. I normally wear a size 6 or 8 in Lilly dresses and I sized up to the 8 for this dress.
review_summary: Perfect dress for a girls day out!

review_text: I rented this dress for a gala. Loved the stretch to the fabric and the cutout! The dress was comfortable and easy to dance in. The only con was that I felt like the dress was a little short with heels.
review_summary: Comfortable dress, true to size, a little short

review_text:
Great for an all day event, easy to dress up and down with different accessories. Color pops anywhere. 
Would recommend, but the drawstring can be bit frumpy on us short girls.
I loved wearing this dress. The sleeves make it very unique but still a classic. The velvet is so soft! Wore with black suede wedges for a powerful look.

Classy, comfy, gorgeous and fun to twirl around/dance in!  You can't tell from the photos, but the dress is connected with nude mesh at the midsection.  I'm 5'4 and the XSR was the perfect length with 3 inch heels.

This dress was recommended by a stylist after my original pick arrived damaged.  The stylist hit this nail on the head with the recommendation!   The dress was great for the environment- classy yet sexy.   The fabric was very nice and just made me feel great wearing it.   I would definitely rent this dress again.   I paired it with boots and it was great!
review_summary: Wasn't my original pick but I ended up feeling like a million dollars!

review_text: The fit was great and tight enough on top to go without a bra! The dress is heavier in person then it looks online but was overall a gorgeous dress for the outdoor tea party we went to and would be a perfect holiday or wedding guest dress! I usually wear a 4 or 6 and the 6 fit perfectly
review_summary: The dress fit so true to size and was so pretty in person!

review_text: If you have wide hips like I do it is snug in that area.  I am a size 8 and wore a large and found it very snug in the hips.  So I would say ti runs on the small side. Since when is a size 8 considered large?
review_summary: This dress is a great attention grabber at work.  It is stylish & unique with its flared out sleeves

review_text: Rented this dress with my $50 Pro credit to wear out for my birthday dinner. It was casual enough that I didn't feel overdressed at the restaurant, but glitzy enough that I felt special on my birthday. I absolutely love the fabric and color. The dress was a bit loose in the waist but that didn't really matter. My only complaint is that there are sequins right under the arms that ended up being a little irritating by the end of the night. For a size reference, I am usually between a 16 in regular sizes and a 14W in plus, and this dress seemed to be very true to the size chart.

I felt like a billion bucks! Loved this dress. I was confused and a bit nervous after reading all of the reviews, because I wasn't sure what to expect and didn't have a backup plan. I did have to go a size up from my  usual size, and I wouldn't have minded a bit more length and would probably go with the long rather than regular length if I could do it again. But it didn't matter that much because of the wrap-around style and short skirt in front. I wore edgy, lace-up shoes with my hair loose and bouncy to balance it all out. It definitely has a gunmetal shimmer and works well with dark silvery accessories. And at an event with 10,000 people, I never saw anyone else with the same dress on so I was happy about that. My only complaint is that it doesn't have any stretch, so it's a bit confining. But overall, I loved it and would absolutely recommend it for any black tie affair!

The dress fit very well.  I liked the sleeves as it was very cold that night (it even snowed a little bit).  I got many compliments.  I also liked to color as I wore it for a Christmas party and everyone else was in red, green, or black.  I would rent this dress again.
This was perfect for work.  I wish I had purchased it!

I wore this to my boyfriends holiday party. I ended up wearing a size lower than usual since the cutout looks better when it's fitted. The material has a little stretch and it was form fitting. I loved the color and paired it with a statement necklace and nude pumps. I recommend this dress and thought it was both cute and flattering!
I wore this for my bridal shower, and while it wasn't near as white as you're led to believe, it was even cuter than I anticipated on.
The dress looked great.  Fit exactly as expected.  The lace arms were flattering (not too tight) and the length was just at the knee...very classy and comfortable.
review_summary: Wore it to a rehearsal dinner for a good friend's wedding.  It was classy and pretty, felt great.

review_text: Very pretty dress.  Runs pretty true to size (I haven't gotten back to my profile stats post baby).  Runs kinda long (I am 5'4" and wore like 3.5" heels and maybe should have gone petite).  Also, I did not realize low back when I booked it so had to get some last minute undergarment fix but the low back ended up being fun.
review_summary: Beautiful color - business in front and party in back!

review_text: I ordered a MR and LL (since ML isn't an option for this style). I'm 5'11 so the long size was a must for me. Incredibly happy with this style!
review_summary: I received so many compliments on this dress! Highly recommend!

review_text: This skirt is super cute. The waistline hits at your natural waist and is not too tight to cause discomfort. Because I'm so short, the skirt hit a bit longer on me than on the model but was still above my knees.

The colors of this dress are absolutely beautiful, picture doesn't do it justice. I received so many compliments throughout the entire day, I felt like a Princess! I normally wear an 8 and this fit very well, has a little bit of "give" to the material. If I were to rent this particular dress again, I would probably get the 10 because the neckline and the chest are a bit snug. Absolutely loved this dress and so did everyone else!
A beautiful dress but a bit too formal for work so I was unable to wear it. I wish that I had an event to wear it to because it was comfortable and fit perfectly
review_summary: A beautiful dress but a bit too formal for work so I was unable to wear it. I wish that I had an eve

review_text: I loved this dress! Usually mumus do not work for me- I'm on a slender build so I usually look swallowed up in them, but for whatever reason, this dress looked amazing. I think it's probably a sisterhood of the traveling dress type deal. I loved the ties around the neck and sleeve details. I wasn't sunburned but it would've been great for too much sun due to the loose fit or if on vacation you are ready for a big dinner, you won't have to worry about looking great versus eating all the seafood you can!
review_summary: Perfect vacation dress after a long day in the sun!

review_text: I felt like a million bucks! I went with the 10, even though I am normally an 8 as it felt more comfortable in the bust.  I got a ton of compliments on the dress, the color and neckline are BEAUTIFUL. Would 100% rent again and recommend to others.
review_summary: The neckline on this dress is SO flattering.

review_text: Loved the black and olive combination on this dress and the shape all the detailing gave me. I went up a size after reading some reviews that this could be tight through the bust, and the S was a perfect fit. Very comfortable for work and will definitely be renting again!

I am the queen of black for all occasions, so this was a very out of the box choice for me. Loved this dress! I was nervious it wouldnt fit, I am curvy and very busty. Very flattering fit. As someone who is large chested i loved being able to wear a bra and not having to worry about any straps showing. The dress was stunning. It looks more yellow gold in the picture, but it is actually a pinkish gold. Great first experience on rent the runway!!! And I got tons of compliments, especialy from my husband.
review_summary: The dress came on time, it firt, i got tons of compliments, especialy from my husband. And sending it back was simple as can be!

review_text: The 4 was a smidge too big on me and the 2 was just a wee bit tight, but I wore the 2 because the fit looked better. However, after dinner I was really wishing I had the 4 in my car to change into!! :) The sleeves are very cute, but your arm range is limited. It wasn't the most comfortable dress I've ever worm, but it was really cute and different and I was very happy with my rental!

Beautiful dress.  Received multiple compliments.  Photographs beautifully.   Runs long (I'm 5'7" and wore 3 inch heels) and I had to pick up my dress to walk all night.   Granted, as it drapes beautifully, it looked nice even as I carried it.  I found it slipped on me and I spent a lot of time pulling up the dress.
review_summary: A little girl on the street squealed, "Mommy! It's a princess!" as I walked by.

review_text: I didn't order this dress and the fit was kind of weird. The front ruffle made it look a bit like a nursing shirt.
review_summary: I didn't end up wearing this dress

review_text: I really liked this dress, but I could have gotten a size, or even two sizes, smaller. It just hung on me, but with a belt, it worked.
Length was good with 3" heels. Back was a bit tight but I have broad shoulders. Overall, great dress. Loved the lace!
review_summary: Very comfortable and elegant. Received many compliments!

review_text: This dress is a beautiful vibrant red so perfect for the holiday season! It is elegant yet very sexy and so comfortable!! I have yet to see a designer execute that combination as well as Nicole Miller! The fabric has enough stretch for my very curvy figure, which made it easy to dance & eat as much as I wanted :) HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!

The fabric is a bit stiff, which is probably why it holds a wrinkle. After sitting at my desk most of the day, the dress ended up all wrinkled even though I had steamed it before wearing. I do love the print. I'd rent this again if I knew I'd be standing all day in the dress.

Heeded the warning of some other reviews. Did not wear it backwards!

This dress fit me like a glove!  Petite friendly dress! Herve Leger never disappoints. The bandages keeps everything together and the top surprisingly did not keep falling down for me. I am usually very small chested, so I was surprised the top stayed; but I did use fashion tape as an extra measure. It is very tight, so you will definitely need another person to help you get into this dress!

I actually ordered this with the intent of wearing the 2R but because of my cup size (DDD), it didn't work. The 4R managed to accommodate my cup size without being too big everywhere else. The built in bra helped, however, I still had to tug the dress up every now and again to make sure it didn't slide down too much. 

The dress did come very wrinkled. The wedding was out of state, so I steamed it before I packed it and still ironed it before I wore it.
review_summary: The dress is so beautiful. I received compliments all night long.

review_text: I wore this over a simple pair of leggings on a day I was running errands just to bump up the outfit a little bit. The top was SUPER soft and comfy but found it a little boxy and not flattering. Plus it wrinkled extremely easily so didn't look the same at the end of the day. Still a cute, versatile top though! If I were to rent this again, I would wear it to work instead

Wore this to to work and everyone loved it! Colors are cheerful and stand out. I was the best-dressed lawyer in town that day! Wore it again out to dinner at one of the better local restaurants too. It was too big but fabric was very comfortable and flattering--knit, but not too clingy, and it hung so beautifully that it still looked good. Arrived brand-new with tags on. Great pick RTR!

The dress was beautiful: the blue just as rich as in the pictures and the gold lace stunning in person. I received compliments all night. The material was a heavier, stretchy material. It was comfort, but very fitted. Because it was so fitted, I sized up and wore shapewear to smooth out reality and accentuate the right curves. I would wear this dress again.
review_summary: We attended an awards dinner celebrating outstanding physicians in our community.

review_text:
Had to wear the larger size (I rented a 6 and an 8).  The 6 fit everywhere aside from the chest/shoulders area.  Lace does not 'give' at all and I didn't want to run the risk of ripping the dress from hugging someone or busting out the wrong dance move...LOL!
My friend pictured with me actually rented her dress as well - they were very similar in style.
Overall, very nice dress for a classy, elegant event.
