review_summary: Felt great in this classic lace dress!

review_text: It was tight around the bust and needed help zipping it up, I am a 36C - This dress has no give to it! The pleats in the skirt and the pockets made the dress. Photographs really well.
review_summary: Felt beautiful in the dress! Perfect for Easter brunch.

review_text: The band has no give, so don't overeat! The pockets are fantastic. I wore a sticky nubra. Quality is great and I looked amazing in the dress. Wore it for a surprise wedding anniversary party.
review_summary: Loved wearing a pretty new dress.

review_text: I loved wearing this jumpsuit! It was comfortable and flattering. Bonus - I could put it on and take it off by myself, which is a big deal when nature calls during the evening. Definitely pair a great necklace with this jumpsuit. As others have said, the snap does come undone sometimes when hugging people or dancing, but nothing that can't be fixed with fashion tape or a safety pin. I received so many compliments. Loved it!
review_summary: Fabulous Jumpsuit for a Disco Party

review_text: I ordered the 6R & 8R. The 6 fit but the 8 looked & flowed over the body better. It's quite low cut so if you're not comfortable with the girls showing out, you may not want to rent this dress. I just sewed in a little stitch to keep it from being too revealing. The dress was long on me (5'1" with 4" heels) but I just picked up the dress as I walked. I got compliments all night on the dress and I felt like a movie star. Definitely would rent again!
review_summary: If you don't like being the center of admiration, don't tent this dress. :D

review_text: Nice is definitely the description for this dress. I wore this for work, so that's not a bad thing! It is light and perfect for warm spring and summer days. It buttons down the front, so if you are on the busty side the buttons may strain. I did like that there was a hook to keep the waist closed in addition to the button. Many of the dresses from RTR get a "wow" out of my husband, but this one only elicited "it's nice" and "safe." Considering I was wearing it to work "nice" and "safe" are fine descriptors in my opinion. A better way to describe it would be well made and conservative!

RTR to the rescue!  Due to my zipper mishap, they gave me a full refund and I look forward to renting from them again.  

Dress was gorgeous.  Fabric has no stretch.  Small shoulder pads.  Jersey lining makes the dress a bit heavy but I'm sure very warm.  Zipper was dry and hard to zip up and down....hence, why it broke before I could wear it.
review_summary: Love the dress as soon as I tried it on...unfortunately, the zipper broke before I could wear it.

review_text: It fit perfectly even without a bra. The details were gorgeous. Received so many compliments on this dress. I am so happy that I went with this dress.
review_summary: This dress was amazing! It suited my figure and venue perfectly!

review_text: I rented this for my bachelorette party in Vegas and was thrilled when it arrived. It is truly radiant, made me feel incredibly special...and the compliments from strangers all night sure didn't hurt :) if you are a bride to be, look no further than this shows topper!
i think another reviewer said they borrowed it for Halloween to channel Wednesday Adams.  i rented it for work. flattering fit, material is thicker.  fun to accessorize with bracelets and rings.
The sheer cutouts was a plus. It was short enough to wear flats, but long enough to wear heels!  The color was more of a garnet color
review_summary: I had picked up some weight so this was very flattering yet forgiving.

review_text: I absolutely LOVED this dress! I rented this for a beach vacation (easy to pack!) and paired it with a jean jacket for a casual dinner. The material was super light and breathable - I felt very comfortable wearing this in the Caribbean heat. The back dips low, so I opted not to wear a bra, which was not a problem because the material in the bust has some gathering (plus, I'm not that busty!). The lengths of the straps are adjustable, so I didn't have to worry about pinning the front. It was roomy in the hips. The Petite length was perfect for me to wear with flat sandals. If I was to wear this dress with heels, I would have gotten the Regular length. Over 50% of the time I wear a S in dresses, but the XS fit me, no problem.
review_summary: Absolutely beautiful dress for a beach vacation!

review_text: Cute skirt, fit well
compliment magnet. super comfortable. stylish without looking like you're trying too hard.
review_summary: compliment magnet. super comfortable. stylish without looking like you're trying too hard.

review_text: The dress was just a touch short, and slightly tight around my rib cage... But I loved the color and received a lot of compliments.

The dress fit perfectly! I suggest renting the 2nd size for free just in case, but I was very lucky the size I chose fit me well. My mom's black dress was from Rent the Runway too! We received so many compliments!!
Worked wonderful for the usmc ball I went to. Felt great all night. It was super comfortable and well made dress!
review_summary: Wasn't my first pick but the other dress I received was too big. RTR sent this and worked great!

review_text: I wore this dress to a family wedding. It was very flattering, fit well and was true to size.
review_summary: I loved this dress, it fit perfectly, and I received so many compliments wearing it.

review_text: There was a small error with my order so I was able to pick a dress that RTR overnighted to me for my event. They ended up sending me this one and another so I wore one to the ceremony and one to the reception. RTR went above and beyond in my opinion. I loved this dress, gorgeous color. Very happy with my first rental.

I like the idea of this dress but the fit didn't work for me.  I am generally between a 0 and a 2 in all dresses, but the 2 in this dress hit me very strangely.  It wasn't too small in that I could zip it up no problem and it didn't feel tight, but it felt small in the way everything hit, ie: the waist band hit around my lower ribs and the darts at the hips  hit an inch or two above my hips.  It was almost like it was cut for petite sizing.  I also didn't like the way the cut ins at the sleeves hit, as they seemed to really highlight that little before the armpit skin squish that is no one's favorite thing to highlight.  Ended up sending back without wearing.

I had two days to find a gown for a black tie event, so I went directly to the RTR outpost in NYC. I selected this dress because of its flowy skirt and gorgeous color, and I was complimented on it all night. However, three things worth mentioning: 1) The back closure (which is low on the back) was tight for me, and I was self-conscious about my backfat 2) The cleavage V in front hits low (around the breast bone) which, for me near petite frame, also meant that the shoulders could get a bit loose. I used double-sided tape to tape down the chest area of the dress as well as the straps 3) The store only had an R length, which was just right when I wore my really tall heels (around 3.5-4 inches), but when I walked up stairs, I often would still step on the skirt mistakenly or almost trip. So beware. Overall though, I loved this dress and felt really pretty in it all night!
review_summary: Great rental for a last minute black tie event

review_text: Super flattering fit! It did take me a second to figure out the bow, but it ended up looking perfect and I got so many compliments! I wore it with light wash jeans on a warm day. It was very flattering, despite the little flair. It was perfect for Spring or Summer and felt very high quality.
LIttle short, but still suitable for a wedding guest! Could have been a little bit more fitted in the waist area.
review_summary: Loved it! Got many compliments and was very comfortable. It is thick and has shoulder pads as an FYI

review_text: Usually I wear an XS or even an XXS.  The XS was way too small.  The S was a tiny bit big, but I wore it anyway.  I got lots of compliments.  Great shirt!

This dress was very comfortable and got lots of compliments.  It was definitely unique compared to a lot of the other dresses I saw at the wedding (about 3-5 girls were wearing the same/similar dress as each other's from RTR but in different colors).  The reason I don't give it 5 stars is because I felt like the waist was a little high, and it wasn't very figure flattering because of it.  I probably wouldn't rent it again, but I don't regret it for this seaside wedding because of the cheerful color.
review_summary: Great color for a seaside summer wedding!

review_text: I got this dress in-store after my original dress didn't fit.  The store was a nightmare and I never got to try the dress on so luckily it fit!  This dress was super cute, but a little short, especially wtih my heels.  I am only 5'2", so for the taller girls, I would probably not wear this unless you are looking for a short short dress!  Sadly, the pics posted are the only two taken of the full dress of the night - so not great quality...
Runs small so if you normally wear a 2 get the 4. Fabric has some stretch to it which is great. A great dress.
review_summary: Great dress. I normally wear a 2 but the 4 was a much better fit. Very fitted but great!

review_text: I originally rented a 6 and an 8, but I would up wearing a 4 because the dress seemed to run large. I wanted to be able to wear a normal bra, which I was able to do, but the dress was low cut. The dress was comfortable and I received compliments all night!
The dress would have been perfect in a size 10. I figured I would try the 8 and take a chance but just was too tight.
review_summary: I didn't wear it but it would have been perfect. Just a tad to small and snug in the wrong places.

review_text: I am normally a 14, but I have a large DD-E chest.  I wore the 16, because the 14 didn't fit my bust.  The dress was well-worn.  There were two holes in the lace.  I wore it anyway, because I had no other choices, and you couldn't really tell they were there.  It was very low-cut, and rather short.  I am 5'6", and it was fingertip length on me.  I wore it with a gold belt, and nude wedges.  Despite the issues, I received dozens of compliments.  It was nice to stand out a bit in such a vibrant color, as opposed to the many people who wore black and beige.
review_summary: Lots of compliments, but didn't fit as well as I would have liked.

review_text: Great fit with fabric that  has some give to it.  The bow adds a great feature piece to this dress without being over the top.  I got complimented on this dress so many times.  Definitely going to rent it again.
review_summary: Flatters all of the right places.

review_text: Great fit, material has a nice weight to it. Got lots of compliments all day. Would definitely rent it again!
review_summary: Rented this dress for an outdoor summer bridal shower--perfect!

review_text: This dress is very long. Unless you are taller than 5'8" or want to wear sky high heels, I wouldn't recommend it. With 2" heels I was tripping over the Regular length.
review_summary: First shot, not the best luck.

review_text: Absolutely love this jumpsuit!  It fit like it was altered just for me.  Didn't want to send it back and will definitely be ordering again.
I loved this dress but couldn't wear the xs this Herve  runs a little small but I reordered it in a small
The top pulled my chest together,  it fit well.
review_summary: This outfit just did things for me.  It looked like I had great cleavage with no bra.  Very slimming

review_text: Such a sweet and flattering dress. Very well made. Everyone loved it and complimented me all night!

This is the first time ordering a  button down blouse and I ordered a Large as I have large breasts (can I just say  big boobs:)? Otherwise, I would be a medium everywhere else. I found the material to be perfect, not to light and not too heavy and super comfortable. Because I went up a size the sleeves were a little long but I buttoned and folded the cuff up in half and it looked fine. As a bonus,  it looked like a little French Cuff peaking out of my black suit jacket. I wore it with a black suit with cropped pants and it gave it a pop. Professional. I'm looking forward to wearing it with white jeans as pictured.
review_summary: I looked polished, professional with a little pop and fun.

review_text: I wore this dress to a wedding of a friend. It was so much fun to wear with the bright colors and puffy skirt. Also, it was super comfortable. I got a lot of compliments and I felt great.

I wasn't able to wear this dress. I tried on multiple dresses at Nordstrom's and Neiman Marcus - almost every dress that fit was a size 6. I ordered this Nicole Miller dress in a 6 - it arrived and didn't fit. Unfortunately for me, the 8 wasn't available so I was risking it with 1 dress only. 
The dress arrived at 7p on Friday night- I had to scramble and head to the mall to buy a dress last minute.  
My recommendation would be to go 1 size up - and don't risk if they don't have 2 dresses to ship. 
I ended up spending $1200 on a dress since my back was against the wall.

I wore this for my brother's college graduation. While the color was gorgeous, the overall fit of the dress wasn't as flattering as I would have hoped. I really wanted it to fit more sleekly, but I have curves (especially hip and tummy area).
review_summary: Great color, not as flattering as I'd hoped!

review_text: So many compliments! It's different enough without being too crazy. The zipper is really tough, impossible to get on/off alone. It runs a smidge tight so if you're really on the border, size up. Other than that, fit very true to size - I'm 5'6", 115 pounds and wore a 0R. I did have to wear it with 3 inch heels, 4.5 inch heels made this too short. Makes the booty look FAB :)

It was perfect! I have larger shoulders so it was a little tight there, but it fit PERFECTLY around my bottom. The fabric was stretchy and comfortable and I got a ton of compliments! I am 5'6" with a 34B and about 140 lbs
Nice and short, fit very well. Was a bit hit
review_summary: Wedding of great friends in the mountains!

review_text: This dress is well made and the fit is quite flattering. However, I did not end up wearing this dress to my event. This dress consists of two layers, and I felt that the top layer material was too 'matronly'- even for my age (I'm 43).  The only description that comes to mind is... stiff doilies from grandma's living room? I wanted to love it but just didn't.
review_summary: Great fit but the material wasn't for me.

review_text: It's very low cut, which made me a little self conscious at a work event. And I should have worn spanx to define a waist or something. But the slit in the leg is much lower than the website pic shows and was great with my sparkly triple-strap shoes.
review_summary: This dress felt great on, even though I was probably a little too heavy to be wearing it.

review_text: It was my first time ordering so I got to pick a second dress option and this was what I chose.  I really loved the dress and I think if it fit perfectly I would have loved it even more but it was a little big in the upper back area.  It is definitely a dress that needs to be fitted all around or it will bunch up in the wrong places. For a little snugger fit, I'd order a size down to make sure the dress hugs you where it is supposed to. I'd say the length was was to be expected.  I'm short and had to order the regular.  It was long but with really high heels, it was fine.
Very versatile dress, incredibly comfortable. I should have tried a size 4.
review_summary: Rented this dress for family pictures, worked out well even though the fit was a little large.

review_text: I had ordered the 4R and the 2R as a back-up size. I generally tend to fit into a size 4, but the 2 fit perfectly. The length was perfect as well. I am not tall (5'4" tall), and I wore 3" heels. The dress lightly skimmed the floor. When I sat down I did tend to step on the dress when I went to stand, but that was no big deal to me. I got so many compliments, and I had such a great time wearing this dress. I was disappointed I couldn't keep it!
The only con I have for this dress was that the fabric was heavier than I thought it would be. Absolutely loved it other than that!
review_summary: LOVED IT! Fit great (the length was perfect) and I felt comfortable dancing in it all night.

review_text: I love love love this asymmetrical dress. It's so beautiful and really looks amazing on. It runs small so you definitely need to size up. There is comfortable room in the bust, but it's very fitted in the waist, midsection, and hips. Curvier women should also size up. It's about tea length and can be work with any standard bra. This dress really looks amazing and can work for a range of events from dates, to parties to weddings. YOU MUST RENT THIS!

Pros: Fits GREAT, super comfortable, and I didnt have have to wear a bra
Cons: you really roll you dice with the quality of this dress. I ordered both the 4 and 6 and I thought the 4 fit better but the color was NOT blue it was disgusting and honestly a year later and Im still unsure why RTR would even think sending this dress to me was acceptable. The lace on the top part of both dresses were ripped (you could stick you fingers through the holes. THAT bad. I was able to stitch up the 6's holes enough and no one noticed.
GORGEOUS. SO flattering. lot's of compliments. Hugged all the right areas.
Cute sleeves, sweater was thin so I wore a tank under it.  The white portions of the shirt wrinkle easily, making the shirt look a little sloppy.

I would definitely recommend this dress. It runs true to size, beautiful fabric, loved the color, easy to wear. There were a few places fabric felt a little tight but it was really comfortable and was most due to the lace not having stretch. I have a 34D cup-size and this usually creates a problem in the chest but it didn't at all. I will say I didn't realize how low the chest line dips, you definitely cannot wear a bra. Because I have a big chest there was a lot of cleavage (I rarely wear anything with cleavage) but the lace tones it down. I wore to a gala and it was perfect made a statement without being to showy. I don't have a picture of me in full length but I have one from the photo booth that gives you a sense of the chest/neck line.

Conservative enough that I could wear it to a work function, but still super cute. Was tightest in waist, and poofed out in just the right place to be very slimming and hiding the gut! :) Got many compliments on this outfit. Definitely able to either wear it fancy or dress it down, depending on the occasion! Also it had pockets, which is always a plus. I really enjoyed this dress, and would definitely recommend it.
review_summary: Perfect and conservative enough for work! Nicely fitting, slimming, and cute.

review_text: I wore this to a winter wedding and it was perfect. The reviews were right, the dress does run big. I am normally a solid 12 but wore the 10 in this dress. The bust runs very large and you cannot wear a bra with a back strap. However, the material is thick enough and structured enough that I did not need one and felt completely comfortable. I really liked the open back detail too, gave it a little something extra. Also, the length was great for a tall frame, went just past my knees so did not feel skimpy at all. Received several compliments, would wear again!
review_summary: Perfect and flattering wedding guest dress

review_text: This dress is definitely a stand out.  It is quite forgiving - it has a subtle stretch.  However, it is quite short - especially if you have fluffy posterior (like me).  Despite being scandalously short, it looks very classy.  You won't be disappointed.
review_summary: The photo doesn't do this dress much justice - it is way more beautiful in person

review_text: I didn't wear it because the straps kept falling down and the top was too low in front. I Loved the dress and was sad about not being able to wear it until I went to the event and saw three other people who had it on. I am very happy I wore another dress. The customer service was amazing and gave me a credit. I just rented another dress for my birthday party this week. I can't wait.
review_summary: It was the Billboard music awards in Vegas-I saw three other ladies wearing it. I didn't wear it.

review_text: I normally wear a size 6, but was advised to order the Long lengths because i intended to wear heels. So, I ordered the 6L and the 8L. Ended up with a pretty short heels and so both dresses were way too long. This was a fairly easy fix with fashion tape to hem it, just wish I would have stayed true to size and not ordered the Longs. The dress itself is stunning and you won't regret this rental!
review_summary: stunning, not typical formal dress for my prom!

review_text: I'm 5'6 and 150lbs. It hit mid thigh for me.
review_summary: Great Fit. Sexxy dress for a Miami night out.

review_text: the colors are awesome. the material is a touch thicker, like incredibly soft canvas. the colors are great. i'm typically btwn a 2 and a 4 and got the 4 in this dress. i have room to spare and it looked great! the back doesn't zip up all the way, but you can definitely wear a reg bra or go without. the band around the waist has no stretch. hem hit a couple of inches above my knee, still work appropriate. this would be great for a picnic, brunch, or even dinner date. just change up the shoes. i'm a huge fan of this dress!
I wore this both to work and for a Thanksgiving brunch.  I received tons of compliments!
review_summary: This is so fun!  Love the sleeves.

review_text:
I kept getting complements all evening! The color was perfect for a day wedding and evening reception; I wore it with nude heels and simple jewelry. The beading around the neckline is enough but, it would've been lovely with a diamond necklace as well.

Lilly doesn't disappoint when it comes to the cut and fit of their dresses! This fit wonderfully and the cut provided an hour glass shape that looks great on all shapes and sizes. You can wear with regular under garments and the dress, while form fitting, never felt tight even while dancing. I was so sad to send this one back!
review_summary: Perfect for a spring wedding and dancing afterwards!

review_text: The dress fell 2 inches above my knee.  The material was thick but very comfortable. The dress was a bit baggy on my petite frame - but worked well enough.  I saw a girl with more curves wearing the dress and I thought it looked better on her.  I wore it to work with a cardigan and black tights and received many compliments.  It transitioned well to an evening cocktail party.
review_summary: Comfortable dress that goes from day to night

review_text: Stunning gown! Fit like a glove, perfect length!
review_summary: Wore this gown to my last Barrister's Ball (law school prom) - absolutely perfect!

review_text: So many compliments from so many people! I felt great in it, and was able to dance and move without feeling uncomfortable. I loved this dress so much, I've also rented it in two other colors for other occasions! Thanks RTR, you've made wedding season more fun! :)
review_summary: This dress was so comfortable and easy to wear!

review_text: It fit true to size for the most part. The back was a little loose, but a little fashion tape solved that problem. I would definitely recommend!
review_summary: I wore this dress to my engagement party. It was perfect! I got compliments all night long!

review_text: Normally wear a size 2 and ordered this in a 0 and fit perfectly
I ordered a small, it runs true to size should have gotten the med, will re-order. very nice
review_summary: didn't get to wear, I ordered too small

review_text: Very comfortable and flattering; well made, nice material. This is a very cute  option for petite women. I wore 3" heels with no platform and could have worn slightly lower heel. Absolutely loved and would love to rent again!
True to size, gorgeous color, loved overall!
The fabric is fairly thick, so it's forgiving. However, the poofiness of the dress from waist down adds on a couple pounds. Playful and casual for spring/summer outdoor events.
review_summary: Fun, bouncy dress; looks great in daytime

review_text: I rented this dress for vacation on the Cape and it was exactly what I wanted. As a few other reviews mentioned this size 2 had a broken zipper and it was extremely difficult to zipper it. However, once I got it on, I loved it. As with most Kate Spade dresses, the size 2 was slightly tight in the chest area but not uncomfortable. This dress is also forgiving in the stomach since it flairs out a bit. Besides the zipper issue, I really enjoyed this dress.
review_summary: Perfect for happy hour with friends!

review_text: Absolutely loved this dress! Perfect dress for my birthday celebration - received so many compliments!

I didn't end up wearing this dress- the 4 was a bit small ( I am between 4-6) and this was a backup that RTR sent me after my original order was unavailable. I wish I could have tried the 6, becasue the details on the dress were lovely! Would recommend if you can size up.
The dress was very tight and the material have little to no give. I usually wear a 4, ended up wearing the 6, and should have worn the 8!

I was excited to try this as my 2nd option but as it was fairly last minute and didn't have my typical size. I'm usually a 10 so the 8 was just too small. I love this color! The fabric was beautiful but too short for me. The black lining on the  straps was also showing wear but nothing that made it unwearable in my opinion.
